profile.CN:
——喜爱的一面。

此人，善使名为鬼道的诡异之术，善于蛊惑群众。该国长年受动乱袭扰，作为倾听星辰神谕的巫女成为了女王。

女王的神殿被坚固的城栅包围，有众多士兵驻守，虽有数名侍从侍奉左右，但在成为女王之后从未面见过任何人，只有一位无名的弟弟辅佐她，并负责传达她的神谕。

总之，说是女王，实际上生活还是非常朴素，每当想偷偷溜出神殿时，必然会因为下雨而无法外出，每天只能不停地占卜或是擦擦镜子呢。

虽然我有很多镜子，但这面是特殊的。这是我在成为女王之前，弟弟不知从哪儿搞来的镜子哦。我闲来无事的时候经常端详这面镜子。

不只是镜子，当我肚子咕咕叫的时候，总会把自己的那份给我，一直姐姐、姐姐地在我身边为我做很多事，成为女王之后，也代替我四处奔波，为我做了很多事，真的为我做了很多，将自己的一切都献给了我，最后连名字都失去了的弟弟给我的镜子。

——喜爱的一面。
profile.NA:
Her favorite mirror.


The woman employed suspicious techniques called kidou to mislead the masses. As the nation was plagued by constant conflict, the shrine maiden who received oracles from the starry heavens became queen. The queen's shrine was surrounded by sturdy fences and guarded by numerous soldiers, and a great many attendants served her. However, since she became queen, she never met anyone outside the confines of her shrine, and only one person, her nameless brother, was said to have assisted her and delivered her oracles.


Yep. Even though I was queen, I was living this life of solitude. And anytime I tried to sneak out of the shrine, it would always rain, which kept me from going out. So the only thing I could do was either more divinations or polish my mirrors. I had tons of mirrors, but this one's special. My brother got it from me from...somewhere, before I became queen. I spent a lot of time looking into it when I was bored.


And it wasn't just the mirror. Whenever my stomach growled, my brother would give me his own food, and he would dote on me, always saying "Sister" this and "Sister" that. Even after I became queen, he would constantly run errands in my place. He really did so much for me, and he offered everything he had to me. In the end, no one even remembered him... He became this nameless brother of mine. And this is the mirror he gave me.


...My favorite mirror.

profile.CN:
该男子晚年沉默寡言质朴刚健。

身为离开队伍留在会津，改名换姓成为警官为政府效力，并最终走完了一生的这个男人，直到临终之际也没有怎么提及与自己并肩战斗的他们的事。在这个武士的存在意义黯然褪色，失去了价值的时代，这个男人依然秉持武士风范度过了自己的一生。

实际上啦，哎呀，别看我这样，其实我口风并不紧，一不小心就会喋喋不休地说些有的没的。过去在道场见到努力挥竹刀的年轻人时，我也会做出一副自以为了不起的样子，对他们指手画脚地解说个不停。

再说了，刀剑这种东西，谁有空会逐一考虑该怎么斩、该怎么挥啊。到时候也只会浑然忘我地来回挥舞吧，能明白吗？

总之，当年就是这样的啦。

忘我地相互厮杀、忘我地哭泣欢笑、忘我地走向死亡，大家都是这样过来的。所以我才觉得，至少我应该高掲旗帜堂堂正正地活到最后才行。

在动荡的幕末不断战斗，并活到最后的一位新选组成员。无人知晓他的心思。

『——话说，大家，你们找到梦之尽头了吗？』
profile.NA:
The man's final years were simple and quiet. After he quit the brigade, he remained in Aizu, changed his name, and served the government as a policeman. Despite living a long and full life, he spoke little about his comrades he fought alongside in the past, even towards the end of his life. In the age when the life of the samurai started to fade away, this man firmly stood his ground and continued to live like a samurai.


That sounds really good in writing, but in truth, I actually have pretty loose lips. The moment I open my mouth, I just blabber about all kinds of things that may or may not be true. One time, there was this young man who was training really hard with his wooden sword at a dojo, and I just went right in and gave him this long lecture on the importance of tsuki. You know what? You don't have time to think about how to properly attack or parry. You just get really into the moment and start swinging your sword around. You get what I mean?


That's just how it was back in the day though.


They immersed themselves in fighting, laughed and cried enthusiastically, and died in a frenzy. That's how they all lived in that age. That's when I thought I should at least live my life carrying my own banner till the very end.


One member of the Shinsengumi who fought through the turbulent age of the Bakumatsu and survived. Nobody knows what was going through his mind.


"Hey guys. Did you get what you wanted in the end?"

profile.CN:

profile.NA:
A single red spider lily is placed in front of a gravestone at a certain temple.


On the way home after a day of fun at the castle town, near the riverbank, she tells a story that is both bizarre and entrancing. It's an idea for a new unified nation that a mediocre person like you would never have dreamed up in your feeble mind. More than anything, you were captivated by her eyes as they burned a passionate red in the crimson light of the setting sun.


I wanted to keep laughing and smiling in that place forever and ever.

I wanted to keep crying in that place forever and ever.

I wanted us to be there together in that place forever and ever.


But the times, the warring states, and all that surrounded him did not allow it.


Why am I so foolish and incompetent? Why did I not have even an ounce of talent to complement those passionate eyes of hers? Why couldn't I even follow in her footsteps?


I just couldn't, so I had no choice but to eradicate everyone who looked down on her. I had no choice but to offer my very body and throw myself into the fire to illuminate her.


A single barren flower laid the path for her to become the Demon King, a being who eventually became known as the enemy of gods, the Buddha, and all creatures.


I'll leave the rest to you, Sister.


Ah, but if it were possible, I would have liked to hang around with Sister a bit longer...

profile.NA:
This was a picture that you took right after we finished our test drive of the new Nautilus.


The ship gained a purpose that was worth fighting for.

The crew was blessed with the adventure they had longed for.

And the captain met a Master.


A character taken from a fictional novel. A child of the sea god who only existed in a snippet of mythology. What was born, after combining these two, resulted in me becoming not a Heroic Spirit, but a Phantom Spirit. And quite honestly, I didn't have much confidence to fulfill the duties as captain, nor I didn't have that much of a desire to save the world.


Yet I still wanted to go on a voyage. I wanted to go on a heart-pounding adventure. It wasn't just the readers who longed for a man of faith who was also eccentric, mysterious, and scary.


And the reason why I, as this fragmentary Phantom Spirit, started to get serious was when I met the protagonist, who was just as incomplete, helpless, and they wouldn't be able to get by unless someone had to take care of them.


Adventures test and cultivate anyone equally. And we realized that upon our summoning.


The ship had gained a purpose that was worth fighting for.

The crew was blessed with the adventure they had longed for.

And the captain met a Master.


This was a picture that commemorated that moment.

It's a great memory of when we set sail that I still hold dear in my heart.

And as long as I have this memory, I, Captain Nemo, will continue to protect your travels until the very end.

profile.CN:
亲爱的御主

我一直在思考，赠送自画像作为友谊的证明未免有些不好意思。
但我依然相信，你应该能明白我选择这个的理由。
这就是我。这是你向我展示的，我所爱的我自己的面容。
用克吕提厄的感觉来说，因为比较中意阿尔勒时代的画风与配色，所以采用了这种风格。与那张据说卖出了不知道是几万还是几亿的向日葵的风格比较接近吧。应该非常适合挂在你房间那煞风景的右侧墙上。假如你将来不幸陷入穷困潦倒的境地，我不介意你将这幅画卖掉，但届时，如果你能将「描绘了来路不明怪物女的梵高真迹」卖出了多少钱的故事说给我听，顺便请我喝杯咖啡，我会非常高兴。
不仅绘画才华，连书信风格都沿袭自文森特的高级梵高笑话快说不下去了。我快被自己的傲慢压垮了，而且对于为修改绘画而耗费了大量画材一事，我还得向正在激烈敲打房门顶着乔康达脸的达·芬奇氏（作为画家来说无论听说多少次都觉得是个令人费解的存在）解释才行。万幸的是北斋也在，她应该会帮我吧。当我写下这句的时候，啊啊，她撇下那个黑色小小的北斋逃跑了，看来在辩解的问题上，除了自己没人可以依靠了！
我将信和这幅画托付给了黑色小小的北斋。如果你在走廊里见到捂着头上肿包的我，希望你能为我提供回复、安慰等无微不至的支援。

怀着不变的忠诚与友情，在心中与你握手。
profile.NA:
To my dear, beloved Master,


I've been thinking of how embarrassing it would be to gift you a self-portrait as a token of my friendship. But ultimately I still chose to do so because I'm confident that you would understand. So this is me. This is my face that you had shown me to love. If I'm talking from Clytie's standpoint, I tried painting in the style from the Arles period because I like its coloring. It's probably close in style of that sunflower painting that sold for a few million. But this painting for you should go perfectly well on the right side of the wall in your drab room. And if for some unfortunate reason you find yourself struggling, you can go ahead and sell it. But when you do, I look forward to you buying me a cup of coffee and telling me the story of how much that "painting of an unknown monster girl with an authentic Van Gogh autograph" sold for.

It looks like I'm reaching my limit with my advanced Van Gogh joke of borrowing Vincent's artistic talent and writing style. The haughtiness is crushing me, and I still need to explain myself to Gioconda Da Vinci who keeps banging on my door on why I used so much painting materials during my many trial and errors for this painting. (Though her existence as an artist still puzzles me no matter how many times I hear the story). Luckily Hokusai's with me so she can probably side with me. Oh...as I was writing this sentence, she took off leaving the little black Hokusai behind, so now I don't have anyone else to sweet talk my way out!

I'm going to entrust this letter and painting to the little black Hokusai. If you see me in the halls nursing a bump on my head, some treatment and consolation would be appreciated.


With my unwavering loyalty and friendship, a handshake to you.

They put their swords down. The bloody battle ended without the need to take a single head.


The morning sunlight seems to sting against their fresh wounds. Even if this pain lingers till the ends of time, they will have to endure it. That's the way of life for the men who chose to live in a world full of oni.


　◆


This is a future that could have been. Among the daily battles between oni and warriors, if there was even a single miracle where these two fought side-by-side, they may have spent a morning like this.


But in Proper Human History, the oni of Mt. Ooe were wiped out. Under the protection of the Divine Wine - Shinpen Kidoku, the giant oni's armor made of dragon bones and sacrificial blood pitted itself against the three weapons powerful enough to pierce the heavens, and ultimately cracked...then shattered. Minamoto-no-Raikou and her Four Heavenly Kings severed the heads of each and every one of the sleeping oni, putting an end to their evil.


The sun rises. A new day is about to begin. It may be the dawn of peace for the Heian city, signaling its freedom from the frenzied bloodshed that once drenched its streets. And yet, to the men...


It was just the beginning of an eternal battle as they were made to live with the scars etched deep upon their bodies.

profile.NA:
And then, it was all over.

Horrid scratch marks, a house torn apart, and broken furniture.

And a woman on the floor...

There's no point asking whether she would survive.

That was probably the wrong question to ask in the first place.


I wasn't expecting to interact with her.

It wasn't even about being able to look at her.

The only thing that mattered was that she lived...if only she could've lived happily.

That would have been enough.

And yet, take a look: this was reality.


She's gone/It's your fault.

She was killed/It's your fault.

That oni fled/You'll need to kill it.

Don't avert your eyes/Look away.

Carve that golden hair into your memory/It's not over yet.

Take that thing's head/You should kill yourself.

Who can I blame?/You mustn't blame anyone.


And just like that, the man puts an end to his own delusions.

Oni must be killed.

It is that simple.

No, you need to think. You need to keep thinking.

Even if it killed you...even if you died...even if you rotted and sank into the earth...


I recall the gaze that looked up at me. It was as delicate and fleeting as a soap bubble on the wind.


It was quiet, devoid of any emotion.

It was a girl who was looking up at me.

There was guilt.

Oni are sinful, humans are sinful, the girl was sinful...

...and I am also sinful.

Not only do I carry sin, but I also carry duty.


I grip the sword's hilt tightly.

I have no intention of giving it up to anyone, let alone allowing it to be taken from me.

"Killing that thing is my job."


...Tsuna, Tsuna, TSUNAAA!


The oni's claws draw near.

Something inside me stirs, filling my wavering heart.

I turn my body, swing my sword.


This battle and its truth...even its conclusion...will ultimately be lost to time.


Nobody understands, and nobody will come to understand...the reason she and I try to kill each other.

profile.CN:
侧耳倾听踢踏在街道上的脚步声。

仿佛能被时钟的指针追上般慢慢步行，
却也走马观花。

眯着眼睛眺望着来往的云彩，
追寻风的气息，
并珍惜这当下一刻吧。
profile.NA:
He listens to the dancing footsteps coming from the street.


Even as his own steps are slower than the hands of the clock, he is undeterred.


Squinting as he gazes at the clouds that float by, he chases the scent of the wind. He will cherish this brief moment for the time being.

profile.CN:
祈愿的光辉，温柔地把夜空染上五彩斑斓。

但愿这次旅途，
能充满温暖。

向小小的火焰努力地注入心愿。
profile.NA:
The lights of wishes dyes the night sky, painting the entire world in a gentle glow.


May this journey be full of warmth.


Such is the sentiment burning in this small flame.

profile.CN:
与清爽宜人的阳光交谈片刻，
泰然自若地怜爱弱小。
轻轻地打个盹，
度过无所事事的一刻。

这也是，与王者相称的爱好。
profile.NA:
As I briefly exchange pleasantries with the refreshing sunlight, I calmly caress a helpless creature. I allow myself to sink in to a peaceful slumber, and time passes idly by.


This too, is a fitting way for a king to spend his time.

profile.CN:
心无旁骛，
既不得意忘形也不扭扭捏捏，
大到连闭上嘴都不行，
这样吃饭才刚刚好。

这样边吃边闲聊，
也是刚刚好。
profile.NA:
It is a meal of no real consequence, nothing to be either excited or concerned about. The food so big you can't even get your mouth around it...just makes it right.


This is the perfect setup for a trivial conversation.

profile.CN:
将失去之物，传达给遗失的存在。
将闪耀之物，传达给远方的存在。
但愿，延续到这一夜终结。

来吧，我们走——御主。
profile.NA:
Let what is lost, be lost.

Let all that is brilliant be distant.

Let it be so...until this night ends.


Now, let us be off, Master.

profile.CN:
——有好几个哦？

她这么说完后露出了笑容。
这究竟是什么意思呢。

而得知她指的是宝具时，
已经是不久之后的事了。
神剑·草那艺之大刀。
与她的根源相关的大宝具，从日本神话传说中的
巨大灾害之龙·八岐大蛇尾部现出的剑。
据说这把剑有诸多名字。
草那艺剑、天丛云剑，以及，都牟刈之太刀。

突然意识到。
身为宝具的这把剑该不会——


——————有多少名字，就有多少把吧？


虽然现在仍然
不知道她那句话的真正含义。
但或许终有一天能了解个中含义吧。
profile.NA:
"There should be a few of them, you know?"


She smiled as she said that.

What could she have possibly meant?

It wasn't until later that you realize she was talking about her Noble Phantasm. The Sword of Gods, Kusanagi-no-Tachi, the great Noble Phantasm associated with her origin...the sword said to have come from great dragon of calamity, Yamata-no-Orochi mentioned in Japanese mythology. The sword actually has many names: Kusanagi-no-Tsurugi, Ame-no-Murakumo-no-Tsuguri, Tsumugari-no-Tachi, and no shortage of others.


Then it dawns on you: Could there be as many versions of this sword as there are names for it?


It's still unclear to you what she meant, but perhaps there will come a day when you may finally understand her meaning...

profile.CN:
装饰有双子的蛋糕，
与闪耀着光辉的星之蜡烛。

虽然哥哥对人类的习惯毫无兴趣，
但看到妹妹开心的表情，并未说什么。

因为今天是个特别的日子……
圣诞节快乐！
profile.NA:
Decorations resembling the twins and starry candles lit up dazzle on top of a cake.


While the older brother has absolutely no interest in human customs, he shuts his mouth quiet seeing the delighted expressions on his sister's face.


After all, today's a special day.

Happy Christmas!

profile.CN:
就算战法换成拳斗，
战士也会继续锻炼。

有盟友参战就更不用说了，
犹如同在师门下修行的那段时光。
profile.NA:
Even if the combat style has changed to boxing, a warrior still needs to train.

It's even more important when a sworn friend joins the fray.

Just like in those days when they trained together under their mentor.

profile.CN:
对摄影师来说，
圣诞节是千载难逢的好机会。

为了将绚烂的光，将人们的笑容，
将现在化作回忆。
profile.NA:
To photographers, Christmas offers unique opportunities.


Everything is done in order to eternalize all the bustling lights and the peoples' smiles as memories.

profile.CN:
冰结的花瓣在空中飞舞。

樱色的冰一旦触碰到手掌，
仿佛就会融化不见。

在这令人怀念的雪景中，
女神凭依之躯的少女心驰神往。

啊啊，多么温柔的天空啊——
profile.NA:
A frozen petal dances in the air.


It's so delicate, it's likely to melt and dissolve the moment the cherry-blossom-colored ice touches the palm.


The young girl who is the vessel for a goddess is deep in thought among the snowscape that feels nostalgic.


Ah, how the sky looks gentle and inviting.

profile.CN:
这理至今仍耸立

此处有冰雪。
被夺走之水遭堰塞的形态。

此处有阴暗。
被遮蔽的天地之影。

此处有沉默。
非神非魔之人的不在证明。

但是，这些皆被神之手粉碎了。

迟早。
或是与过去相同。

换言之，这是永恒不灭重复的原则。

即便神代终结人类之世到来，
与神魔等同的某种存在现形的——

堰界之理。

被堰塞、被解放，然后世界将再次——
profile.NA:
Even now, it continues to rise.


What's there is snow and ice. Seized and obstructed water that's taken shape.


There is gloom. Shadow that veils the heavens and earth.

There is silence. Proof that humans, who are neither god nor evil, do not exist there.


And yet, it will get shattered by the hands of god.


Eventually.

Or at least the way had been in the past.


In other words, it's the law and principle that has repeated itself over and over again and will continue on for eternity.


Whether the Age of Gods end, and the world of humans begin, the law of obstruction shall manifest in some shape or form that is equivalent to gods and evil.



Water shall be obstructed, released, and then the world shall once again...

profile.CN:
初代不愧是初代。
所有方面的水准都极高，
尤其是那鼓囊囊礼物袋的沉重，乃是不逊色于黑色圣剑斩击的威胁。
胜因是……对那雪橇而言，拳击场地太小了。仅此而已。

二代的阶级差距太大。比赛无结果。没有战斗。
只是将腰带的所有权让给了我而已。
但还是可以讨论圣诞老人的存在方式。
这根腰带上无疑承载着她的念想吧。

三代也是强敌。
如果对方身体状况万无一失的话，可能就危险了。
……你知道吗？
绵羊的毛可以吸收拳击的冲击。
那给我好好上了一课。好好上了一课。

啊啊。四代才可谓最强的强敌。
是正面展开的肉搏战。
踩着奇妙的步法，那拳头打不中的众多圣诞杀法……说实话，下次再战我也不知道会如何。
但依然希望能再战。
对方恐怕也有这个想法。
我是否也该吸纳那种充满韵律感的步法呢。
好像是叫……桑巴吧？

五代是另一个角度的可怕对手。
竟然想为拳手注射……
哪怕是出于一份厚意，也一招都不能吃啊。
一旦被判为违反兴奋剂规定，我就输了。从某种角度来说，算是最有紧张感的较量。

经过了这些战斗，我才得到了这个……但说实话，本应把这个佩在腰上的并不是我。

我觉得完美运用我这个圣诞老人的御主才应该被赐予这个，但御主始终不肯收下。

所以……没错。
我……或许只能算是暂定王者吧。

然后明年估计还会有新的圣诞老人。在与那个人打头衔战之前，唯有专心修行呢……
profile.NA:
The first Santa was without a doubt, everything I expected from the first Santa. Everything was executed masterfully, and the weight of her bulging bag full of presents was just as much of a threat as a swing of her black sacred sword. I only won because the ring was too small for her sled.


The second Santa was just in a different division, so it ended with no contest. I didn't even fight her. She just gave up the belt. But at the same time, we were able to talk about what a Santa should be. This belt without a doubt carries her feelings as well.


The third Santa was a formidable opponent. Had she been in a better condition, I might have been in trouble. Did you know that sheep's wool absorbs impact from punches? That was truly a great learning experience for me.


Oh right. I do have to say that the fourth Santa was my strongest opponent yet. She came straight at me in close quarters. She used very strange steps that prevented my punches from hitting, and her numerous killer Christmas techniques... Honestly, I don't know that I would fare better if I went up against her in the future. I would very much like a rematch, and I'm sure the feeling is mutual. Perhaps I should also incorporate that rhythm into my footwork. Samba...she called it?


The fifth Santa was a terrifying opponent...in a different way. I can't believe she tried attacking a boxer with a syringe... Even if she did that out of kindness, there was no way I was going to allow myself to take such a hit. I'd immediately be disqualified the moment I was suspected of doping. So in a sense, this match kept me on my toes the most.


So I managed to obtain this through those battles...but to be honest, I shouldn't be the one wearing this belt.


I think it should be given to Master, who handled me as Santa Claus so well. But I can't seem to convince them to accept it. That why...at best, I should probably be considered the provisional champion. It's likely there will be another Santa next year. I guess I'll just have to keep on training until a title match with them gets arranged...

profile.CN:
指尖轻抚，拨出旋律，
犹如温柔的祝福。

祝愿在即将到来的春天，
能过上更为丰富多彩的生活。
profile.NA: Like a gentle celebratory message, the graceful fingertips strum gentle notes. May the coming spring be even more fruitful.

profile.CN:
有种说法称，
天真无邪能祛除邪气。

其实就是说，
比起一群板着脸的围坐桌旁的地方，
还是欢乐明快的氛围更容易招来福气。
profile.NA:
They say that innocence purifies (eliminates) evil.


But the simple fact of the matter is that rather than grumpy faces, cheerful faces surrounding a cramped table make it that much more likely for good fortune to grace you.

profile.CN:
厮杀到只剩最后一个的尸山血河之斗牛场。
这里绝对没有什么皆大欢喜……
每个人都这么认为。
但是，颠覆这一切的闪光
刺穿了斗牛士的心脏。
没错，这就是爱。
profile.NA:
A bullfighting stadium, full of bloody corpses piled high... The killing continues until there is only one person left standing. Here, there are no happy endings...


At least that's what everyone believed. And yet, a single spark that pierced the matador's heart changed all that. That's right. This is what true love is all about.

unknownCharacters: 奥尔加玛丽·阿尼姆斯菲亚

profile.CN:
穿过高高的天空。

灾厄一蹴。
嫣然一笑。

真心祝愿各位，
新年快乐万事如意。
profile.NA:
Higher and higher...passing above even the sky.


Smile, kick catastrophe aside.


May you all be blessed with the happiest New Year.

profile.CN:
凭借吾王的骑乘技能，
无论多么狂暴的牛背，
都舒适如商务舱躺椅。

当狂暴之牛疲惫倒地之时，
吾王定会大加赞赏其辛劳，
并邀请它加入晚餐餐桌吧。
profile.NA:
With the king's Riding skill, the ride will be as smooth as a business class seat, no matter how wild the bull gets.


The moment the bull gets exhausted and lies down on the ground, the king shall praise its efforts, and then she will invite it for dinner...literally.

profile.CN:
最终战争结束，
而后回归日常。

焚膏继晷、心有所属、发生要事、
建造居所、命悬一线。

人活于世，苦痛永随，
身亡命陨，喜悦仍存。

人生并非孑然独立，
继往开来，连绵延续的道路才叫生命。

「总之就是这么一回事，拿去吧。
　算纪念品啦，纪念品。就算总有一天会忘却，
　这也能成为你曾做过这些事的纪念吧？
　如果你中意的话，就当做传家宝吧，
　可以向自己的孩子们好好炫耀炫耀。」

不仅为斩断宿业，
也是为了永远结下这段缘分。

「……话说回来，怎会如此。
　竟然把不会用上的东西做到极致，
　老夫也真是老了吧。」
profile.NA:
The battle eventually ended and he returned to his work.


He goes through his days, goes about his business, builds a home, loves, and gets involved in people's lives.


As long as one is alive, there is suffering. Yet even if one meets death, joy will live on.


Life is not a single point. It is a continuous path that connects the past to the future.


"Well there you have it. Take it. It's a keepsake, a souvenir. Even if we all are forgotten, it'll be a memento that everyone will see and know you did something great. Well, if you've taken a liking to it, make it a family heirloom and show it off to your kids or something."


Sometimes one doesn't need to sever karma, but rather to make enduring connections.


"Honestly. I can't believe I made something magnificent without intending that it be used. Maybe I'm going senile."

profile.CN:
新年就该和朋友聚在一起玩耍。
你也一起来嘛。很开心哦。
大家都在哦，玛修、所长、
贞德和尼托克丽丝都在哦。
大家都开心得飘起来了哦。
你也飘起来吧。
profile.NA:
Let's have all our friends gather to hang out for the New Year.

You should come too. It'll be really fun.

Everyone's here...Mash, and even Director! Jeanne and Nitocris are here too.

We all float here.

You'll float, too.

unknownCharacters: 奥尔加玛丽·阿尼姆斯菲亚

profile.CN:
今年冬季车队的主题，
是“在线举办也会非常快乐”！
就算身在房间里，也和大家一起享受吧！
profile.NA:
The theme for this year's winter caravan is: "It's fun online, too!"

We'll have fun together even stuck in our rooms!

profile.CN:
即便身形比婴儿还要娇小，
她的美丽也丝毫没有枯萎。

区区零落的花瓣无法颠覆，
无人能从她那可爱眼瞳的魅力中——

——彻底逃脱。
profile.NA:
Despite her tiny size...smaller than a child...her beauty is undiminished. No amount of flower petals scattered around would completely conceal those alluring eyes of hers...

...And nobody would be able to escape from them.

profile.CN:
只需专心一意挑战，即为“禅”。
只需晴云秋月雕琢，即为“定”。

实现此等情景模型乃是符合常理之举，
会废寝忘食浑然忘我，实乃，
实乃无可奈何之举是也。
profile.NA:
Putting your heart and soul into something...that is "zen."

Working with a clear mind to create something...that is "samadhi."


Working on a diorama leads to this state, and so inevitably one will forget to eat and sleep.

profile.CN:
漫无目的之旅虽是一种乐趣，
但前往心中所向之地，
同样有种深奥的韵味。

在传说武藏坊弁庆曾撰写书信的这块石头之上。
单手拿着满是梦想的书本，
好了，接下来该去向何地呢。
profile.NA:
Letting your feet carry you away has its charm, but there is also pleasure in visiting someplace your heart desires.


Sitting on the stone where Musashibou Benkei is said to have sat and written a letter, he now holds a booklet that is chock full of dreams and wonders where he should head to this time.

profile.CN:
缝一针，祈祷健康，
缝一针，祈祷幸福。

全心全意。
倾注真心。
在明媚的阳光之下，祈祷自己孩子的平安。

只是一心思念，也会成为幸福的时光。
profile.NA:
With each stitch, I wish for your health.

With each stitch, I wish for your fortune.


With care...and with sincerity.

Under the warm sun, I pray for my child's peace.

Sometimes just thinking about that makes me happy.

profile.CN:
英灵·平景清的爱刀。宝具。
原本是平家代代相传的太刀。
平时伪装成二刀痣丸的形态，宝具真名解放时，恢复原本一把太刀的样子。

将怨念作为力量的存在，
是怨念聚集而成的存在。

但凡有生命的灵长类触碰到这个，是不可能平安无事的。
景清取出这个的时候，必须小心谨慎，与其保持距离才行。

……但是。
只要她体内还有身为义经的部分，
应该就不会危害到御主。
而且最近，景清本人也比较安分——
profile.NA:
The beloved sword and Noble Phantasm of the Heroic Spirit, Taira-no-Kagekiyo. Originally a sword which was passed down through the generations of the Heike. Normally, it takes the temporary form of two swords called "Azamaru," but upon the Noble Phantasm's True Name revelation, it reverts back to its true form as a single long blade.


It is both powered by hatred, and exists as a physical amalgamation of that very loathing.


No living primate is safe from its touch. The moment Kagekiyo unsheathes this blade, you should proceed with extreme caution.


Although...as long as Yoshitsune is around, Master should not be in harm's way. Kagekiyo has even been relatively calm lately...

profile.CN:
——鬼一法眼的高齿屐，一双。

脱下的木屐被随意扔在地上。
可以推测出，
应该是「从中庭进入屋内时随手脱下的」。
看来，她一定有什么急事吧。
是什么坏消息的话，她应该没空脱什么木屐吧，
所以一定是什么好消息。

眼前仿佛浮现出师傅愉快的样子了。
她一定会嘎、嘎、嘎！地开朗欢笑吧。
虽然这景象会令人高兴而感到可爱，
但也该抓紧时间了。
一旦急匆匆进入屋子后发现房里一个人都没有，
即便是师傅，也可能会闹别扭吧。

「喂～，有人吗！」
你看，能听到声音了。
赶快！
profile.NA:
A pair of Kiichi Hogen's takageta...elevated wooden clogs.


They're unceremoniously lying on the ground, likely kicked off when she came into the house from the courtyard. It seems the wearer was in quite the hurry. She wouldn't have bothered to remove them if bad news was what made her rush, so it must have been good news.


You can just imagine the great mentor of the East in a good mood. She'll be laughing merrily: "Kanra, kara kara!" While this is both a charming and adorable image, you need to hurry... If she rushed in only to find nobody inside the mansion, even the mild-mannered mentor may get cranky.


"Heeey, is anyone here!?"

Ah, do you hear her?

Let's hurry!

profile.CN:
在看不到前方的逆光中前进的异闻带之旅。
与在那小小的家中迎接我的笑容一起，
在可能存在的世界中遍历的，那份记录。
profile.NA: The journey through the Lostbelts...to cut a path through the glaring light that hides the future before you. Along with the smiling faces that greet you in your little home, this is a record of the journey through a world that could have been.

profile.CN:
在云朵般柔软的烤薄饼上，
加上梦幻般的甜美蜂蜜与水果。

但愿有朝一日我也能回报
您给我的这一份心动。

您给予我的心跳是如此强烈而甜美，
感觉无论多久也报答不完呢！

看来只能一生与您相伴了吧！
话说，御主，这也是您的愿望吧？
profile.NA:
Pancakes as fluffy as clouds, dressed up with fruit and honey as sweet as dreams.


I hope I can pay back some of the happiness you've given me, but the time I've spent with you has been so exhilarating and so sweet that I don't think I'll ever be able to!


That just means I'll have to stick with you for the rest of your life! Isn't that what you want, Master?

profile.CN:
高贵而美丽。
从冰冷的盒子中隐约透出一丝热量。

应该可以打开它吧。
因为钥匙就在手中。

只不过，就算打开了锁，
等待自己的或许也是更大的谜题。

神秘的女帝正面露优雅的微笑，
等待着你的选择。
profile.NA:
Sublime and delicious. A faint warmth can be felt from within the cool box.

You can open it, as well. The key is in your hands. Of course, a greater puzzle may await you once it is unsealed. The mysterious empress awaits your choice with a regal smile.

profile.CN:
在情人节赠送巧克力。
并非只有恋人可以这么做。

送给亲爱的朋友。
即便岁月流逝，容貌改变，
共同度过的时光至今也深藏心中。
profile.NA:
One gives chocolate on Valentine's Day, and not necessarily only to lovers.


To my dear friend,

Though we may look different after all these years, I will always cherish the time we spent together.

profile.CN:
要不要来一些松软的点心呢？
配上一杯刚泡好的红茶吧。

神妃微笑着说，这真是个适合款待的好日子呢。
就像在赞颂着世间万物。
profile.NA: "How about some fluffy sweets? Please, have them with this fresh cup of black tea. It's a fine day for hospitality," says the divine consort with a smile, as if to celebrate the life of all creatures, great and small.

profile.CN:
她没有留下任何东西。
生来就对自己的命运非常客观，
由于病弱，生存本身就很艰难，
无论生活多么平静，
对她来说季节也始终是冬天。

所以，没有留恋或是遗憾。
当完成自己的职责之后，
犹如从一开始就该这样，
真心认为自己应该作为
“不存在之物”消失。

「啊啊，但是——
　这阳光，是多么美好啊。」

人们归来，明日归来，世界被拯救的那一天。
在阖上眼帘的瞬间，
她看到了一些以前从未见到的东西。

「从明天起，每一天，
　肯定都会无比闪耀吧。」

怀着这份憧憬，她陷入了沉睡。
这是她原本什么都不该剩下的人生的证明。
就像想将自己为数不多的少女兴趣的回忆
留给难能可贵的友人一样。
profile.NA:
She left nothing behind. She was clear-eyed about her fate from the start. Even just living was hard on her frail body. No matter how pleasant the weather was, for her, the season was always winter.


So she had no regrets, no lingering doubts. Once her role was complete, she was happy to disappear as if she'd never existed. She genuinely believed that.


"Ah, but...this sunshine is quite nice."


On that day, when the world was saved, when people and tomorrow returned to their rightful places...for a moment, when she closed her eyes, she caught a glimpse of something she'd never seen before.


"If tomorrow comes...I'm sure every day will be dazzling."


She fell into a deep slumber, holding onto that earnest wish. It was the proof of a life that should have vanished without a trace, like leaving a memory of one of her precious few hobbies to a dear friend.

profile.CN:
旅行者的回礼。

造访迦勒底，缓缓进行重力助推的他
随心所欲地从日常生活中截下的记忆碎片。
还没有被整理进相册的照片。


——1990年2月14日。
宇宙探测器旅行者拍摄的一组39张照片
被称作『太阳系全家福　Family Portrait』。
这是从距地球60亿公里的远方，
从用光的速度都要耗费五个半小时的海王星轨道外侧
眯起眼睛回望太阳，
用镜头捕捉熟悉行星们的形象，
并以数据情报的形式在磁带上保留下来的东西。
通称「暗淡蓝点」的暗淡地球的小点照片，
就是其中的一张。

旅行者从木星、土星等地外行星边擦过，
并完成了数万张照片的拍摄任务，
但当时的机体只有很小的记录容量，
每当拍摄新照片时，都会将已完成发送的数据覆盖。

但是，在拍摄了太阳系全家福之后，
旅行者再也没有接收到任何拍摄的指令，
为了确保其他设备的电力，
照相机的电源也被永久关闭了。

既然如此……说不定，
现在，他抱着带走的记录磁带中，
还残留着少许——
最后拍摄的太阳系家人们的照片数据吧。
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Voyager.


These are memory fragments of his carefree daily life during his leisurely swing-by visit to Chaldea. A collection of photos, yet to be organized into an album.


On February 14, 1990...the space probe Voyager 1 captured a series of images of our solar system, titled the Family Portrait. Six billion kilometers from Earth, or 5.5 light-hours away, at the outer orbit of Neptune, he smiled fondly at the Sun, centered the familiar planets in his lens, and captured that moment as digital data on magnetic tape. The "Pale Blue Dot" upon which we live was included among them.


Voyager had already taken tens of thousands of photographs by the time it was in the neighborhood of the outer planets Jupiter and Saturn. With only a fraction of its storage capacity remaining, it overwrote previously transmitted images with each new picture.


However, since taking the Family Portrait, Voyager received no further instructions to photograph objects. Its camera was shut off permanently to conserve power for its other functions.


So perhaps...there's still a trace of our solar system family's data on the roll of film he carries even now.

To the queen, whose only hobby during her life was collecting Haniwa and mirrors (how rude!), there is no doubt that her Haniwa aesthetic skills are at an A+ level, which is quite an extraordinary feat heretofore unwitnessed in Japanese history. On top of that, some sort of mysterious light wave emanates from it, which makes it feel like it's healthy too!

Valentine's return gift from Saito Hajime.


It's just an ordinary bowl of shoyu ramen, but sometimes the simplest dishes are the hardest to make. ...At least, that's what Hajime the Shinsengumi ramenado says. What the heck is a Shinsengumi ramenado anyway?


Actually, I may not be the best person to point this out, but it's probably not good for a young kid like you to be slurping some ramen with the likes of me at this hour. Well, I don't mind. I'm pretty popular, you know? Hey, that look on your face says you don't believe me. Well then...er, never mind.


...Eh, I guess it's not such a bad thing to be real close with you, Master. Anyway, hope you keep on taking good care me, Master.

profile.CN:
织田信胜的赠礼。

这对姐弟虽然是继承了相同血脉的一族之人，但两者却天差地别，而且过于遥远了。至少身为弟弟的自己是这么认为的。

但距自己如此遥远的姐姐唯一夸奖自己的事，就是使用这伯劳鸟进行狩猎。

——感到非常……非常高兴。

即便对姐姐来说，那只是犹如余兴的玩笑话，也说明了自己能做一些让姐姐留意的事了。

没错，这是一无所有的自己或许能够回应你的小小证明。
profile.NA:
Gift from Oda Nobukatsu.


The siblings were indeed related by blood, but they couldn't have been further apart. The distance between them simply proved too great. That is, at least, what the younger brother thought of himself.


However, the only time his unreachable sister praised him was when he hunted using a shrike.


He couldn't have been more thrilled.


Even if his sister simply said it without thinking, even if it was a silly, offhanded comment, it still let him think there was something he could do to gain his sister's attention. This carving is tiny proof that someone who doesn't have much can still have the potential to live up to your feelings.

profile.CN:
梵高赠予的情人节巧克力。

「吃掉我吧（物理）。」「做不到。」

这是距梵高终极献身还差一步时打住的产物。
是完美结合了橄榄与可可香气的美味腌泡蔬菜。

附带一幅将负责监修的圣女大人
画入自己灵基所怀念的地中海景色中的习作。
至于稍微混入了一些疯狂要素的问题，
在降临者事件中属于常见现象。
绝对不能在意。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Van Gogh.


"Please eat me (literally)."


"Not happening."


This is the result of Van Gogh's (abortive) attempt at the ultimate self-sacrifice. It's a delicious vegetable marinade that combines the delicate aroma of olives and cacao. It is also paired with a painting study of the Mediterranean Sea which evokes a sense of nostalgia in her Spirit Origin. The study even includes the holy maiden who supervised Van Gogh while she prepared the dish. The presence of just a BIT of madness in the whole thing really shouldn't come as a surprise from a Foreigner.

mcLink: 梵高的巧克力腌泡汁（未遂）

profile.CN:
船长尼莫与尼莫系列的回礼。

大家分别拿来了自己宝贵的东西、
以及希望御主收下的东西。

船长赠送的是鹦鹉螺号的模型。
水兵们赠送的是臂章（×24）套装。
教授赠送的是同款眼镜。
烘焙坊赠送的是面包巧克力。
护士赠送的是怀表。
引擎赠送的是岩盐巧克力。

教授似乎一直努力在最后期限前尝试制作巧克力，但在最后关头改变了主意。
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Captain Nemo and the Nemo Series.


A collection of things they cherish and would like you to have.


A model of the Nautilus from Captain.

An armband set (×24) from the Marines.

A matching set of glasses from Professor.

Chocolate bread from Baker.

A pocket watch from Nurse.

And a salt rock chocolate from Engineer.


Apparently Professor tried making chocolates right up till it was time for the group to present their gifts, but they changed their mind at the last second.

profile.CN:
芦屋道满的回礼。

塞满了大量诅咒的魅惑的咒符。
眼睛的设计非常有魅力。
快点
去想办法
撕了这张
吧。

……会不会有什么隐情，实际是某种好东西？
的这种想法可千万不能有哦，
远处仿佛传来了某人这么说的声音，但又好像是错觉。
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Ashiya Douman.


An enchanting talisman absolutely overflowing with curses. The eye design makes it quite charming.


Get. Rid. Of. It. Right. The. Hell. Now. 'Kay?


Actually, maybe it's the opposite and it's actually something good... A voice in the distance tells you this is a positively dangerous line of thought...or maybe it's just your imagination.

profile.CN:
渡边纲的回礼。

纲在多位从者的指导下制作的鬼巧克力。
除了用作对御主的回礼以外，
也兼具了对那些自己差点就和对方厮杀起来的鬼表示的歉意。

虽说是味道不错，形状也很可爱的佳品，
但似乎被茨木童子误会成
「这是想要取吾等首级的预告吧！」
的意思了。
话虽如此，纲也并不在意，
他只是平静地露出了笑容。
因为能够送她礼物本身就是个奇迹。

御主品尝到的巧克力既苦涩，
又无比甜美。
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Watanabe-no-Tsuna.


Oni chocolates made by Tsuna, who learned how to make them with help from various Servants. Besides being a return gift for Master, the chocolates are also intended as an apology to the oni, as Tsuna nearly fought them to the death.


It's a superb set of chocolates, both delicious and cute...but Ibaraki-Douji misinterpreted the item as a warning of Tsuna's intent to "take our heads!" Somehow, Tsuna didn't seem to mind, and all he did in response was smile. After all, it was something of a miracle that he'd been able to give her anything in the first place.


The chocolate Master tasted was bitter, and yet still sweet to the very end.

profile.CN:
伊吹童子赠予的情人节巧克力。

甜美而入口即化，非常非常好吃的巧克力蛋糕。
这甜美、这美味、这沉重、这香醇！
简直就像恶魔的诱惑！
是充分学会了当代知识的伊吹童子大姐姐为你精心制作的佳品。

本人表示「其实很简单哦？」
「要尽情而细致地品尝哦？」
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Ibuki-Douji.


Sweet, melt-in-your mouth, delicious chocolate cake. So sugary, delicious, heavy...so delightful! It's like temptation from the devil himself! Ibuki-Douji crafted this truly superb confection after she learned about the modern custom of Valentine's Day.


"It was surprisingly easy to make," was her claim. "Make sure to eat lots, and savory every bite, okay?"

profile.CN:
弗栗多赠予的情人节巧克力。

一旦放入口中，那甘美甚至会麻痹脑髓，让全身充满幸福感，口水直流只想多吃一些的魔性美味巧克力……然而却被放在她精心制作的盒子（机关盒）内。

如果不用尽人类的智慧与力量，是绝对打不开的，可只要真诚拼命全心全意地努力，就能打开，大概吧……设定成如此精妙难度平衡的这个箱子当然是她用自己身为堰界龙的能力制作的，是不可能用蛮力从外部进行破坏的。

根据设计，不仅普通的魔术系、科学系扫描对此无效，如果想用解析系宝具等方法强行抢先获得打开方法，里面的巧克力也会立刻融化。

「咿，嘻，嘻。别想着能轻松解开。
　多让吾见识一下你垂死挣扎努力克服的样子吧。
　只要送你巧克力，就能收到回礼吧？
　吾只是想让你提前支付
　对吾来说无比甜美的那个而已哦。
　来啊，加油，加油……
　美味的巧克力就在你的眼前哦？」
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Vritra.


Take a bite of it, and its sweetness will numb you to the very core. A feeling of euphoria will sweep through your entire body. You won't be able to help but drool in hope of more. It's an absolutely demonically delicious chocolate...but it's sealed inside a mechanical (craft) box that she made herself.


This diabolical box absolutely cannot be opened without humans putting all their knowledge and strength into the task. But if they devote all they have to opening it, it should yield to their efforts...maybe. This seemingly impossible yet attainable difficulty was achieved through her ability as a dragon who creates obstructions for humanity. Any attempts to simply break the box open will fail.


Magecraft and science prove useful for opening or examining it. Attempting to use a Noble Phantasm to analyze it and brute force the solution to opening it will cause the chocolates inside to melt.


"Ki...hee...hee. No shortcuts. Come on, let me watch your pathetic struggling as you try to overcome my trials. If I give you chocolates, I'm owed a return gift from you, right? Well, the sweet sight of you suffering is a perfect gift from you to me. Come on now, think! Go for it. Those delicious chocolates are just inside."

profile.CN:
圣诞迦尔纳的情人节回礼。

参考拳头的造型制作出来的闪耀着黄金光辉的冠军奖杯。
不是某个拳击协会性质的团体制作的东西，而是迦尔纳用自己黄金铠甲的一部分亲自制作的。
也就是说——

这男人又做了一次！

虽然没有醒目的功能，但毕竟材质放在那里，
也可以说拥有宝具级的价值。

……话说，这个送给我真的不要紧吗？（第二次。）

「当然。这是冠军的奖杯。
　通过赠送与持有所展现出的
『获胜』的证明才是有价值的。
　可以认为奖杯本身的价值并不重要。
　很抱歉材质用的是我用过的旧东西，
　但还请麻烦您谅解一下。」

不，不是这个问题。
profile.NA:
Valentine's return gift from Santa Karna.


A shiny golden champion's trophy made in the shape of a fist. Obviously it's not made by some boxing association, but by Karna himself, using some of his golden armament. Which means...


He did it! Again!


It may not have any particular functions, but it is likely valuable on a Noble Phantasm level, given the material it's made from.


...Are you sure it's okay to give this way? (Second attempted question)


"Of course. This is a champion's trophy. Its true worth is in the act of presenting it to someone as proof of their victory. I apologize the materials are secondhand, but I hope you don't mind too much."


Uh, that's not the issue here.

profile.CN:
千子村正的回礼。

寒冬的实用道具，村正亲手制作的火盆。
虽然本人说「关键是年糕，快吃吧」，
但这的确是倾注了精力与工夫的杰作。

火盆上的祈愿文字是『无病无灾』。
表示这才是最重要的心里话都暴露无遗了。
profile.NA:
Return gift from Senji Muramasa.


A hibachi—a Japanese brazier—made by Senji Muramasa, which is sure to be handy during cold winter days. Muramasa claims "the mochi's the intended gift, so hurry up and eat it," but they are both precious gifts with a great deal of thought and effort put into them. The inscription on the hibachi says "Be of sound health." It's as if he's trying to say that that's the most important thing to be.

profile.CN:
平景清的赠礼。

是身为景清的赠礼？
是作为义经的赠礼？

绞尽脑汁商量之后，决定以源平双方为题材，
于是做出了这样的成果。
原来如此，源平双方！
那就不客气地收下吧。
profile.NA:
Gift from Taira-no-Kagekiyo.


Is it a gift from Kagekiyo? Or is it a gift from Yoshitsune?


After an exhaustive discussion and a great deal of agonizing, she came to the conclusion that it might as well be a gift which incorporates both the Genji and Heike motifs...which is how she ended up with this. Ah, both the Genji and Heike...a GenPei motif! Let's enjoy it.

profile.CN:
鬼一法眼赠予的情人节巧克力。

打开后吓了一跳，是天狗的面具！
……实际并不是，这是天狗面具形状的巧克力！
简直就像精雕细琢的木雕天狗面具。
尺寸也是人可以佩戴的大小。

「你可以戴上哦？」鬼一师傅虽然这么说，
但真的有必要吗？
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Kiichi Hogen.


There's a surprise inside! It's a Tengu's mask! Or so it seemed! But it's actually a tengu mask-shaped chocolate! It really does look like a tengu mask carved expertly from wood. And it's perfectly sized to fit a person's face.


Teacher Kiichi says, "You're welcome to wear it."


But, for so many reasons, would that really be okay to do?

mcLink: 打开吓一跳天狗巧克力

profile.CN:
卡莲·C·奥尔黛西亚赠予的情人节巧克力。

堆积如山耸入云霄的威化。
不由分说显现而出的无偿无限之爱。
犹如堆放在巨大银行金库中的一捆捆纸币。
或是射击游戏的最终关卡。

你可以选择不断吃同一种口味的威化，
也可以装作没看到转身离去。

无偿之爱的中心只有一件有偿之爱，
正在兴奋地等待被拿起的那一刻。
profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Caren C. Hortensia.


The pile of wafers seems to reach all the way to the heavens. Unconditional, infinite love manifests wherever it pleases, not at all unlike a hoard of cash in a huge bank vault...or the boss stage of a shoot 'em up, if you prefer.


Such is the flavor of these wafers. You can continue to snack on them, or leave and pretend you never saw anything.


At the heart of unconditional love lies a snippet of selfish love, waiting anxiously to be plucked.

profile.CN:
玛修的情人节赠礼。

鲜艳而温暖配色的草莓生奶酪蛋糕。
充满春天气息的装饰表达了玛修直率的心情。

无论是品尝，还是观赏，都能感到幸福。
芙芙也对成品感到非常满意。

话虽如此。御主也不禁感慨，玛修制作蛋糕的水平是不是提升得太快了。
profile.NA:
Valentine's gift from Mash.


This no-bake strawberry cheesecake is adorned with warm and charming colors. It evokes an image of springtime, and represents Mash's sincere feelings. Meant to please not only the tongue but the eye as well, even Fou can appreciate the skill that went into making it.


That said, you can't help but wonder if she's gotten too good at baking cakes.

profile.CN:
具有传统的魔术师家系。
身怀的才华与「宝石」级魔眼。
双亲的期待与家族的宿痾。
都是笼罩着我这世界的灰色。

浑身湿透，失去热量的身体里萌生的情感，
除了黯然以外还能有什么呢。

除了像被沉重的雨滴压到垂头丧气的花朵般俯首以外，
我究竟还能做什么呢。

向绝不可能触碰到的天空伸手，
是毫无意义的——
我曾经，这样认为。

可是，曾有位英雄在天空架起了美丽的彩虹。
可是，曾有位英雄击退了自天空而来的灾厄。

——曾有位人物独自一人向着天空尽头的世界前进。

这里，曾有几个人面带笑容说过，
只要穿过厚重的乌云，一定能看到明亮的世界。
profile.NA:
I come from an old and storied family of mages. I possess talent as well as a Jewel-ranked Mystic Eye. I carry the burden of my parents' expectation as well as a my family's cancerous ambition. Everything is ash-grey in my world.


What other than oppressive sadness could take root in those who were robbed of warmth, who have only ever experienced the crushing weight of expectation forced onto them? What choice do I have other than to let my head slump forward like a flower overflowing with rainwater?


Reaching for the intangible sky is pointless...at least that what I thought.


But I saw a hero who painted the sky with a beautiful rainbow. He swept disaster from the sky. He reached for something beyond even the stars with no more than his own strength.


If someone can push through the heavy rain clouds, a brighter world awaits. I learned people like that do exist, and they do it all with a smile on their faces.

profile.CN:
在某条商店街的咖啡店中，
摆满了应季的花朵。

餐点可谓极品但营业时间不定期，
所以造访前提前确认过了。

「欢迎光临，小妹妹。
　我们店里的甜点可是特别定做的哦。
　可以算是店长的爱好？
　有什么要求基本都能满足，
　想点什么就点什么吧！」
profile.NA:
Rumor has it that a café in a certain shopping center is always filled with seasonal flowers.


Their food is quite exquisite, yet their business hours are irregular, so it's best to check whether the café is open before visiting.


 "Welcome, milady. You'll be pleasantly surprised to know that all our desserts here are custom made. Guess it's the manager's idea.

Even most outlandish requests can be fulfilled, so ask for whatever you like!"

profile.CN:
「呼哈哈哈哈我应该恭喜各位吧！
　你们现在坐上了有史以来世上最优秀的船！」

阿耳戈船英雄俱乐部。
此处乃邀请来宾踏上『极致之旅』的公馆。
将令人眼花缭乱的刺激体验，赠与你。

顺便一提，原本被视作No.1的高大英雄谢绝了参加，
而另一位魁梧的英雄也遭到了月之女神的整顿。
profile.NA:
"Hahahaha! I guess congratulations are in order! You stand aboard the world's greatest ship!"


Club Argonauts.

Here, guests are invited and taken on "the greatest journey" that offers a dazzling, stimulating experience.


By the way, the giant hero who was expected to be the club's most popular host declined to participate, while the other large crew member was browbeaten into silence by the moon goddess.

profile.CN:
「所谓的事件之影看来并未从我的命运中消失呢。」

欧洲各地发生了连续怪盗事件。
名侦探爱德蒙与假扮成警卫的沿海国家特别搜查官一起追查这起事件。
然而自称怪盗的犯人就像是嘲笑侦探爱德蒙的搜查网一般，华丽地穿过了封锁。

侦探的脑海中顿时浮现出曾在远东感受过的那种厌恶感。本应消失在海中的男人身影。

——怪盗的真面目究竟是谁？
profile.NA:
"It seems to just be fate that I am surrounded by mysteries in need of solving."


Europe has recently been plagued with a series of phantom thief incidents. Alongside a pair of foreign special investigators disguised as security guards, the great detective Edmond is on the case. However, the culprit claiming to be the phantom thief deftly slips through Detective Edmond's dragnet, as if mocking him.


The detective is reminded of an abhorrent sensation he once experienced in the Far East...the image of a man who should have disappeared at the bottom of the sea...


...Who could this phantom thief possibly be?

mcLink: 侦探爱德蒙～复苏的噩梦篇～

profile.CN:
在冰上熠熠生辉地起舞。
伴随着悠扬旋律的滑行也充满了激情。

「来，我们一起滑吧。
　光看不参与也太可惜了——」

冰面上的护卫也是骑士的修养。

「崔斯坦卿？　你是不是在边滑边睡？」
「只是看起来如此而已……
　如你所见，我作为冰上天鹅……
　呼噜……」
profile.NA:
Radiant lights dance, and the music promotes them to skate energetically along the ice.


"Come, join us. It'd be a shame for you to just watch."


Escorting guests on the skating rink is just another knightly duty.


"Sir Tristan? Are you by chance skating while you're asleep?"

"It may appear that way, but allow me to explain... As you can see, as a swan over the ice... (Zzzzzz)"

profile.CN:
「需知晓魔性所为，方可斩杀魔性……
　原来如此，这样确实不赖。」
「当代也有这种服装啊……真怀念。」
「受不了。为什么是我穿鬼的服装啦……」

在迦勒底部分狂热要求下得以实现的怪异组。
另外，副长似乎是被一番队队长用腌萝卜做筹码不情不愿地加入的。
profile.NA:
"Know the demon's ways to annihilate demons... I see, that's not a bad idea."

"I didn't expect an outfit like that to exist in this age... Brings back memories."

"Seriously? I'm in the oni get-up?"


A peculiar trio that was formed in at by the demand of a particular passionate group of people in Chaldea. As a side note, First Unit Captain bribed Vice Commander into participating with takuan pickles.

profile.CN:
在足球实力代表了一切的世界。
在这个世界中，在本应开辟新时代道路的少年们的面前，突然出现了一名身着危险服饰的谜之男子。

「我还没软弱到这种程度的风浪都突破不了。」
「对不起。我，会挡住你哦。」
「除了姐姐大人以外，没有人可以居高临下的俯视！」

仿佛为嘲笑人类之“强大”而布下的众多策略，以及与被派来的刺客（种子选手）们之间发生的较量。
少年们是否能继续挺进呢！

「唔唔唔唔唔！　哎呀这还真有意思……
  区区人类难道——
  难道还能超越吾之企图吗？」

迸发的无数必杀巴比伦射门、
喷射宇宙飞行重力助推盘球、
如本能寺般熊熊燃烧的自爆场地、
以及进行谜之干扰的邪神们。
就算将这称作世纪末也毫不为过。



当观众们为之沸腾的同时也会突然这么想。
「这已经不是什么足球了吧？」
profile.NA:
Skill at soccer is everything in this world. One day, a mysterious man who is literally shrouded in menace suddenly appears before a group of boys who are supposed to pave the road to a new era.


"I'm not so weak as to be tossed around by that heavy tide...I can charge through."

"Sorry. I'll try to stop them."

"The only person who should be looking down on us from above is Sister!"


This match will see myriad schemes and tricks intended to undermine the strengths of humans go up against the numerous assassins (seeds) sent out to defeat them. Can the boys win!?


"Mmmmmm! How very amusing... How could mere humans possibly...overcome my schemes!?"


Numerous deadly Babylon Shots crisscross the field, there's Jet Space Swing-by dribbling, the field erupts in flames like Honnoji, and mysterious evil gods are summoned to cause chaos... It is an apocalyptic scene.


The audience, while excited at this match, wonders: "They're playing soccer, right?"

profile.CN:
「来吧，今天也来迎接我那可爱的罗马的孩子们吧！」

以身为人类之躯到达神之领域的校长为顶点的这所学舍，是以喀戎教室为首，拥有众多优秀学生的名校。
当然，负责教学的也都是一群新锐的教师们。

「话说，三校联合交流会的准备进行得怎么样了？　
　安徒生老师？」
「那位太阳的学生会长姑且不论，黑色长发的学生代表完全不遵守期限。
　再加上那吊儿郎当的服装，看来那家伙完全没有除文艺作家以外
　所有人都必须严格遵守截稿期这一社会常识呢。」
「（这家伙只把自己当做例外处理了啊……）」
profile.NA:
"Come, let us begin our day by welcoming our beloved children of Rome!"


This prestigious school is led by its dean, a human who has ascended to the realm of godhood. The academy's students are a match in brilliance to those we have already seen in Chiron's classroom. The faculty is therefore as spirited and capable as one might expect when dealing with students of this caliber.


 "By the way, how are the preparations for the tri-school party getting along, Mr. Andersen?"

"The sunny student council president is one thing, but that student representative with the long black hair can't stick to a schedule or follow the dress code, and doesn't even know that everyone except for authors must keep to their deadlines!"

"(He excluded himself...)"

profile.CN:
「我听说是射击对战游戏，过来一看……
　多么令人愉快的景象啊！　御主。」
「有破绽！　用远程道具的话我是不会输的哦。」
「稍微等一下！　这个还挺难的！」

色彩缤纷水花喷溅。飞溅迸发覆盖……
这样的日子也未尝不可。
于晴朗春日的短暂休息。
profile.NA:
"I came when I heard there was some kind of shooting game...and what I found here amuses me quite a lot, Master!"

"You're wide open! I'll never lose in a shooting contest!"

"Hold on a minute! This is harder than it looks!"


Splashes of color. Try to repel them, pop them, and paint them... Sometimes having a brief respite like this on a sunny spring day is nice.

profile.CN:
我对财富毫无兴趣。
名声不过是做学问的维生手段罢了。

「创造出那男人永远无法实现的能源。
　这对我来说才是极致的报酬！」

两位天才不断挑战。
哪怕这是一条永无止尽的苦难之路。

「假如这不是出于爱好，而是关系到民生，
　那出手相助自然是朕的责任。」



「话说，可以交给我来独占销售吧？」
profile.NA:
They have no interest in wealth. Praise is simply fodder for those literary folks.


"My ultimate goal, and indeed my reward, will be to create energy THAT MAN will never achieve!"


Two geniuses continue to tackle their challenge, even if their journey may be a never-ending series of tribulations.


"If such a creation is not merely meant for idle pleasure, but the bettering of one's people, then it is our duty to lend you aid."


"By the way, I have exclusive distribution rights for it, right!?"

profile.CN:
不用多说了，完全不需要犹豫！

心中装满了期待与好奇心，
来吧，让我们一同前往充满了幻想的美妙街道吧。
profile.NA:
Obviously this isn't the place to be indecisive!

Fill your heart with anticipation and curiosity, and head out into the city that's full of fantasy and wonder!

profile.CN:
物品的价值与意义会随着持有者而变化。
被一句话断言为“垃圾”的物品
也包含着无限的可能性。

因此，被有些人使用时，也会存在邪恶的运用方法……

「拜托教授准备的东西？
　当然，只是为满足我们学术热情的
　渺小而微不足道的东西！　嗯嗯当然啦！」

是真的吗？
profile.NA:
An item's value and significance changes depending on the individual who takes hold of the item. Even things that are unceremoniously called junk by someone can have endless potential to others.


Therefore, depending on who uses the item, it can also be used for evil purposes...


"The item that the Professor brought to us? Why obviously, it is a trivial and insignificant object simply to satisfy our academic ambitions! Yes, that's all there is to it!"


...Are you sure about that?

profile.CN:
让料理变得美味的要素，
是顶级的食材？　厨师的实力？

不不，也不能忘了在大堂里努力的服务生提供的服务。

光靠这些就能让心灵获得满足。

「巨大肉包子豆瓣酱·干碟
　大增量♡让您久等了。
　趁热吃吧。」
profile.NA:
What makes a meal delicious? Is it superb ingredients? A chef's skill?


No. You mustn't forget that it's the services of the hard-working wait staff that makes the meal. Their actions alone can sate one's heart.


"Here's your meat bun with extra doubanjiang spicy sauce♡ Eat it while it's hot!"

profile.CN:
美丽的身姿无比凶猛，
这份妖冶神圣之美令见者不仅屏息。

然而无论多么想将溢出的念想化为红色丝线，
也无法将此物之心束缚在自己身上。

哪怕头发比缎子更为光泽鲜艳，
哪怕眼瞳比玻璃更为闪闪发光，
哪怕嘴唇比樱花更为惹人怜爱，她也绝不是——

沉默不语的人偶。

「这个问题暂且不提，
　这身打扮也太羞耻了吧！」
「非常适合您，没有问题。」
「这……这样吗……」
profile.NA:
Her beautiful appearance can make one quiver, and her bewitching and divine beauty can take one's breath away.


Yet, you would never be able to tug at her heartstrings and make her your own, no matter how much you try to turn your overwhelming feelings into something tangible and make her your own...


Her hair is more lustrous than satin, her eyes more dazzling than crystal, her lips lovelier than cherry blossoms. Yet she will never yield...


...Because she is not some mute doll.


"That aside, this outfit is quite embarrassing!"

"It really suits you. I see no problem with this."

"I-if you say so..."

profile.CN:
缓和温暖的海风。
乘着海风来访的鸟儿们的鸣啭。
被赐予了丰饶恩惠的大地，枝叶摇曳的翠绿树木。
在起起落落的海浪推送下，海岸边的白色浪花美丽地起舞。

总是透过工作室的窗口看着这些。
而这一切，都在温柔雕刻声的包裹之下。

突然，心生疑问。

这段记忆中的自己，是人吗。
还是雕像呢？

不管哪种都无妨。
因为无论如何，自己的所有幸福都在那里。
总是被温暖、令人安心、令人满足的某种存在所包围。

那就是他的爱。
同时——也一定是守护我们的美丽女神的目光。

现在仍未失去这种感觉。
正因为如此，只要闭上眼睛就能回忆起。

塞浦路斯的记忆无比美丽。
即便此时此刻，也在活在自己的身体中。
profile.NA:
A calm and warm sea breeze, carrying birdsong.

A blessed land full of rich bounty, where the lush trees rustle their leaves.

The waves swell and break, and the watery foam makes beautiful dance.


I always gazed upon such things from the workshop.

And the gentle sound of the chisel enveloped it all.


I am suddenly struck pondering:


Was that memory from when I was human? Or when I was a statue?


It didn't matter.

Because either way, I was constantly happy. My surroundings were always warm, secure, and satisfying.


It was his love.

Blessed with the beautiful goddess's kind gaze that likely watched over us at all times.


And I have not forgotten that feeling. I can still picture the scene even with my eyes closed.


My memories in Cyprus will ever retain their beauty and live within my heart to this day.

profile.CN:
花朵在蓝天下飞舞。

其身姿如暖阳般美丽，
其嗓音如清风般通透。

女神的祝福遍及世界。
愿大家都能幸福——
profile.NA:
Flowers dance in the blue sky.


They are as beautiful as the warm sunshine, and their voices echo like the invigorating wind.


May the goddesses bless the world far and wide.

Wishing you all the happiness...

profile.CN:
无论是月亮的光华还是星辰的闪烁，
都敌不过眉清目秀的青年的歌声。

在圣雄的加护与博士恶作剧的点缀之下，
这份光辉能闪耀至天明……
profile.NA:
Even the moon's glitter and the twinkling stars are no match for the singing voices of the handsome young men.


Colored with the saintly hero's blessing and the mischief of the doctor, may their radiance last until dawn...

profile.CN:
卡美洛事务所，
备受期待的新人，波门！！

在天界请来的特殊讲师的指导下，
每天勤奋练习舞蹈。

虽然制作人有些可怕，
但我可不能输给妹妹……！
profile.NA:
Presenting Beaumains, Camelot Productions' most anticipated newcomer!


Under the instruction of the special teacher called from the heavens, she spends her days practicing her dance.


The producer may be a little scary, but there is no way she will lose to her younger sister!

profile.CN:
正如剑术也需要锻炼一样，
唱歌也必须训练！

女王亲自的指导虽然很严格，
这也是成为破晓之花……！

喂，那边的龙之魔女小姐！！
你也要提起干劲来才行哦！？
profile.NA:
Just like how forging is necessary for swords, one must also train for singing!


The Queen's guidance may be tough, but this is all to become the flower of dawn!


Hey, Dragon Witch over there! Show a little more enthusiasm, why don't you!?

profile.CN:
我买了素描本。
是喜欢的厂家推出的新作。
封面的手感摸起来非常舒服。
来，期待吧。
在干净的白纸上画出我的灵感吧。
拿起笔——

……啊。
突然想到一个好主意。
但是，该怎么办呢。
开始有些激动。

万一被拒绝该怎么办？
万一做的不好该怎么办？
万一……。
不！
我受够了对未来的恐惧。
肯定，肯定没问题。
因为你，是给了我希望的人！

走出了工作室，找到了你的背影。
优雅地打招呼，问候。
然后，我会这么说来发出邀请。

「愿不愿意和我一起制作美丽的裙子呢？」
profile.NA:
I bought a sketchbook. It's the newest merch from my favorite brand. The cover's texture is wonderful. Ah, I cannot wait to use it. I am going to draw all my inspiration on this beautiful white paper by taking my pen―Oh! I just had a great idea. But, oh my...what should I do? I'm starting to get nervous.


What if they refuse? What if it doesn't turn out well? What if... Non! I've had enough of fearing the future. I'm sure it will be all right. After all, you are the very person who has given me hope!


I will step out of my atelier to find you. I will call out and greet you. And then I will say this:


"Would you like to create a wonderful dress together?"

profile.CN:
音之粒子　旋转律动
浮上心头　淡淡念想
拨动琴弦提出疑问
闪烁的星辰　在我的银河中
来回穿梭
寂寞的远地点与近地点
但愿明日能继续加速
送到你的面前——
profile.NA: The sound's elementary particles rise up and swell. Delicate thoughts float in the air. I listen to myself as I play the melody. My thoughts flit back and forth among the twinkling stars...in my galaxy. The apogee and perigee of loneliness. I hope the sound of my song will speed up even more tomorrow...so that it can reach you...

profile.CN:
帷幕落下，跳出故事之外，
在通往庆祝宴会的道路上优雅地前行。

正因为是那样的一刻，
被牵着手，携手共进，
作为礼数是不得已的事情。

微微露出笑容，也是没办法的事情。
profile.NA: The moment the curtain drops, we leap out of our story to walk a long path leading us to a great banquet. It's only natural to take each other's hands to show off our sophistication for the occasion...just as it is inevitable for a faint smile to flit across one's face.

profile.CN:
交杯祝酒，谈笑风生。

诉说着漫长的旅行，
弹奏着曾经的回忆，
为了将交错过、断绝过、紧紧纠缠在一起的牵绊理开。

一边润着喉咙，一边悠闲地消磨时间吧。
profile.NA:
We raise our glasses for a toast and exchange pleasantries.


We speak of our long journey, allude to memories of past, and any differences that may have separated us slowly fade.


We will take our time as we slake our thirst.

profile.CN:
尽大义者卸下了他们肩上的重担。
为那场宴席而送上的花束，
必须要格外豪华才行。
否则，就不能锦上添“华”了。

因为这个故事的主演和配角，所有的人，
无一不是绽放出无限光辉的一等星——
profile.NA: The burdens that weighed heavily upon these two, who achieved such great things, have been lifted. The bouquets they carry for the banquet will need to be especially magnificent. Otherwise, the blooms will wither in the face of their greatness. After all, everyone, from the leading players to the smallest of supporting characters, is a star of such magnitude as to fill the story with their radiance...

profile.CN:
没有过多交谈。
也并没有那个必要。

因为在交错的视线中，
已然包含了无数慰劳辛苦的话语。
profile.NA: There is not much say, nor is there much need to do so. Gratitude for all the work each has done is conveyed in the glances they exchange.

profile.CN:
随着从者的增加，
迦勒底陷入了严重的资源不足状态。
为摆脱这种窘境而下达的最残酷指定乃是……

一起庆祝吧！
庆祝奇迹的嘉年华！
profile.NA:
As more and more Servants join Chaldea, maintaining resources for so many is becoming a problem. And so, a cruel order has been given...


Let's celebrate the miracle Carnival together!

profile.CN:
自己前行的方向始终都是漆黑一片。

身为魔术师的才华普普通通，出身也十分平凡，
好不容易找到的可以充分运用高御主适性的机会，
却在棺椁中消失于虚空。

剩下的只有，
本可以做到什么却未能实现的后悔。

即便如此，那个世界的夜晚依然有光。
不像阳光那么强烈，也不像月光那么柔和，
犹如夜晚降下的雪那样，散发着幽幽的光芒。

所以，必须活下去。
毅然起立，不能屈服，无论倒下多少次，都要站起身。
即便怀着无数的后悔，也要面向前方。

因为在那已然不存在了的世界中，
对于如雪花般消失的她来说，
我卡多克·泽姆露普斯，
是她唯一的御主。
profile.NA:
Every path I took led me to a darkness as dead as night.

My talents as a mage were average, my family lineage ordinary, and my opportunity to capitalize on my aptitude as a Master fell into the void from within a coffin. All that remains is regret, the thought that I could have made something out of myself.


Yet in that world, there was light even at night. It wasn't as strong as the sun, but not as gentle as the moon. It was a ghostly light, placid like snow falling at night.


I have to live.

I need to put myself together, refuse to falter any further, and take a stand as many times as is necessary. I must keep moving forward, even if countless regrets drag me down.


For the girl who disappeared like a snowy blossom, for she who came from a world that no longer exists...

I am her one and only Master.

Kadoc Zemlupus.

profile.CN:
这是不会存在于正确道路上的
空想可能性。

将刀刃插在烟灰飞舞大地之上的，
是无法屈服也无法挫败的
化作心之剑（铁）的正义身姿。
profile.NA:
It is a fantastical possibility which would never exist on the proper path.

A figure of justice stakes a blade in the soot-covered earth, his iron heart of swords never bent or broken.

profile.CN:
利用代代相传的特性，
耗费漫长的时间编织而成的宝贵结晶。

其中若有与少女年岁相仿之物，
甚至能用来释放大魔术。

从那凝缩了神秘的宝石中释放而出的光辉，
酷似她内心之强大，
高尚，且美丽。
profile.NA:
They are the crystallization of jewels crafted over many years, using special traits inherited over generations.


In particular, the gemstones as old as the girl herself can be used to enact grand magecraft.


These gemstones of compressed Mystics shed radiance both beautiful and noble, not unlike her own heart.

profile.CN:
无论想逃到多远，
也无法与之分离。

无论怎样模仿人的举止，
回头望去，都会发现其孤身
从空荡荡的水缸中悄然而来。
profile.NA:
No matter how far she ran, it was always near.


No matter how human she tried to act,

when she looked back, it would be creeping up on her,

submerged in an empty aquarium.

profile.CN:
诞生的理由——是为了消失。

比喻来说，
就像落在树梢上的积雪终将被阳光融化，
回归土地一般。

那是早已注定的。
本就是作为这种存在被制造出来的。

但即便如此，她仍然祈愿。
愿所爱之人获得胜利。
并坚信，这才是作为人类活过的证明。
profile.NA:
She was born...to disappear.


It was as natural and obvious a fate

as treetop snow returning to the

earth after the sunshine melts it.


Her end was decided long ago.

It is what she was made for.


And yet, she wishes...

For the victory of her beloved,

believing that to be the proof she was born as a human.

unknownCharacters: 爱丽丝菲尔·冯·爱因兹贝伦

profile.CN:
无论是头脑、容姿，还是家境，
这类令人艳羡的东西他都拥有。

但唯独缺少一件。
唯独缺少魔术的才能。

他比任何人都清楚。
无论多么渴望，
如何勤奋钻研，
也有绝对得不到的东西。
profile.NA:
He possessed that which others envied...

Intellect, beauty, heritage.


Magical aptitude was all he lacked.


He knew that better than anyone.

No matter how badly he craved it,

no matter how hard he tried to cultivate it,

it was something he would never attain.

profile.CN:
这是湖中妖精赐予的，
无比尊贵、闪耀的存在。

这是只有诞生于星之内海，
漂流到地表的妖精才会获得的，
创造世界的大母之证。
只要服从乐园的使命，
就迟早能化作星之魂的精灵抵达之处。

——但是。
她说这并非自己的愿望，
因此抛弃了被允诺的荣耀。

治愈同伴的杖变成了打倒敌人的枪。
与生俱来的眼中之光在战斗中失去了。
在漫长旅途的最后，失去了很多东西。

取而代之换来的，则是白垩之宝座。
是她不断祈愿的不列颠的故事。

……但是，现在仍会想起。
在止境之国受人喜爱的日子。
是被丢弃在温柔石之宝座上的，逝去之梦的代价。
profile.NA:
The faerie of the lake was granted something more precious and brilliant than any other.


It was granted only to her, born in the Inner Sea of the Planet and dispatched to the surface:

The proof of the great mother who creates the world.

As long as she obeyed her mission from Paradise, she would eventually reach the terminus of all Elementals, as a soul of the planet.


However...

She discarded that promised glory, for it was not her own wish.


Her staff of healing became a spear to strike down her foes.

The light in her eyes that she was born with faded in battle.

By the end of her long journey, she had lost a great many things.


In exchange, she gained a stark white throne.

This was the tale of Britain that she desired.


And yet, she still remembers...

The days when she was loved at the World's End.

The gentle price of a dream she left behind at that stone throne.

profile.CN:
这是黑犬公不为人知的爱好。
从休息日的午后起，花费充足的时间，
烹饪拿手的菜肴与尝试新菜肴。

「毕竟有伴侣，做这些不是很正常嘛。
　……只不过，
　我不会强迫你做相同的事。
　因为这是我出于爱好心甘情愿做的。」

说着这些话的黑犬公脸上露出了心满意足的微笑。
仿佛只要重要的人能来厨房看一下情况……
就足够幸福的样子。

这就是所谓的爱妻料理。
不过对人类来说，尺寸或许有些太大了？
profile.NA:
It was the Black Dog's secret hobby.

On her days of rest, she would spend afternoons and evenings working on the menu she was proud of, as well as inventing new dishes.


"I will have a companion, so it is only natural.

Though...

I won't compel you to do the same.

I do this simply because I enjoy it."


The Black Dog spoke with a satisfied smile that said much of the happiness she took from her loved one witnessing her work.


In other words, this was a meal cooked by a loving wife.

Although, it might be a bit much for a human to finish.

profile.CN:
「衣服、房子、料理什么的。
　这些我还是知道的。嗯，我知道。
　因为即便是妖精，也是会做这些事的。
　但连脚上穿的东西也会花工夫钻研什么的，我受不了了。
　真的受不了，意识都要飞走了。
　因为那是脚哦？　是脚后跟哦？
　是要彻底打扮最敏感的部位哦？
　大胆、华丽、妖艳、优雅。
　虽然听说泛人类史已经没有魔法了，
　但这看法实在是有眼无珠。毕竟即便是妖精国，
　也拜见不到这么多魔法鞋啊。
　用来看、用来穿、用来装饰虽然都很棒，
　但我的梦想当然还是自己做一双。
　一点一点提升技术接近一流。
　你觉得要做出理想的鞋子需要花费多少年？
　1年？　还是10年？
　若是我能够活到梦想成真的那一刻，
　届时，你愿意收下一双作为纪念吗？」
profile.NA:
"Clothes, houses, cooking...

I know that much. Yes, I do.

Even faeries can make those on their own.

But putting that much work into things you wear on your feet? No way.

I can't even. It drives me crazy.

They're your feet, you know? Your heels.

You decorate the most sensitive part however you like?

So bold! Gorgeous! Bewitching! Elegant!

I've heard that magic doesn't exist in Proper Human History anymore, but you don't know how good you've got it.

You'd never find so many magical shoes anywhere in Faerie Britain.

I like admiring, wearing, and decorating them, but my dream is really to design my own pair of shoes.

I'll practice and improve, little by little, until I'm a first-class creator.

How long do you think it'll take to make my ideal pair of shoes?

One year? Ten?

If I live that long, will you give me a pair to celebrate the occasion?"

profile.CN:
无论存在方式多么丑陋，
无论生存方式多么危险，
也不会改变那天见到的价值。

比46亿年的记忆更为炫目的反复无常的奇迹。
在下／我见证的地表最为美丽的存在。

即便躯体崩溃，心灵粉碎，
这份憧憬也不会消失。

美丽的极光（欧若拉）。
闪耀星辰的容颜。
永恒不变的爱，在此。
profile.NA:
No matter how cruel your existence,

no matter how harmful your way of life,

that day will never be any less precious to me.


It was a miracle that happened on a pure whim, brighter than 460 million years of memories.

The moment that I saw the most beautiful thing on earth.


Though this body may crumble and this heart may shatter,

my yearning will never fade.


Oh, beautiful Aurora.

Your face is like a shining star.

My love for you is everlasting.

profile.CN:
这把圣枪，
原本应该被存放在合适的场所。
即便自己是身负光荣的圆桌骑士一席之身，
这也不是一介骑士该拥有的东西。

但是人理……
选中这把圣枪——
选中朗基努斯作为我的宝具。
或许迫近的危机已经巨大到如此程度了吧。

既然如此，那我就该回应。
携起圣枪，屹立于战场的最前线。
——御主，与您一起。
profile.NA:
This spear has always had an intended resting place.

No matter how glorious its wielder, be he even a member of the Round Table, it was never meant for a knight's hands.


But humanity...decided that the sacred lance—Longinus—should be my Noble Phantasm. Perhaps it speaks to the enormity of the threat we face.


In that case, I shall answer.

Let me stand at the front of the battlefield, spear in hand.

Let me stand at your side, Master.

profile.CN:
完成了七个特异点的战斗，
人理续存保障机构·迦勒底
终于到达了圣杯探索（冠位指定）的最终地点——
终局特异点，冠位时间神殿所罗门。

打倒一切的元凶魔神王所罗门，
夺回未来。
即将面对这一时刻的一行人
分别经历了各自的时间。

赌上迄今为止的众多邂逅，
以及众多未来，
藤丸与玛修终于要开始最后的作战了……
profile.NA:
After battling their way through all seven Singularities, the Chaldea Security Organization has finally arrived at the endpoint of the Grand Order: The Final Singularity, Grand Temple of Time: Solomon.


Now is the time to defeat the root of all evil, Solomon, the King of Mages. Now is the time to reclaim the future.

And with the final operation looming large, everyone prepares in their own special way.


All their many encounters have led to this moment as Fujimaru and Mash at last embark on their final operation...

欧洲魔术世界的权威，
时钟塔的创立者之一。

profile.NA:
The man who achieved the Second Magic, one of the pinnacles of the world of magecraft. He is a leading figure in European mage society, and a founder of the Clock Tower.


He is an observer who awaits the "final answer," while traversing numerous futures and parallel worlds.

Let's all celebrate this wonderful day to be remembered...

profile.CN:
（不知不觉）出现在新·迦勒底的伟大图书馆。
无论建立经过如何，其作为知识的宝库都是无可挑剔的，古今东西各种邂逅都在这里等待着。

每当翻过一页，跨越时光的情感都会令你心满意足吧。
profile.NA:
A giant library that exists, unnoticed, within Novum Chaldea. Regardless of the circumstances of its creation, it is a virtually comprehensive trove of wisdom. All manner of encounters await a curious reader.


Every turn of a page is sure to enrich you with memories surpassing time.

profile.CN:
尽情游玩之后，
