profile.NA:
After a hard day's play, be sure to partake in the seaside chef's specialty.


Today's special sandwich is... Hey, paws off, you little critter! You shouldn't grab it before it's even plated!

unknownCharacters: 希翁·艾尔特纳姆·索卡里斯

profile.CN:
「创办NFF服务的原因？
　……这么说来，我还没告诉过你吧。
　这虽然是兼顾了兴趣与利益的创业，
　但并不是为了……
　折磨各位人类而设立的。
　我高扬斯卡娅有个梦想。」

这是对她唯一尊敬的某个人类献上的敬意。
人类首个发明了写真杂志、
在巨大的市场首次开创了服饰商标权的人物。
创办了具有个性意义的杂志，成为了媒体的宠儿，
备受社会的批判，却为人种歧视而奋战之人。

「高傲、能干、完美主义。
　无论在工作上还是在私生活上都精力充沛的风云人物。
　在被称作娱乐的事业上获得全面成功的他，
　唯一没能实现的大事业——
　那就是建设度假区。
　我就是为这种未竟之事感到遗憾，
　才创立了NFF服务。」

身穿发牌员服装的妖艳美女如是说。
凭自己的权能，创造都市轻而易举。
但是，这样是没有意义的。
供人类享乐的都市，
就该在人类的系统中建立才行。
成功与破产都是硬币的两面。
为了细细品尝这种悲喜，
建立了全行星最大的赌场度假区。
看上去完全是个蝴蝶结的高楼大厦，
就是建立于度假区中心的灵魂地标。

「只不过，还请您不要误会。
　各位人类的欲望，
　也只配用来装饰我的头发罢了。
　一旦我用腻了，就会轻易摘下扔进海里。
　请千万不要误以为——
　自己被我所爱哦？」
profile.NA:
"You want to know why I started NFF Services? ...I never did tell you, did I? Yes, I did it for fun and profit, but it was also a way to torment humankind... Or so you'd think, but that isn't why. You see, I have a dream."


It was a gesture to honor the one human she respects: the man who created a landmark magazine of the sexual revolution,

who fought for creators' rights in a massive metropolis, who blazed trails with his progressive magazine, who was a darling of the media, who endured withering public criticism while fighting against racial discrimination.


"He was a pompous, shrewd perfectionist who tirelessly sought fortune and glory, whether in business or sex. You could say he succeeded in all sectors of entertainment, but the one feat he failed to achieve...was building a casino resort. I established NFF Services because I thought it a shame he left that unfinished."


The bewitching beauty, clad in a dealer's uniform, continues. She explains how simple it would be to conjure a city using her Authority. But that would be pointless. A city made for entertaining humans must be built by human systems. Success and bankruptcy are two sides of the same coin. She set out to construct the planet's largest casino resort to experience that successive tragedy and joy. The giant building, which can only resemble a ribbon, symbolizes the soul which inhabits that place.


"Anyway, before you get the wrong idea... The greed of all mankind is no more valuable than one of my hairpins. Once I tire of it, I can just toss it into the sea. Don't go making the mistake of thinking I actually love you people, dear."

mcLink: 高扬斯卡娅的野心～东海岸版～

profile.CN:
如果没有看到『未来』。
如果不继承女王的职责。
如果乐园使命有所不同。

以及，如果。
她在梦中不断描绘的妖精国能够延续下去。


『光辉的堡垒』一定会迎来很多妖精的来访吧。
耀眼的阳光。
推心置腹一起欢笑的友人。
大街上擦身而过的众多幸福。
虽然没有华丽的服饰，
却不知何时戴上了星辰般的发饰。

——春日的记忆，犹如这般。
即便是无法实现的未来，
这样的日子，也一定存在过。
profile.NA:
If only she had never seen the future...

If only she had never inherited the High Queen's duty...

If only paradise had given her a different mission...


And if only...the Faerie Britain she imagined in her dreams had continued...


Surely, many faeries would have come to visit the dazzling fortress. It would have been filled with blinding sunlight and the laughter of good friends. There would have been many happy lives crossing paths on the street. She wouldn't be wearing anything fancy, but she would have worn a familiar, star-shaped hairpin.


This is what her spring memories might have been like. Even if that future never came to pass, surely there would have been days like this...

profile.CN:
这是某位妖精的故事。

「早就准备好了哦。
　咱这就为你量尺寸。」

在漫长的修行，与如此如此漫长的沉睡之后。
与自己等待已久的新娘重逢的妖精
为了不让眼泪溢出眼眶，拼命地装模作样。

「别再穿铁铠甲了。
　请容许咱为你准备无与伦比的礼裙。」

为了无比幸福的未来。
为了无比重要的回忆。
展现为那天而准备的
自己引以为傲的技术吧

就这样，对妖精来说，最棒、
最美妙的时间结束了。
新娘穿上完成礼裙的样子，
正如多次在梦中见到完成度。

犹如披星戴月，
新娘十分高兴地感谢了妖精。
只此一句话，
妖精的旅途顺利地走到了终点。



话说回来。

「——嗯，早上好，玛修。
　太好了。
　能听到你这么说，咱非常高兴哦。」

虽然她要之后才会在冰之棺中沉睡。
但希望在她醒来之际，
能赶在任何人之前，将这份心情传达给她。
profile.NA:
This is the tale of a certain faerie.


"I've been ready and waiting. Let's get you all measured up."


After a great deal of training, and a long, long slumber, the faerie reunited with the bride she had awaited for nearly an eternity, and put on the very bravest face she could muster to hide her tears.


"You're done wearing that iron armor. I'm going to make you the best dress of all time."


For a blessed future—for her most cherished memories—the time to display her long-honed skills had finally come.


So passed the most wonderful time of the faerie's life. She had lost track of how many times she dreamed of this moment, and now her bride was finally wearing that dress before her very eyes. It was as if the dress itself were made of stars. The bride beamed. With those heartfelt words of gratitude, the faerie's long journey drew to a close.


By the way...


"...Yeah. Good morning, Mash. I'm real glad you said that."


Though there was still some time before the girl would fall asleep in the coffin of ice, the faerie wanted to be the very first person to greet her with that sentiment.

profile.CN:
秋之森的公主坠入了爱河。
爱上了生来就犹如尸体的王子。

森林里的同伴都在为王子的出现而欢呼雀跃，
唯有她一个从远处静静凝视。

即便在王子站起身，窥见他的内心之后，
公主的心意依然没有改变。

被抛弃妖精们的聚集地。
即便嘲笑说这里是妖精国的底层，
王子也并未将住家搬离秋之森。

做了好事之后，会仔细地在森林的溪流中洗手。
做了坏事之后，会无视弄脏的翅膀倒在落叶上。

王子讨厌不列颠的一切。
也讨厌妖精们，和秋之森的同伴们。
但是，

「我又不是神明。
　可管不了这种放任不管也会自己消失的家伙哦。」

当知道了王子真正讨厌的东西之后，
公主，
心中暗暗决定要为王子振翅飞翔到最后一刻。

她相信，这才是唯一能温暖他冰凉四肢的火。

　　　◆

这是没有被讲述的断章。
是那大骗子一直隐瞒到最后的，一位骄傲公主的故事。
profile.NA:
The princess of the Autumn Woods fell in love. She fell in love with the prince who, from the moment of his birth, was like a corpse. While the others in the forest were in high spirits upon his arrival, she simply gazed at him from afar. Even when the prince stood up, and even after she caught a glimpse of his heart, the princess never wavered.


It was the place discarded faeries gathered. Even though the prince ridiculed the other faeries as the dregs of Faerie Britain, he never did move his residence away from the Autumn Woods.


Whenever he did something good, he would carefully wash his hands in the forest river. Whenever he did something bad, he would collapse on a leaf while his wings were still dirty. The prince loathed everything about Britain. So too did he loathe the faeries of the Autumn Woods. But...


"I'm no god. You can't expect me to care for a bunch of losers who just disappear on their own."


Having learned what the prince truly despised, the princess promised herself she would flap her wings until the end for his sake, believing that she was the only fire that could warm his cold limbs.


◆


This is a fragment of an untold tale—the story of a proud princess a liar hid from the world.

profile.CN:
少女于黄昏之星祈愿。

愿这泪水，
不是为了悲伤或痛苦，
而是为了喜悦而流下。
愿能守护珍爱之人们的笑容与念想。

已经不会再放弃任何事物了。
将凝聚的愿望化身为剑。
用小小的手——宣誓获得胜利。
profile.NA:
The girl wishes upon the twilight stars.

She hopes that her tears would flow not for sorrow and pain, but joy.

She hopes that she could protect the smiles and wishes of the people who are very important to her.


She won't give up on anything anymore.

She puts her desperate wish into the sword.

She vows to win―――using those tiny hands of hers.

profile.CN:
因杰出的才能，受到了周围人的期待与执着。
但自己的存在方式，却无法回应这些。

其中并不包含憎恨、怨念、悲伤，
却得出了斩断所爱故乡之旧习与因果的结论。

自己就是这样一个无可救药的人渣。

但是——
曾有个会为自己愤怒的搭档。
曾有个笑着表示自己很会照顾人的后辈。
另外，还曾有个理解自己什么时候最美的人。

在随心所欲的生活中得到的，
并非只有阴暗的回忆，确实存在过。

在轮回的断崖上，仿佛有点腼腆地笑着。
那里有着美丽的黄昏，与飒爽吹拂的风儿。
profile.NA:
My prodigious talent led to high hopes and attention from those around me. But I couldn't live up to them, as that just wasn't who I am. I didn't blame anyone or grieve over that situation, but it did lead to me severing ties with my beloved hometown.


That's just the kind of worthless good-for-nothing I am.


But then...I found a partner who got angry on my behalf. I found a kouhai who told me I was good at taking care of others. And best of all, I found someone who understood me at my most beautiful.


Yeah. My life wasn't all doom and gloom. I do have some good memories. Memories I gained thanks to being true to myself.


Here, on the cliffs of reincarnation, I flash a shy smile. A refreshing breeze wafts through the air as the beautiful twilight sun continues to set.

unknownCharacters: 斯堪的纳维亚·佩佩隆奇诺

profile.CN:
夕阳随波逐流。

天使般的女神
美艳动人无可比拟。

那魅惑的眼神，
一定是爱的恶作剧——
profile.NA:
The sunset seems to drift along the waves.


The goddess who looks like an angel is more vibrant and beautiful than she's ever been before. Her enchanting gaze must surely be a mischievous expression of love...

profile.CN:
据说在现世的某处，
存在珊瑚色的沙滩。

再加上躺着两位非人存在，
就显得更像做梦了。


而这一景象，
或许只是随着夏日泡沫消失的幻影吧……
profile.NA: Somewhere in this world, there is a beach with sand the color of coral. For the two inhuman figures there, lying upon those sands only makes it seem even more like a dream. Perhaps this is no more than an illusion, destined to disappear in the summer mist...

profile.CN:
一听说有宝藏，就无法不去寻找。

哪怕是深不可测的丛林，
哪怕会遭遇未知的生物，也在所不辞。

因为这就是海盗的骄傲嘛！
profile.NA: If there's treasure to be found, then we have to go look for it. We don't care if it's inside an impenetrable jungle, or guarded by some creature nobody's ever seen. What kind of pirates would we be if we backed down from a treasure hunt!?

profile.CN:
为探寻遗留的宝物，
向着无穷无尽的大海出征。

为了亲眼确认
那是否配得上被称作宝物。

因为所谓的宝物——
只有在找到时才会知道。
profile.NA: Sailing the endless blue sea in search of forgotten treasure, so I can see for myself whether it's worthy of the name. After all...you can't tell whether something's treasure or not until you find it.

profile.CN:
毕竟这夏日如此明媚。
大哥也应该换上Golden的服装，充分感受自己守护的如今世界的样子，御主难道不这么认为吗？

——耀眼的太阳之下，同一片天空之下，
充斥着众人的喜悦。

我说得没错吧，老大？
profile.NA: Just look at this bright summer day. Even Brother Tsuna here's dressed in his golden best. Don't you think we oughta take a moment to enjoy this world we've worked so hard to protect, Master? Out under this radiant summer sky, we're here, we're alive, and we got joy out the wazoo. Ain't that right, Boss?

profile.CN:
弥漫着海风气味的城市。

五彩缤纷的建筑物
陆续从眼前出现并消失。

身旁放着许多钟爱之物。
无论过去还是现在，只要有了这些，海盗就心情愉悦。
profile.NA: A seaside town, the scent of ocean in the air. Vividly colored buildings come and go, all in the blink of an eye. Here by his side, he has some of his absolute favorites. Then and now, this is all a pirate needs to be happy.

profile.CN:
龙无所畏惧。
无论在什么地方，都会自信、优雅地微笑。

甚至还被要求为她带来快乐，
被牵着手，带去更高的天空。

在夏日困难的尽头，究竟会是什么——
profile.NA: There is nothing a dragon fears. No matter where they go, all they need do is smile an elegant, indomitable smile. She takes my hand and invites me up to even greater heights, urging me to enjoy myself. What could lie beyond this summer hardship...?

profile.CN:
始终都有　即将溺水　的感觉
但　是

在下沉的　那个　瞬间　上浮。
搜集　碎片

你看　已经　不要紧了……
profile.NA: I always feel...like I'm on the verge...of drowning... But...as long as I gather...those fragments...the moment I sink down... There... You see? I'm fine now...

profile.CN:
——据说曾被无名的英灵
使用过的雌雄双剑。

起初只是一簇微小的火苗，随后化作火焰，获得了被称为炼狱的强大力量。然后在漫长的战斗中，意识到自我，并最终拥有了与人相似的意志般的存在。

说起来好像很了不起，但实际上，我就是所谓的会说话的剑啦。也不是什么稀罕的剑。顺便一提，实际性能方面是合体之后比较强哦，我本人都这么说了，肯定不会错。只不过我在独立行动形态时，会考虑到各种战斗风格，才会分成雌雄双剑的形式而已。
分开时，主人力量的那面由较短的雄剑司掌，而主人技巧的那面由较长的雌剑司掌。

这是原本是不被允许，也不可能存在的，非常，非常渺小的夏日一刻。

没什么，反正都吃了那么多苦头，这点奇迹应该能被允许吧。


——是吧，我终生的主人啊。
profile.NA:
A sword that is both male and female, said to have once been wielded by a nameless hero.


It began as a small spark, but eventually grew into a roaring flame, thus gaining the tremendous power of Rengoku, or purgatory. It became self-aware over the course of its long, long battle, developing a mind and personality similar to a human's.


"Yeah, that sounds impressive and all, but let's not overcomplicate it. I'm basically a talking sword, and that's nothing special. Incidentally, my abilities are a lot better when both my male and female sides are merged. Trust me, I'd know. The only reason I separate the two is so each side can better fight using its own style while I'm in independent mode. When I'm separated, my short male side is in charge of aiding my wielder, while my long female side handles the technical stuff."


While a being such as this would normally never be allowed to exist, there's no harm in letting it run around just for a fun, fleeting summer moment.


"Hey, after everything we've been through, we deserve a little miracle like that.


...Right, Wielder?"

profile.CN:
干巴巴的阳光。
从美丽的大海传来的海浪声。
以及此时品尝的冰凉的冰淇淋！
香草！　巧克力！　草莓！　蜜瓜！
呃，还有……这是御主点的吧。
绿茶！　这是最棒的夏天！
来吧，维！　从头到尾全部吃吧吃吧吃掉吧！

对了，御主请不要动哦。
我会向给雏鸟喂食一样喂给你吃的。
那个，就是这样吧。

给，啊～♪

怎么样，好吃吗？　我当然觉得很好吃哦。
啊啊，但请不要相信我的赞美之词哦。

因为，我是和你一起吃的，
当然会觉得什么都好吃啦。
所以，你要负责哦，御主？
profile.NA:
Parched rays of sunlight. The sound of waves from the gorgeous sea. And of course, the deliciously cold ice cream you eat there! Vanilla! Chocolate! Strawberry! Melon! Let's see, what else... Oh, right. You requested Rocky Road, didn't you, Master! Ahh, what a perfect summer! Come on, Viy! We're going to eat them all! Every last one!


Oh, please don't move, Master. I'm going to feed you myself, just as if you were a baby chick. Let's see, um... Oh, right.


Okay, say "ahhh"♪


Do you like it? I certainly do. Oh, but please take my opinion with a grain of salt, okay? You see, everything I get to eat with you tastes delicious. That's why I'm trusting you make sure whatever we eat together really is yummy. Okay, Master?

profile.CN:
把这个这样弄，这里那样弄……呼

归根结底，就算成了戏法师，
也没能变得很灵巧呢。
不擅长的事情并没有变得擅长。
既然如此，该做的只有练习了。

请不要看破我那无比拙劣的演技。
请不要凝视我颤抖个不停的双手。

因为无论多么缺乏才能，
人生也只能靠手上的牌来战斗。

虽然绝对称不上高明，
但这是赠与你的小小礼物。

雷鸣般的掌声、欢呼声、笑容。
被华美幻影迷住的，梦幻一刻。
这就是我的一切。
profile.NA:
Okay, first I go like this, then like that...


Phew. I guess just becoming a stage magician hasn't done anything to make me less clumsy. It's just not easy to get good at something you've always been terrible at. All right, I suppose this calls for some good, old-fashioned practice, then!


Please don't see through my poor acting. Please don't stare at my trembling hands.


Even if you don't have a good hand, you still have to play the cards life dealt you.


I may not be very good, but I still want to give you the best gift I can.


Thunderous applause. Raucous cheers. Smiling faces. A moment straight out of a dream, where I dazzle the crowd with glamorous illusions. That is all I could ask for.

profile.CN:
旅行结束，返回后，将行李收拾了一下。
虽然没有东西能比得上刻在心中的回忆。
每当看到为我制作的玩偶时，
就会想起那充满了平静的告别，
然后想起夏日特异点。

吵吵闹闹，慌慌张张，流着汗水，大声欢笑，
奔跑，摔倒，再奔跑，一圈圈转着迷了路。
光用快乐这个词无法描述，
光用辛苦这个词无法说明，
混着全部喜怒哀乐的东西。
没有其他任何人的，只属于我的故事。

与同伴们一起仰望过耀眼的星空。
与同伴们一起欣赏过通透的蓝天。
就算没有什么精致的回忆，
我们也确实共享着美丽的东西。

而我，站在仿佛已经收拾好但又仿佛没收拾的行李前。
低声呢喃了一句「好」。
profile.NA:
The journey is over. Now I'm back home, unpacking my luggage...even though nothing I brought back compares to my memories of the trip. Every time I look at the stuffed animal I commissioned, I think back to that gentle farewell, followed by my other recollections of this summer Singularity.


I remember clamoring, shouting, sweating, laughing loudly, running, tripping, running some more, going around in circles until we got lost... "Fun" alone doesn't even begin to do justice to the experience, and I can't really call it an ordeal, either. This summer had everything: joy, anger, grief, and pure, unadulterated fun. It's a story that lives now within me and me alone.


I watched the starry sky twinkling overhead with my friends. I saw azure blue skies stretching on forever with them. Even if I can't recall every detail perfectly, I know we all shared something beautiful.


Now, standing in front of my half-unpacked luggage, I look down at what I still have left to do and murmur, "Okay, let's do this."

profile.CN:
在令人汗流浃背的夏日骄阳之下。
在口中冰凉、甜美、融化的冰淇淋，是堕落的味道。
如果还是自己喜欢的味道，就像两段三段不容喘息地叠加连续攻击，怎么还可能抵抗得住嘛？　留到最后的松脆甜筒也很好吃哦。喀嚓喀嚓。

如果口渴，就来一份气泡迸发的碳酸汽水！
会滋滋作响哦，滋滋作响。
你知道？　很厉害吧。人类为什么会发明出那样愚蠢的饮料呢。
而且还觉得这种很有夏日风情……是因为夏天令人迸发所以饮料也要迸发吗。
一点都不好笑呢。咕嘟咕嘟。

轰然登场的是分量十足的芭菲！
新鲜的水果加上甜甜的奶油。
无论怎么吃都不会腻味的味道万花筒！
人类怎么可能承受得了这种嘛。啊呜啊呜。

不仅是食物，还有可爱的游泳圈，愉快的玩水，还有很多其他东西。
不管怎么样，这位魔王准备的堕落套装的效果是不容置疑的。因为——

「唔～。夏天果然是最适合堕落的季节呢。
　夏天，太棒了！」

……魔王本人似乎也逃不出这种堕落呢。
profile.NA:
Sweat drips down her brow under the hot summer sun. The sweet, cold ice cream in her mouth tastes like delicious depravity. How could you possibly resist the temptation of your favorite flavor? You can't, of course. And then there's the crispy crunch of the cone at the end. That may be the best part of all. (Munch, munch, munch)


If you get thirsty, there's carbonated juice that practically pops in your mouth! Did you know about these fizzy drinks? Amazing stuff. How in the world did humans come up with such a ridiculous drink? And on top of that, they say they're emblematic of summer, too? I guess it's because they want everything in summer to be bursting with energy; even their drinks. Isn't that just hilarious? (Gulp, gulp, gulp)


And then, a parfait stacked to the ceiling pops out with a bang! It's got fresh fruit...sweet whipped cream...and so many other flavors, I could eat it forever without getting bored! There's simply no way a mere human could withstand temptation like this, right? (Chomp, chomp, chomp)


And it's not just food. There's also adorable floatie rings, delightful waterplay, and so much more. As the Demon King of Summer, I couldn't have asked for a better set of tools with which to drag Master down into depravity. After all...


"Hmm. I knew it. Summer really is the perfect season for depravity. Now, let's get going!"


...It seems not even the Demon King of Summer herself is immune to summer's depraved charms.

profile.CN:
在刨冰内放入甘葛，

在那砂糖还被称作药之时代的比果实还甜的糖浆。

在那遥远的夏日，鲜明刻在脑海中的甘露般的记忆，
与某人共同品尝的那一个夏的回忆，
肯定永远都不会从心中消失吧。

夏天逐渐远去。
在迦勒底度过的夏天，
是否能在她心目中成为特别的记忆呢。

◇

看着身旁抱头呻吟的诺子小姐，
心中不觉这么想着。
profile.NA:
Shaved ice with amazura syrup in a new metal bowl. She decreed that this was "a precious treat" one thousand years ago. Ice—a rare and cherished delight in her day—served in a beautiful dish with syrup even sweeter than fruit, in a time sugar was considered medicine. How sweet did that concoction taste, especially on a scorching summer day?


Even now, she insists this particular kind of shaved ice is something special. Those memories of sweet summer days she shared with someone else are etched vividly in her mind, and will never be forgotten.


Now, this summer spent at Chaldea is coming to an end. Will her memories of it be as special to her as that long-ago summer's?


◇


Such were the idle thoughts circling around in my head as I saw Nagiko next to me cradling her head, moaning all the while.

profile.CN:
这，才是我。

低劣的黄金光辉。
与自由这个词截然相反的枷锁。
沉重的锁链用刺耳的声音引来嘲弄。
仿佛为了让任何人都知道这就是败者。
用来为了让所有人都明白，
这个人是犯了过错的愚者，
所以才会变成这副样子的——
耻辱的证明。

但是，现在，我们正看着这个。
从外侧，看着被卸下的东西。

光辉就是普通的光辉。
没有用枷锁遮盖的自由。
沉重放在沙漠砂砾之上。

所以，我要重申一遍。

——这，才是我。
profile.NA:
This is who I am.


The garish gleam of vulgar gold. Shackles, the antithesis of freedom. The heavy chains' irritating rattling invites scorn and mockery. It could not be clearer to all that the one who wears them is defeated. These marks of humiliation prove to all who behold them that their bearer is guilty of a grievous mistake, and so has been reduced to such a pitiful state.


But now, we are the beholders. We see these shackles unlocked, from without.


The gleam becomes ordinary. They no longer offer any impediment to one's freedom. They lie, abandoned, in the desert sands.


And so, I say again:


This is who I am.

我决胜负的时刻是何时？

profile.CN:
被认为曾被封印之巫女操控的机关武者。

很久以前，有一位力大无双的国津之神。
屠戮野兽、讨伐妖魔、赢得胜利。
像这样守护着人们，不断战斗的神，
最终却遭到了受自己保护的人们的背叛。

但是，即便身体遭到了人们利刃的伤害，
这位神也没有发出任何怨恨之言，
只是顺其自然地接受了一切。
就这样，这位神被自己一直守护着的人们残忍地砍碎、夺去了名字，结束了身为神明的生命。

总之，无论是真是假，
这就是斩三郎的来历。

这些问题暂且不提了，当我在宝物殿发现斩三郎时，他已经是破破烂烂的状态了，甚至令人怀疑这个人偶真的是传说中的神之骸吗。
只不过，当看着那破破烂烂的容颜，不知不觉地，
我开始觉得不能放任他不管，便修好了铠甲、头盔等各个部位，成为了现在的斩三郎。

那之后我们一起旅行，一起舞蹈，一起踏上讨伐妖魔的流浪之旅。

对于不知父母是谁，不知家乡何处，连自己都不了解的我来说，
他可以说是我唯一的家人了……

哎哟，烦心事就说到这里吧。看来今晚又会发生一番纠纷。用讨伐魅惑与人为恶之妖魔的这支舞。

——Wake up，斩三郎！

没错，曾经守护人们的不知名之神，即便化作骸骨，也依然在保护着人们。
profile.NA:
It's said that the puppet samurai was once controlled by a great shrine maiden of the past.


Long, long ago, there was a god of the earthly domain who possessed incomparable power. He hunted beasts, vanquished evil, and carried battles to victory. But after many years of fighting to protect humankind, that god was betrayed and killed by those same humans. Yet even after being run through with their blades, the god spoke not a word of anger or resentment towards his killers. Instead, he merely accepted his fate.


Thus did this god and protector of humankind have his body cruelly cut to pieces, his name stolen, and his existence as a deity ended by the very people he had spent his life protecting.


Well, I don't know if that's actually true or not, but regardless, that's Zanzaburo's story.


At any rate, when I found him in the treasury, he was so shabby that I genuinely couldn't believe he was actually the legendary husk of an ancient god. Still, as I was looking at his beat-up face, I found myself feeling so sorry for him that I decided to fix up his armor and helmet. That's how he became the Zanzaburo he is today.


Afterwards, we began traveling together, dancing together, and vanquishing evil together.


I may not know who my parents were, or where I was born, or really anything about myself, so in one sense, Zanzaburo is really the only family I have...


Oh, but that's enough for the sappiness. It looks like we've still got some trouble ahead of us tonight. There are dangerous creatures out there that we'll need to take care of with our evil-slaying dance.


Wake up, Zanzaburo!


That's right. Even as a husk, this god whose name was lost to time continues to serve as humankind's guardian.

profile.CN:
话说，虽然兰丸是众多兰丸中最优秀的兰丸，但要成为现在这个兰丸，其实经历了非常多努力与兰丸的时光。

出生于兰丸星的兰丸自从记事以来，就在兰丸学校做好了作为兰丸的思想准备，每周三会去上星间飞行剑技私塾，坚持回家路上不买零食，也会忍耐着吃下苦涩的青椒，那真是一段兰丸苦难的日子啊。

但是，那已经是遥远的过去了。现在，兰丸实现了过去兰丸们一直渴望却始终未能实现的梦想，也就是得到了一生的主人。

兰丸拥有谜之兰丸X的称号，但兰丸也始终没搞清这个谜究竟是什么。但是，兰丸感觉自己现在终于明白了。

——没错，这是一直在寻找的某种重要存在。

来自遥远的地方，伴随着令人怀念的声音，经历了漫长的旅途，承载着维系星辰的愿望。

请让我一直陪伴在您的左右哦，主公！
profile.NA:
So, while you may already know that Ranmaru is THE Ranmaru among Ranmarus, what you may not know is just how much work Ranmaru had to put in to become the Ranmaru Ranmaru is today.


For as long as Ranmaru can remember, Ranmaru attended Ranmaru School to learn what it takes to be Ranmaru. Ranmaru also went to Interstellar Flying Sword cram school three times a week, fighting the urge to grab a bite to eat on the way home by making do with bitter bell peppers. Those were definitely not easy days for Ranmaru. But fortunately, they're also far in the past now that Ranmaru has achieved Ranmaru's life dream of finding a lord Ranmaru can serve with pride for the rest of Ranmaru's life.


Even though Ranmaru holds the title of Mysterious Ranmaru X, Ranmaru never knew what the "Mysterious" part meant. But now, Ranmaru thinks Ranmaru understands. It's something very important Ranmaru was looking for, even if Ranmaru didn't yet know it at the time.


It's a wish that crossed boundless distance to tie our planets together, along with a voice Ranmaru hadn't heard in a long time.


Ranmaru hopes you'll let Ranmaru stay by your side forever and ever, Master!

profile.CN:
——这把鉾，是从天而降的神之光。

为了迎接人成为神，为了迎接大蛇成为龙。

作为异形噬国者遭厌恶疏远，从神之国被流放至此的那个存在，吞噬其愤怒、吞噬其哀叹、吞噬其憎恨，投身怨念旋涡，本应最终成为将国家吞噬殆尽的灾厄才对。

但这一切却被那个男人的一句话消除了。

虽然不知这对于异形噬国者算好事还是算坏事。

但这对两人而言都是无关紧要的。
两人只想一直、一直在一起。
只要这样，就足够了。

而这个愿望与约定跨越了坎坷的命运，终于得到了实现。哪怕那只是短暂的梦幻，两人也会对彼此倾诉。

——感谢能与你相遇。

就是这样一件发生于某片海中之事。
profile.NA:
The spear that fell from the heavens is the light of the gods themselves.


It was cast down to usher humans into godhood, and orochi into dragons.


The creature that was cast out of the kingdom of gods due to fear and loathing, and despised as a nation-devouring monstrosity, was supposed to feed. Everyone, including the creature herself, thought she would feed on her anger, her grief, and her resentment until her malice swallowed her whole. She would inevitably transform into the nation-devouring calamity the gods always suspected she would become.


But all that went away with a single man's kindhearted remark.


The monstrous nation-devourer couldn't tell whether that was a good thing or a bad thing. But by then, neither of them cared. All they wanted was to be together, forever. That was all they needed.


And while it took several bizarre twists of fate for it to happen, their wish—their promise—was eventually fulfilled.


Even if their newly found time together was no more than a fleeting illusion, it didn't matter. All that mattered was that they could finally tell each other what they'd always wanted to say:


"I'm glad I met you."


That...was the incident at sea.

profile.CN:
她曾经，只是个流浪者。

作为一个生命而言过于隔绝的存在方式，被充斥于周围的恐惧而羡慕的视线逼得不容安息，其恸哭的旅程或有短暂停歇，却无任何终点。

而她——已精疲力竭。

失去了所有一切，仅存的那一些，
是宝贵之人的哀切祈愿。

——虞兮虞兮　奈若何

只为回应他的期待，她一直坚持存在着。
这是她在黑暗之中唯一的、仅剩的依靠。

鲜红的花朵仰望天空。
即便黑夜逼近，也美丽依然。
profile.NA:
She was a drifter. Nothing more, nothing less.


Forced to live a life of severe isolation, the constant gazes of envy tinged with fear that beset her from all sides never let her rest for even a moment. While she did manage to find temporary respites during her tragic journey, she never arrived at a final destination.


And so, she became thoroughly exhausted.


Having lost everything she ever cared about, all she retained were her heartrending prayers for the one she loved.


Ah, Yu, my Yu... What will your fate be?


Those parting words were the only reason she continued to exist; her only source of comfort amidst endless darkness.


The crimson flower looks up at the sky. Even in the onset of night, it remains strikingly beautiful.

profile.CN:
这是个美丽的夜晚。
雪与光照耀着夜空。

你看上去十分开心地，
让我见识了各种东西。

是那手上的温暖。

What a beautiful night. The snow and the lights make the night sky twinkle even brighter than usual.

如果这不眠之夜还将继续下去，

因为你想啊，我的青春时代相当粗暴吧。
像这样仰望天空……
应该几乎没有什么经验吧。

该怎么说呢？
由于灵基像这样发生了变化……
发现？　应该这么形容吧。
该说是注意到了什么新的事物，
还是没有注意到呢？

如果没有的话……
这种感觉，应该是错觉，
或者是幻觉吧。

与大姐踏上愉快的烹饪路途……

和大姐一起制作很多很多美味的东西。

我只是，这么想而已……

自己，也可以仰望天空。
profile.NA:
...Man, what a beautiful sky. I really mean that. I mean, I had a pretty rough time of it growing up, you know? I don't think it would've even occurred to me to just gaze up at the sky like this back then.


How can I put this... I guess changing my Spirit Origin helped me make a new discovery? It's not often that I realize something new like this. Heck, maybe I still haven't, and this is all just in my head. But, even if it is...that's okay with me. In fact, it's plenty!


Just being able to imagine a life that might have been—one where I went around with Big Sis just having fun cooking lots of yummy things for lots of different people, without making any trouble for anyone—well, that's all I need to hold my head high and look up at the sky.

profile.CN:
曾经，被称作冬之圣女。

自被铸造之后，被保管在雪山古城之中很久、很久，
精神、虚伪的灵魂、与记忆回路都遭磨损，
只能一直活在“永恒不变的今天”，
终究成为了伟业的基础。

在外人看来，是美丽的装置。
在执着之人看来，是刻印于昔日的后悔。
在她们看来，
是对她们“自己”至高无上的荣耀。

而现在，这些已是遥远过去的事了。
圣女在完全的世界内浅眠着。
仿佛拥抱着众多未曾实现的理想。
profile.NA:
She was once called the Holy Maiden of Winter. After being kept in an ancient castle on a snowy mountain for an eternity since she was minted, her mind, her transient soul, and even her memory circuits have all been worn down to near oblivion. Now, having become the foundation for a great feat, she lives the same unchanging day over and over.


For those on the outside, she seems to be a beautiful device. For those obsessed, she seems to be the picture of regret inscribed on days of old. And for the other girls, she seems like the ultimate glory to strive for.


But that is all long in the past now. Here, within this perfect world, the saint dozes in peace, so that she may better embrace the many ideals she was never able to fulfill.

——宝具，宝贝『打神鞭』。

这是过去太公望接受封神使命时，获赐的一种概念武装。
名副其实，是打垮神之鞭，
对非同寻常的超常存在，尤其是对不会
因寿命而亡的存在来说，能发挥非比寻常的威力。

「这是种不挑对象的武器哦。
　只要用这个敲碎头盖骨，大部分敌人都会死。」

理所当然。
只要不是有不死特性的存在，
一旦被击碎头盖，大部分生物都会死。

这里所指的鞭，不是绳索构成的那种，
而是指打击用的棒状武器。
对太公望来说，这比锋利的武器用起来更趁手。

「因为你看，这很像钓竿……
　好像也不能这么说，但总比锋利的武器要像吧。
　乍一看不像武器，非常优美。
　该怎么形容呢，对了——没有野蛮感！」

原来如此。
话说，这把鞭是怎么使用的？

「主要用来敲碎敌人的头盖骨。」

何谓野蛮。
何谓优美。
profile.NA:
Dǎ Shén Biān; The God-Striking Whip. Noble Phantasm and Paopei.

A type of Conceptual Weapon bestowed upon Taigong Wang when he was charged with sealing away a god.

As its name suggests, it is a whip meant for defeating gods, and therefore possesses unparalleled strength against supernatural beings and those who lack natural lifespans.


"This weapon doesn't care who or what it fights. Most foes will die if you use this to shatter their skull."


Well, that's pretty obvious. Just about every living thing will die if it has their skull shattered, no matter what is used to do it.


This is not a whip in the traditional sense, as it lacks rope or string. Instead, it's more of a bar-shaped weapon meant for direct bludgeoning. Taigong Wang apparently prefers it over bladed weapons.


"It kind of looks like a fishing pole, right? ...Okay, maybe that's a stretch, but it certainly looks more like one than a sword. Besides, there's something elegant about how it doesn't look much like a traditional weapon at all. Hmm, how can I put this...? Oh, I know! It's not barbaric at all!"


Ah, I see. Well that makes sense. So how do you fight with this whip then?


"Mostly by shattering my opponents' skulls."


...I see. Nothing barbaric about that at all. I mean, who doesn't think of skull smashing when they think of elegance?

profile.CN:
三头龙，兹梅·戈里尼奇。
嗯。
很强哦。

在多布雷尼亚·尼基季奇的传说中，
最有名的或许就是这个除龙故事了。
也就是说，我比较强哦。

唔？
撇下妻子不管自己远征旅行之类的
壮士歌或许更为有名？
怎，怎么会有……
这种事……
虽然我很想否定……
唔。

妻子有什么想法吗？
唔，这个嘛。
当然是因为心爱的丈夫不回家而陷入苦恼吧。
因为连个口信都不捎。

如果现代遇到这种事，或许会被提出离婚？
这——

「能插一句话吗？」

噢。怎么了，兹梅。
你过去就是一条很饶舌的龙呢。

「为什么不聊我的事，而聊起了夫妇关系啦。」

哈哈哈！
这么说来，确实如此呢！
不过嘛，细节问题就不用在意啦！
profile.NA:
Zmei Gorynych, the three-headed dragon. Yup. He was strong. The story of how I defeated him is probably Dobrynya Nikitich's most famous legend. Know what that means? It means I'm stronger than he was.


Hm? You think the bylina where I leave my wife behind to go on a long journey is more famous?

I-I, um...want to say you're wrong, but... Hmm.


What did my wife think about it? Hmm, good question. I'm sure she wasn't happy for her beloved husband to be away for so long. Especially when he apparently couldn't be bothered to send her so much as a single letter.

Hm? These days, that kind of abandonment would get me divorced? Well—


"Hey. Can I say something?"


Hm? What is it, Zmei? You always were really chatty for a dragon.


"I thought we were talking about me. Why're you talking about your marriage instead?"


Hahaha, good point! But don't worry about it! Life's too short to sweat the small stuff!

profile.CN:
「NFF服务的企业理念？
　那当然是为各位人类提供最先进的服务。
　不仅包括衣食住行，还有梦想、希望、爱情、欲望。
　NFF的创立，就是为了回应大家这些可爱的需求。」

侍奉就是支配，
提供就是管理。
商品化的『理想服务』
终将成为人们生活的一部分，
并形成少不了这种好处的社会。
她的目标，
并不是人种、思想构成的国家，
而是由企业、经济构成的支配圈。

「物种极限导致的衰退不可接受。
　愤怒、嫉妒、仇恨、痛苦。
　我们会买下所有这些“坏处”。
　只要有我在，就不允许灭亡。
　大家只需不断追求被赐予的商品即可。」

在就像是帽子的巨大工厂中，
现在也在生产大量商品。
家庭、成功、幸福、未来。
唯有一件，名为『自由』的商品
始终处于断货状态。
掌控着这颗星球上的所有动物，
赏玩的美女奸笑着。

「只不过，千万不要骄傲自大。
　区区各位人类的可能性，
　不过是能被我的帽子包裹之物。
　一旦闹得不快也就是翻个面扔进森林而已。
　千万不要因为认为自己是优秀的孩子——
　就得意忘形哦？」
profile.NA:
"NFF Services' corporate vision? Why, it's to serve all of humanity in a revolutionary new way. I founded NFF Services in order to better provide for all your precious needs. And not just fundamental ones like food, shelter, and clothing, but also hopes, dreams, love, and desire."


Of course, when Koyanskaya says "serve," she means "dominate," and when she says "provide," she means "control." In time, she hopes to grow her "Ideals Fulfilled" service so that it is an essential part of human life, thereby creating a society that is completely dependent upon her.

For Koyanskaya's ultimate goal is to dismantle human nations based on reason and logic and replace them with an authoritarian state that runs on business and economics.


"I refuse to let the human race decline because it reaches its limits. That is why NFF Services will buy up all manner of anger, envy, grudges, suffering, and other such evil things. As long as I'm around, I'll never let you go extinct. All you have to worry about is buying the products I provide you."


Even now, all sorts of products are being made at her giant factory that resembles a hat.

Homes. Success. Happiness. Futures. The only product that remains mysteriously forever out of stock is the one called "Freedom."

And so, the beautiful woman that embodies the concept of taming itself smiles a thin smile as she manipulates all the animals of this planet in the figurative palm of her hand.


"That being said, don't let this go to your heads. Every bit of potential you humans possess can fit comfortably inside my hat. If anything you do displeases me, I'll simply throw it away into the forest. So for your own sakes, I implore you not to get carried away and start thinking of yourselves as more capable than you really are, okay?"

profile.NA:
I had a dream in that moment right before your conscious mind shuts off for the night.


I dreamed that we were all together in one place, under a clear blue winter sky. I dreamed everyone was happy to see me.


Does the fact that I had a dream like that mean that...I actually wanted to be friends with them?


Man, I really hope not.

unknownCharacters: 斯堪的纳维亚·佩佩隆奇诺

profile.CN:
不成熟、未达成、愚蠢。
每当看到这碎片，她的脑海中就会浮现出这种想法。

曾经，有一位她必须守护的王。
她得到了那位王在战场上受伤时身披的外套。
每当看到被劈开的外套，灼烧身体般的愤怒与耻辱就会痛苦折磨她。
以此为原动力，她生前多次屹立于战场之上。

……直到现在，这也依然未变。
但不能否定，其中渗透进了其他感情。
正因为有想与她分享自己不成熟与愚蠢的人类存在，现在的她才会怀着不算太糟的心情去接受。

伴随着永不褪色的愤怒、后悔，还有些许骄傲，她仍在不断追逐着王的背影。
profile.NA:
Naivete. Failure. Foolishness. Every time she looks at this little scrap, these things leap to mind.


Once, she had a king she swore to protect. After he was injured on the battlefield, she took up the mantle he had been wearing. Every time she looks at that mantle, she is filled with both rage and shame over her failure. These feelings are what pushed her to stand tall on countless battlefields later in her life.


...Even now, those feelings remain unchanged. She cannot, however, deny that another feeling has joined them. Now, she begrudgingly accepts that there are others who want to share her naivete and foolishness.


Though her anger and regret will never fade, she nonetheless continues to walk her king's path...this time, with just a hint of pride.

profile.CN:
空虚之影的痕迹。
没有云消雾散，而是不间断地落下堆积起来。
profile.NA: Traces of empty shadows fall without end, neither stopping nor dispersing.

profile.CN:
在妖精国，情人节也被认为是特殊的节日。
作为一国一城之主，若是为了展现威严，倒也不会吝于驱使魔术。

「好吧。预算和时间都没有限制。
　身为女王，我会制作最极致的东西出来。
　好了，你想要什么样的巧克力？」
「毫不留情将从妖精们那里榨来的苛税全部投入的母亲大人，
　真是太～～～棒了♡♡♡
　——臭杂鱼，你愿意感恩戴德地收下吧？」
profile.NA:
Even in Faerie Britain, Valentine's Day was considered a special occasion. That made it the perfect occasion for the lord of a domain to break out their magecraft to demonstrate their majesty.


"Very well. I, the queen, shall make the greatest chocolate ever seen, no matter how much it costs or how long it takes. Now, tell me: What sort of chocolate do you desire?"

"Oh Mother, I looove how much of the faeries' existence tax you're willing to throw in♡

Well, pissant? You gonna accept our gift or what?"

profile.CN:
对于探求真实之爱的人来说，
理所当然会在情人节沉迷于巧克力作品。

模拟着将来与最爱的王重逢的时刻，用包括自己在内的各种元素尝试各式各样的组合。

决不会因为做过头之类的理由而停手。
profile.NA: As someone searching for true love, it just makes sense that she would become absorbed in making chocolate treats for Valentine's Day. And so, she attempts every possible combination she can think of, including several involving herself, while simulating the time she will be reunited with her beloved king. Whatever you do, don't even think about suggesting she may have gone too far.

profile.CN:
虽然巧克力的种类繁多，但南美女神推荐的当然还是巧克力热饮。

希望温暖从冰冷之旅中归来的你。
伴随着极致灿烂的笑容！
profile.NA: There are many different varieties of chocolate, but for goddesses from South America, nothing beats xocolatl. Whenever you get back from a trip in the freezing cold, we want to warm you up with a cup of hot xocolatl and a big smile!

profile.CN:
迦勒底商业处于繁忙期。

就在敌人陆续涌现、生命值一味减少、量子也快要见底的时候……

捧在手中的点心是多么的甜美。
profile.NA:
Chaldea, Inc. was in one of its busiest periods ever. But when enemies started popping up left and right, and both HP and QP were hitting rock bottom...


To this day, I've never tasted anything as sweet as those hand-wrapped chocolates.

profile.CN:
马纳南·麦克·利尔所有的，据说能同时在大海与陆地上驰骋的传说中的白马。有时也会拉战车。
马纳南是海神，所以有人认为这匹白马意味着浪花拍打的大海中出现的白色泡沫。

「是女神般的我使用的白马吧。
　简直就是宝具级的概念呢。
　嗯，身为魔术师的我姑且也是会骑马的哦。
　因为在追踪封印指定对象的时候，
　马有的时候反而比车或摩托更有效。

　话说回来……说到白马，给人一种骑士和公主共骑的印象。
　稍微有些过于浪漫，或者说过于少女品味了……
　不，我并没有轻视的意思，应该说只是有些不好意思……
　……总有一天我……也不是不可能……

　哎，对象？
　我不会要求……和我水准相当，但也希望是个
　勇敢、博识、聪明、有统率力……
　受到万人喜爱，却不会因此而骄傲的谦虚的勇士……

　为什么听到这里就打算走？
　要求太高？　画饼充饥？
　不，会有的！　肯定会有的！　
　肯定只是我还没有遇到而已啦！」
profile.NA:
Manannan mac Lir's legendary white steed, capable of running on both land and sea. Needless to say, he's also very good at pulling chariots when necessary. Manannan is the Celtic god of the sea, which is why some people believe this steed's color is meant to be the white of sea foam.


"Oh, you're talking about the horse I ride as a goddess, huh? Yes, he certainly is a Noble Phantasm-level concept. And yes, even as a mage, I was able to ride him. Sometimes, when you're chasing down seal designated mages, horses can go places cars and motorcycles can't.


That said...when most people think of a white horse, they probably imagine a prince riding in to sweep a princess off her feet. It's almost a little too romantic—or maybe I should say, juvenile or girlish? ...Oh, but I'm not making light of it. It's a little embarrassing to say this, but...I think, maybe, someday, I might meet a prince of my own...


Huh? What kind of prince am I looking for? Well, ideally, I'd like someone brave, learned, wise...a strong leader everybody likes, and who's also modest and humble without the slightest trace of pride or arrogance...


Hey, where are you going? Huh? You think all that's too much to ask for? Well, I don't! I'm sure he's out there somewhere! I just haven't met him yet!"

profile.CN:
伽拉忒亚赠予的情人节巧克力。

由于ver.1过于精巧难以下口，
因此提升了夸张程度重新雕出来的ver.2。
给人以捕捉了特征的造形可爱食玩风的印象，
只要这么想，倒也不是下不了口……
可能吧。

另外或许容易被外观吸引，实际上材料的白巧克力也是使用了费时费力严格挑选出来的素材，非常好吃。

「因为皮格马利翁王并不是那种将生活全部交给仆从去办，
　自己骄傲摆架子的人物。
　王是怀着自己力所能及的事就该自己完成的那种感觉的人。
　所以，我也拥有无愧于王之妻子水平的家务技能。
　……哎嘿。」
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Galatea.


Ver. 1 looked so much like her that it was uncomfortable to eat, so she changed tactics and went for the super-deformed look with Ver. 2. This new, caricatured design almost looks like the kind of toy included with meals at certain family-friendly restaurants, which just might make this one easier to eat...maybe. While it's easy to focus on how this chocolate looks, the sheer quality of the white chocolate composing it makes it something special to taste, too.


"King Pygmalion was never the type to lie around and have his servants do all the work. He always said that if there's something we can do ourselves, we should. That's why I worked hard to be competent enough at housework that I wouldn't be ashamed to call myself his wife. Pretty impressive, right?"

profile.CN:
克莱恩小姐赠予的两件回礼。

一件，是情人节巧克力。
互称朋友之偶像，合唱而成甜点心。
柔软圆润的生巧，润饰降下翡翠雪。
小巧茧玉笼雏人，思念昴宿六连星。

除此以外，还有一件。
难报恩义之御主，贴身包裹鹤氅布。
真情纺就本命织，倾注丹心雪白证。
墨染斑纹羽毛尖，遗憾戏耍依恋黑。

不只有单纯的报答。
肯定，也倾注了将会萌生的思念。
因为这一切，都是您培养的希望。
profile.NA:
A set of two return-favor gifts from Miss Crane.


The first is a set of six Valentine's Day chocolate tarts—a symphony of sweet confections meant to be shared with the idols she calls friends. This soft, delectable chocolate has been rolled into cocoons made of fine emerald snow.

The second is a brilliant white shawl made from crane down and woven lovingly for the Master to whom she owes a debt she can never fully repay. The ink-dyed feathers on the edge are a playful vestige of lingering attachment.


Yet there is more to these gifts than just gratitude for past deeds. There is also hope for what may come in the future, a hope she would never have had, had it not been for you.

profile.CN:
谜之偶像X〔Alter〕赠予的情人节巧克力。

看起来很可爱，听起来很愉快，吃起来很美味♪
唱片型巧克力♪
让御P能够稍微精神一点的
限定版加油歌的特别收录版☆

「千万不能搞错顺序哦。
　吃要留到最后。
　麻烦您一定要吃掉来消除证据。」
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day gift from Mysterious Idol X (Alter).


This chocolate in the shape of a vinyl record is delightful to look at, fun to listen to, and delicious when eaten♪ Incidentally, the song is a special limited-edition recording created in the hope that it will brighten MasP's day, even just a little☆


"Remember, don't eat it until you've finished listening to it. When you're done, polish it all off so you don't leave any evidence."

profile.CN:
摩根赠予的情人节巧克力。

参考了妖精国卡美洛形状的巧克力。
与阿尔托莉雅·潘德拉贡（枪兵）的巧克力创意相同。
起初打算做成追求真实感的超精密、超精巧之城，
但后来发现「……这个看上去不像是食物呢」，
便在设计上提升了童话程度。
陛下的少女心绽放出了光芒。

城堡前排列着设计得像是象棋棋子的
『亲密的女王与公主』『幼小的勇者将军』
『值得信任的两位骑士』『令人怀疑难以赞同但还是值得评价的大臣』。
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day gift from Morgan.


It is a chocolate recreation of Faerie Britain's Camelot...and is essentially the same idea as Altria Pendragon (Lancer)'s chocolate. At first, Morgan tried to make the castle extremely realistic, with painstakingly intricate details, but changed course to more of a fairy-tale design upon realizing it didn't actually look like food.


As you can see, the finished product clearly reflects Her Majesty's feminine side. In front of the castle are figures that almost look like chess pieces. Look closely, and you'll see a queen and a princess standing happily side by side, two trustworthy knights, a heroic young general, and an advisor the queen held in high regard despite some shortcomings.

profile.CN:
巴格斯特赠予的情人节巧克力。

巨大的盘子里装着大量小巧的巧克力。
多么可爱的景象……然而，仔细看来一点也不小巧。每一颗巧克力都有一顿饭的大小。

每一颗味道都不一样，容易下口、美味好吃。
巴格斯特细腻的烹饪技术绽放出了光芒。
如果可能的话，还是希望能为她吃掉大概三分之一的。
profile.NA:
A large bowl filled with a variety of small Valentine's Day chocolates from Barghest.


It's beautiful to look at...but on closer inspection, you can see they're not as small as you thought.

In fact, each individual chocolate is big enough to be a meal in itself. Each one of these chocolates has a different flavor, is easy to eat, and tastes as good as it looks.

Barghest is clearly very skilled in the kitchen, and it shows.

You may not be able to eat all these chocolates at once, but you hope you can eat at least a third to show you appreciate her hard work.

profile.CN:
芭万·希赠予的情人节巧克力。

桩子形态的巧克力。
会将其他从者赠送的巧克力彻底粉碎的，诅咒的桩子。
耗费了时间与感情制作的第一份巧克力。
芭万·希并没有意识到，
这完完全全就是情人节巧克力。

本是为了恶心人而制作的，但即便如此，
加入了蔷薇花纹制作精美的
芭万·希的审美品味还是绽放出了光芒。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Baobhan Sith, shaped like a metal stake.


In fact, it's a cursed stake that's meant for smashing other Servants' chocolate. Despite all the time and thought she put into making this, her first handmade chocolate, Baobhan Sith still hasn't realized it's just as much Valentine chocolate as those it's meant to smash.


For something she made to be meanspirited, Baobhan Sith's aesthetic sense still can't help but shine through in its beautiful rose-patterned finish.

profile.CN:
梅柳齐娜赠予的情人节巧克力。

模仿阿隆戴特的白色巧克力、
与模仿龙之宝珠……的红色巧克力。

「宝剑与红玉，简直就是极致的拼配呢！」

说是宝珠，但红色巧克力毫无疑问模仿的是心脏的形状。
重要的东西＝交出心脏的这种最强种才会表达的爱情好厉害。
凝聚在宝珠巧克力中的魔力相当于御主100年份的魔力。
如果吃下这种东西，应该会睡上个一整天，
但这个问题完全不在意。（并不是不理解。）
梅柳齐娜天上天下唯我独尊的态度绽放出了光芒。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Mélusine. Includes a white chocolate Arondight and a dragon's jewel—or rather, red chocolate shaped like one.


"Look, a treasured sword and a crimson bauble! Aren't they perfect together!?"


The red chocolate she calls a "crimson bauble" is undoubtedly modeled after a dragon's heart. It's impressive that a member of the dominant species thought to show someone she cared for them by offering something no less precious than her own heart.


Incidentally, the jewel chocolate contains more magical energy than Master could ever hope to possess even if they lived to be a hundred. If there's a better example of Mélusine's legendary vainglory than the fact that she doesn't care a whit that Master would be laid up in bed for an entire day if they took so much as a single bite (and yes, it's not that she doesn't know, it's that she doesn't care), I can't imagine what it could be.

profile.CN:
珀西瓦尔的情人节回礼。

——美丽而虚幻的，一朵鲜花。

是使用梅林魔术将珀西瓦尔见过的最美的花重现出来的东西。
据说这种花，是珀西瓦尔初次握住圣枪时，绽放于周围的存在。

根据歌剧『帕西法尔』的描述，
他是在邪恶魔术师的城中获得了圣枪。
那英灵珀西瓦尔经历的过去，与歌剧是否不同呢？
究竟是魔术师的城被花朵所装饰？
还是他亲吻的魔女携带的花朵呢？

知道答案的，只有珀西瓦尔本人。
profile.NA:
This Valentine's Day return gift from Percival is a single, beautiful, achingly fragile flower.


It's actually a recreation of the most beautiful flower Percival ever saw in his life, made with help from Merlin's magecraft.

According to Percival, this is the flower that was nearby when he first took up the sacred spear. But according to the musical drama "Parsifal," Percival acquired the sacred spear in an evil mage's castle.

Does this mean his real life was different from the show based on it, or just that the mage's castle was decorated with flowers? It could also be that the witch who kissed him brought those flowers with her.


Only Percival himself knows for sure.

profile.CN:
光之高扬斯卡娅赠予的情人节巧克力。

模仿光之高扬斯卡娅使用的粉红色手枪的巧克力。
也可以用作护身哦。
很像万事都要全力投入的高扬斯卡娅的作风，
作为巧克力的质量是最高品质的，
还可以靠真假不明的爱情力量发射子弹。
据说只要让巧克力子弹命中心脏，
就能切实让对方陷入『魅惑』状态。

如果通过NFF服务销售，毫无疑问会成为人气产品，
但不知为何却没有列在商品清单上，是仅限此刻的绝品。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Koyanskaya of Light modeled after the pink pistol she uses.


Can also be used for self-defense in a pinch. As you'd expect from someone with standards as high as Koyanskaya's, the chocolate is some of the highest quality you'll find anywhere, and the pistol can fire real bullets by using the genuine(?) power of love.

Apparently, if you land a clean shot on a target's heart, it'll even Charm them on the spot.


While this product would surely be a huge hit if NFF Services listed it in their catalog, for some reason, this is the only one of an extremely limited production run.

profile.CN:
哈贝特洛特赠予的礼物。

哈贝特洛特帽子的主人公尺寸。
不愿意赠送巧克力的害羞哈贝特洛特
送出的小小礼物。

等御主回老家的那天，务必，要穿上情侣装。
profile.NA:
A present from Habetrot, this exact replica of her own hat has been made to perfectly fit Master's head.


She feels this is the least she can do to make up for her inability to give a gift of chocolate. One day, if all goes well, she looks forward to visiting Master's home while wearing these matching hats.

profile.CN:
从冒充奥伯龙的人那里得到的礼物。

打开色彩清爽的容器，
里面是触之即散的松软雪粒
...并非如此，而是煤灰一样的黑色尘埃。
怎么看都是『虚影之尘』。

尝起来有盐味。可谓是以不咸不淡的态度应付。

「里面的东西已然失去了价值，
唯独容器的光辉，恒久不变，对吧？」
profile.NA:
A gift from someone claiming to be Oberon.


The beautifully decorated container holds what feels like fine, powdery snow...except it looks even blacker than soot. No matter how you slice it, it's obviously Void's Dust. Incidentally, it tastes like sodium when you lick it. Talk about a salty response.


"The contents might not be worth much, but maybe in this case, it's what's on the outside that counts?"

profile.CN:
冲田总司〔Alter〕（剑士）与炼狱赠予的情人节巧克力。

魔小姐和炼狱熬夜制作出来的手工巧克力。魔小姐和炼狱和御主友爱地牵着手，快快乐乐地踏上漫长的旅途。但这肯定是通往美妙天空的旅途。

话说回过神来才发现不知为何做了两份，这是为什么呢，炼狱？

不关我的事。不，虽然知道，但不关我的事，就当这样好了。对吗，主人的御主啊。

——三个人排成川字形，午睡好天气。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Okita Souji (Alter) (Saber) and Rengoku.


They stayed up all night working on it. You can see the majin, Rengoku, and Master holding hands and having a grand old time together on their way into what must surely be a lovely sky.


By the way, I couldn't help but notice you made two of them. Why is that, Rengoku?


Beats me. I mean, I could tell you why, but I'm not going to. Right, Wielder's Master?


...What a perfect day for all three of us to take a nap outside together.

profile.CN:
阿纳斯塔西娅（弓兵）赠予的情人节巧克力。

很硬，硬得离谱。用魔眼压缩、凝缩而成的
这块美丽的巧克力简直就是永久冻土本身，
无论用锤子砸还是用针戳都毫发无损。
不仅如此，在炎炎夏日也不会融化，
放进沸腾的水里也无济于事。
那如果舔一下会变成如何呢，
当然是舌头粘在上面非常难受。
皇女评价道，「该怎么办才好呢」。
这是我的台词才对。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Anastasia (Archer).


It is, in a word, solid. Extremely solid. In fact, this beautiful chocolate has been so thoroughly compressed and concentrated thanks to Viy's Mystic Eyes that it's now essentially indestructible permafrost.

Hitting it with a hammer or stabbing it with a needle won't so much as scratch it, nor will leaving it out in the sun or putting it in boiling water get it any closer to melting.

And, if you care about keeping your tongue where it is, don't even think about licking it like ice cream.


"Goodness, whatever are we going to do?" the Grand Duchess asked.


Isn't that our line?

profile.CN:
夏洛特·科黛（魔术师）赠予的情人节巧克力。

用白巧克力制作的造形美丽的鸽子，
充满了栩栩如生的跃动感。
甚至可以说由于跃动感过剩，让人觉得这东西是活的，
根本无法轻易下口吃。
毫不吝惜地选用了顶级的原材料，
品尝起来肯定非常美味，但是……
科黛评价道，「戏法真厉害呢～」。
这是我的台词才对。
profile.NA:
A beautiful white chocolate dove received from Charlotte Corday (Caster) for Valentine's Day.


So realistic it almost feels alive. In fact, it feels SO alive that it's hard to bring yourself to actually eat it.

It's made with extremely generous amounts of the finest ingredients around, so there's no doubt it would be absolutely delicious, but...


All Corday had to say about it was, "Stage magic sure is amazing, huh?"


Isn't that our line?

profile.CN:
少女达·芬奇（裁定者）赠予的情人节巧克力。

将她与恐龙一同度过的夏日回忆
用巧克力蛋糕表现出来的成果。
整体色调以蓝色为主，也就是类似蓝色夏威夷的味道。
「不吃就太浪费了，一起吃吧！」
说着，兴高采烈地切分蛋糕，和新所长与玛修等人
边品尝边感伤而热闹地谈论着那个夏天的回忆。

这是只属于我的宝石。
是和大家分享的无可替代的经验。

是某个夏天的，绝无仅有的、无可比拟的大冒险。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate cake from the young Da Vinci (Ruler). It captures all the highlights of the summer she spent with a dinosaur. According to her, the blue frosting tastes like a Blue Hawaii (non-alcoholic, of course).


"It'd be a shame to let it go to waste, so let's all eat it together!"


And so, slices of cake were shared with Director Goredolf, Mash, and everyone else who went on that trip as they all reminisced about their memories of that summer.


This jewel belongs to me and me alone. I'll never forget the time I shared with everyone else on that mission. It was truly a grand, once-in-a-lifetime summer adventure.

profile.CN:
迦摩（复仇者）赠予的情人节巧克力。

「呼哈哈哈！（过于在意魔王风度的笑声）
　堕落的魔王动真格的时机竟然是在情人节
　这种简直就是为了堕落而存在的活动，
　你真是太不幸了呢……绝对不会放跑你哦。
　看清楚这终极兵器吧。
　事先筹备计划，通过写笔记来模拟过程，
　不计成本购买顶级材料，清晨早起，
　一个人偷偷摸摸地边想象御主会露出
　什么样的表情边动手，
　虽然中途出了很多问题，但还是不轻言
　放弃一直做到深夜才完成的，
　这可怕的手工巧克力……！」

意气风发地将御主拖进梦之世界倒是无妨，
但发生了一些事后最终将巧克力塞进御主嘴里，
随后拔腿就跑。
另外事后正式向她道谢的结果是，

「……那，那是什么眼神，什么温柔的表情！？
　光是看到内心就怦怦乱跳了啦！？
　啊，难道你找帕尔瓦蒂准备了反弹诅咒！？
　太，太可恨了！」

据说防御力极低的魔王大人红着脸气鼓鼓的。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Kama (Avenger).


"Mwaaahahahaha! (The laugh makes clear she's trying too hard to hype her Demon King side) How unfortunate for you that I decided to get serious about corrupting you just when Valentine's Day rolled around. You couldn't ask for a better way to sink into depravity, you know. Don't even think about trying to get away. Just feast your eyes on this ultimate weapon: a horrific chocolate confectionery I planned ahead of time, sketched out in my notebook to get the look just right, bought the highest quality ingredients I could get my hands on without a care for the price, secretly woke up early to make, and worked my hands to bone all night to finally finish it in time, all while overcoming countless unforeseen difficulties and imagining your reaction when you saw it!"


After rambling on like that for a time, one thing led to another, and she ended up just shoving the chocolate in Master's mouth and running away. Later, when Master went to thank her, all the huffy, red-faced Demon King reportedly had to say was:


"...Wh-what is it? Why are you looking at me so kindly!? Cut it out! It feels like my heart's about to explode! Wait. I know what's going on. You must have gotten Pārvatī to come up with a curse to get revenge on me! H-how dare you!?"

profile.CN:
凯妮斯（骑兵）的情人节回礼。

新鲜！
在加勒比海边刚捕来的各式各样的鱼。
全都是凯妮斯用鱼叉抓到的。
沉重地放在巨大的叶子上。

量真的相当多，不用客气尽管吃吧！
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day return gift from Caenis (Rider).


Caught in the Caribbean ocean, fish doesn't get much fresher than this aquatic assortment. Incidentally, instead of a fishing rod, Caenis used a harpoon to spear every last one of them before placing them on these giant leaves.


With this many to go around, you'd better believe I'm going to dig in!

profile.CN:
清少纳言（狂战士）赠予的情人节巧克力。

仿佛能令人联想到南国的华丽与热闹。
堆满大量五彩缤纷的冰淇淋、水果
和点心的令人兴奋的顶部装饰。
将这些全部承受下来支撑着的，整块吐司。
可谓派对必不可少的，蜜糖……
不，不对。这怎么看都是巧克力。

但是这个，独自吃掉肯定会感到无聊。
和制作者的她一起共享，亲密地一起吃掉吧。
这样吃起来肯定比独享要好吃数倍。

＊

话说回来，那个烟花到底有什么意义呢。
诺子什么都不回答。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Sei Shounagon (Berserker).


It is essentially an entire loaf of toasted bread piled high with all sorts of colorful ice cream flavors and fruit and topped with frankly ridiculous amounts of candy. This thing has an almost tropical ostentatiousness and festivity about it. Now this is the kind of honey—whoops, I mean, chocolate toast that's fit for a party.

You may well need a party to eat it all, because there's no way you can finish this on your own. Hey, here's an idea. You can have it with the lady who made it for you. That way, it'll taste even better.


＊


By the way, what's with the sparklers? We may never know, since Nagiko refuses to answer.

profile.CN:
雅克·德·莫莱赠予的情人节巧克力。

让美食之都的点心老店西点师
每天晚上做强烈恶梦从而做出来的什锦巧克力。
拷问般的痛苦与升天般的甜美
会交互袭来。要活下去。

「和白兰地之类的应该很配吧。
　但是……你应该喝咖啡欧蕾吧？」
profile.NA:
An assortment of Valentine's Day chocolate from Jacques de Molay.


Made by a pâtissier at an old, well-known gourmet candy shop after Jacques gave her vivid nightmares every night. This chocolate hits you with alternating waves of torturous bitterness and overwhelming sweetness. Good luck. You'll need it to survive this.


"These would go great with a nice brandy...but a café au lait's probably more your speed, huh?"

profile.CN:
芝诺比阿赠予的情人节巧克力。

将隶属棕榈科乔木的椰枣树果实，也就是椰枣
干燥后的产物（每100g热量约266kcal），
与微苦的巧克力（可可含量约50％）搭配而成的作品。

味道犹如一本正经而大胆的她性格之表现般完美平衡，
甜味与苦味奏响了绝妙的和声，同时又毫无装腔作势的
朴素风味令人不知不觉吃到停不下来。

当然是手工制作的，从她的制作过程，
材料的调配、厨房的预约、预先集中精神、干练的手法、
不加任何邪恶的改造、事后收拾干净等中，都能看到
其他从者难以企及的贤妻良母的身姿……

中途，遭到将她烹饪之打扮错误地看成裸体围裙的
影之风纪委员长的攻击是唯一而最大的危机。
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day gift from Zenobia.


It consists of an assortment of dried date palm fruit, i.e. dates (266kcal per 100g) coated with slightly bitter (approximately 50% cacao) chocolate. Just as Zenobia herself is a mix of intense earnestness and bold clothing choices, these dates are a harmonious balance of sweet and bitter flavor profiles. No fancy ornamentation here; what you see is what you get, and what you get is delicious.


Naturally, they're all completely handmade. The way she procured her ingredients, reserved the kitchen ahead of time, focused on the task at hand, worked quickly and efficiently without adding any malicious touches, and left her workspace cleaner than she found it all served as a model few other Servants could hope to match.


The only trouble she ran into was when a certain shadow prefect attacked her, mistakenly thinking she was wearing nothing but an apron.

profile.CN:
伊丽莎白·灰姑娘赠予的情人节巧克力。

这次是和御主共同制作的，因此没有什么危险的部分，
甚至可以说这是一件充分表现了她高级品位的
充满了多样性的佳品。
另外，巧克力是南瓜味的。
伊丽莎白·灰姑娘干净利落制作而出的糖雕御主人偶
大受好评，以至于其他从者们也纷纷前来拜托她制作。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Elisabeth Cinderella.


Since she worked with Master to make this one, it is packed with variety, all of her fashion and sensibility, and none of her dangerous tendencies...for the most part, at least.

Incidentally, the chocolate is pumpkin-flavored.

The figures of Master that Elisabeth Cinderella made out of sugar confectionery were an especially big hit, and have led to a deluge of requests for similar figures from other Servants.

profile.CN:
出云阿国赠予的情人节巧克力。

令人翘首以盼的新商品！　终于登场啦！　阿国剧团限定特制巧克力！　不仅作为歌舞伎小道具为人们所熟悉，还不由分说地酝酿出真实日本风韵，有种会全球大流行的预感！

不过，还是试作品。综上所述，阿国小姐不经意间表示这是手工制作的，若能有幸，还希望御主大人能够笑纳。

——这般那般地拉开帷幕的，是出云阿国的恋歌歌舞伎。其来龙去脉终将如何。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Izumo-no-Okuni.


At last, it's here! The brand-new product you've been dying to get your hands on...special Okuni Show limited edition chocolate! You may have seen a pipe like this in kabuki performances before, but I bet it's only a matter of time before this authentic Japanese craftsmanship becomes a worldwide hit! That said, this is still just a prototype, so keep that in mind. Incidentally, I made this one by hand all on my own, so I'm really hoping you like it, Master.


...Thus begins Izumo-no-Okuni's romantic kabuki. What happens afterward is anyone's guess.

profile.CN:
谜之兰丸X赠予的情人节巧克力。

从兰丸星的远古起便重复着流行、过时、流行、过时之循环的传统西洋点心。与好吃的巧克力一起让人期待的，就是里面附赠的兰丸贴纸。

白色紧身衣的兰丸Z、绝对胜利侍童兰丸V、最终决战样式的伟大兰丸G等，身为兰丸的主人，岂能不收集齐呢，主公！

顺便一提，记得要把巧克力吃完之后才能拆下一包包装哦。这是主公和兰丸的约定！
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Mysterious Ranmaru X.


A traditional Western-style sweet that has gone in and out of style on Planet Ranmaru since the dawn of recorded history. The chocolate itself is great, but what's equally fun is finding out what kind of Ranmaru sticker you get inside it.

There's Ranmaru Z in a tight white suit... Ranmaru V, the page of absolute victory... Great Ranmaru G in their final showdown outfit... If you want to call yourself Ranmaru's Master, Master, you've really got to collect them all! Incidentally, you can't open another until you've finished the chocolate from the last one. You hear that, Master? That's a promise between you and Ranmaru!

profile.CN:
坂本龙马（枪兵）和阿龙小姐赠予的回礼。

龙马戴过的白色帽子。是为了隐藏真名而戴的帽子，但实际上算是龙马的爱好。是讲究的定制品，似乎还准备了很多备用品。

高千穗白色大蛇的鳞。一片闪耀着白色光辉，宛若宝石的美丽鳞片。据说持有这片鳞片之人拥有一生中能够使役一次白色大蛇的机会。

即便与世界为敌，那份誓约也依然在此。
profile.NA:
A set of Valentine's Day return gifts from Sakamoto Ryouma (Lancer) and Oryou.


One is the white hat Ryouma wore when he made his first appearance. While he was ostensibly doing so to hide his True Name, the truth is that he also just likes how it makes him look. Although it was custom-made, he apparently has several spares tucked away in case he needs them.


The other is a huge scale from the White Orochi of Takachiho that shines as brightly and beautifully as a jewel. It's even said that anyone who possesses such a scale can call on the White Orochi to do their bidding for them, though only once in their entire life.


Even if the whole world should turn on you, I will still honor my oath.

profile.CN:
圣诞玛尔达赠予的的情人节礼物。

德国的点心面包，史多伦面包！
与为圣诞节派对奔走时，
一起制作的那种史多伦面包有一点不太一样。
这次似乎稍微调整了一下菜谱。

也就是……
情人节·改编！
揉进了很多巧克力碎哦！

「多吃一点吧！
　但为了防止蛀牙，一定要仔细刷牙哦？」
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day gift from Santa Martha.


It's stollen, the German sweet bread! But it's not quite the same stollen she and Master made together for that Christmas party. Apparently, she's made a few small changes to the recipe to make it a better fit for Valentine's Day. That's why it's been stuffed full of chocolate chips!


"Go on now, eat up! But make sure you brush your teeth well so you don't get cavities, okay?"

profile.CN:
太公望的情人节回礼。

位于峻山脚边绵延云下，
宁静的溪流与旁侧堤岸。

「令人心情平静呢。
　怎么说呢……这景色，仿佛能令人联想到仙境吧？」
太公望如此说道，但真伪不明。

此处——
对太公望来说，似乎是极致的钓场。
但若问是否要在这里钓鱼，答案却并不是，
他说，我在这里钓的是王侯哦。
那鱼呢？　不钓吗？

「当然钓啦。
　因为，你会吃吧？」
原来如此。

顺便一提。这里似乎也是他生前（？），
常带妻子前来的场所——
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day return gift from Taigong Wang.


A peaceful spot of land near a clean river stream, nestled beneath tall mountains and drifting clouds.


"Ahh, this is so relaxing. Don't you think there's something about this place that reminds you of the sage world?" Whether Taigong Wang actually means that or not is anyone's guess.


One thing we do know for sure is that Taigong Wang considers this place the perfect fishing spot. You'd think that would mean fishing for, well, fish, but no; according to Taigong Wang, he's here to fish for royalty. So, does that mean you're not going to do any normal fishing then?


"Don't be silly. Of course I will. You need something to eat, don't you?"


Ahh, now I see.


Incidentally, rumor has it that he would frequently bring his wife here back when he was still alive(?)...

profile.CN:
多布雷尼亚·尼基季奇赠予的情人节礼物。

与本人的武器防具一样，同为大马士革钢制的小型短剑。
为了在战斗中使用时不会伤到手，
仔细地安上了刀锷。

——为了生存而使用吧。 
——生存，意味着战斗哦。

笔直注视着眼睛的尼基季奇道出的这席话，
至今，仍留存在心中。

「你有用那个吗？
　什么？　很少有白刃战的机会？
　不，不不。
　不是那个意思，唔。
　你看，好歹是短剑，做菜的时候也可以用嘛。
　那个……怎么说呢。
　不要把那个当做什么了不起的东西。
　虽然确实用了大马士革质地很好的钢材，
　但完全可以用作日常用哦！」
就是这样——
事后尼基季奇如是说。
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day gift from Dobrynya Nikitich in the form of a dagger made from the same steel as Nikitich's equipment. It has a large, sturdy blade guard to keep its wielder's hands safe in combat.


...Use it to stay alive.

...If you want to live, you have to fight.


Even now, you can recall how you felt when Nikitich told you that while staring you straight in the eye.


"So how's the dagger been treating you? Huh? You haven't had any opportunities to use it in close-quarters combat yet? No, no, that's not what I meant. Daggers like this are useful at meals, too. Look, um... Try not to be too precious with it, okay? Yes, it's made of fine Damascus steel, but it's still okay to use it for everyday things!"


Such was the advice Nikitich later offered.

profile.CN:
暗之高扬斯卡娅赠予的情人节巧克力。

成熟女性赠送的高级品牌的顶级巧克力。
虽不是手工制作的，但由于是将品牌设计师
和工匠囚禁了数天从零开始做出来的高定，
从某种角度来说，可以算是『顶级的手工制品』。

包含了对于御主能够达成从能干美女秘书的角度来看
都算难以完成的工作的称赞、嘲笑，以及亲爱之情。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Koyanskaya of Dark.


It's some of the finest chocolate in the world, making it just the kind of gift you'd expect from a mature, worldly woman.

She may not have made it herself, but since she kidnapped a high-class brand designer and forced them to make it from scratch, you could also argue that it's the ultimate handmade gift.

It contains praise, derision, and a generous amount of affection for the Master who achieved what even the ultimate high-powered secretary considered to be virtually impossible.

profile.CN:
赫费斯提翁赠予的情人节巧克力。

既然由我制作，不用说肯定会做成这种结果的，
王之雕像。而且还是年轻时期与全盛期的双人大份。
比例之类的全都是靠目测的，
但哪怕一根头发都不会有差错才对。


另外，外表虽是如此，味道也是一等一的。
这是领悟到现代料理精髓的她不惜任何成本钻研的结果。令人不禁想问为何如何全力以赴的那股冲劲，恐怕是自生前起就未曾改变的性格一面吧。
profile.NA:
Valentine's Day chocolate from Hephaistíon.


It is a sculpture of her king that all but shouts "What else did you expect me to make?" What's more, it's a double whammy that includes versions of him both in his youth and his prime. According to Hephaistíon, she eyeballed the proportions, but she made sure to capture his hair down to the smallest detail.


Despite how it looks, it can easily hold its own against any other kind of chocolate. This is because she has awakened to the joys of modern-day cooking, and thus ruthlessly pursued quality with no regard to cost. You may be tempted to ask why she would go to such extreme lengths for a confectionery, but this side of her personality probably hasn't changed since she was still alive.

profile.CN:
马纳南·麦克·利尔〔巴泽特〕赠予的礼物。

将从俵藤太氏那里拿到的好吃的大米，用加热蒸、刺拳、
直拳、摆拳、勾拳、前踢、膝击、回旋踢、佛拉格拉克
等烹饪方法，将米粒反复捣到失去原来的形状，
并在里面注入豆沙做成的原创的和风甜点。

她得意地炫耀说，秘方是在冲击的瞬间追加旋转力。
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day gift from Manannan mac Lir (Bazett).


This Japanese-style sweet is made by taking freshly cooked rice acquired from Tawara Touta, using various cooking techniques like jabs, hooks, straights, uppercuts, front kicks, knee strikes, roundhouses, and Fragarach to pound the rice until not a single grain is visible, then injecting it with sweet bean paste.


According to an obviously proud Bazett, the secret ingredient to making these treats really pop was the corkscrew blows added to the moments of impact.

mcLink: 巴泽南式情人节用甜点

profile.CN:
玛修·基列莱特赠予的情人节赠礼。

目送御主踏上旅途次数变多的她为了即将回归之人，
倾注心意制作而成的小小的巧克力挞。

从精致的装饰上，不仅可以看到她想温暖地招待对方的心意，
更闪耀着每天坚持磨炼的匠人技术之光辉。

甜味浸透精疲力竭的身躯，让身体里涌现再次站起来的力气。
或许作为西点师，玛修又获得了进一步的成长吧……
御主心中暗暗这么想着。
profile.NA:
A Valentine's Day gift from Mash.


Since she's no longer able to come with you on many of your missions, she decided to put her heart and soul into making these tiny chocolate tarts to welcome you when you return. It's easy to tell at a glance both how hard she worked to make these treats, and how much she wanted them to make you happy.


As you take a bite, you can feel their understated sweetness spread throughout your exhausted body, filling it with new energy. Mash's pâtissier skills were already great, but it seems she may have once again taken them to the next level...


"Dear Senpai,

Thank you always for your hard work!

I made a mini tart for you, so please go ahead and eat it.


From Mash Kyrielight"

profile.CN:
诅咒之骸的瓦砾。
仿佛能遮蔽天空般，不祥地耸立于此。
profile.NA: A cursed heap of bones and rubble. An ominous aura rises up to permeate the nearby sky.

profile.CN:
漫无目的地随便找了家酒吧，
在里面遇到了一位散发着奇妙氛围的男子。
随性地，宛若嘲笑一般，
男人表示自己刚完成了一件工作。

「你是艺术商人吧？　从视线就能判断出来了。
　你会习惯性地寻找这家店最美的东西。」

男子对绘画非常熟悉。
可以说，是一种奇妙的缘分吧。
我们聊起了收藏于这座城中美术馆里的某张画。提香的《天上的爱与人间的爱》。

「其实啦，我对艺术一窍不通。
　我不懂什么是美丽的东西。
　伟大的东西、端正的东西、尊贵的东西，
　这类优秀的事物我能够理解，但仅此而已。
　我无法感受世间所谓的“爱”是什么。」

俗话说美是赐予人爱，或是被人赐予爱的存在。
而男人似乎无法从中感到喜悦与满足。

「美理应是过去式的。
　只有当失去，或是受到损伤之时，
　才会注意到那是对自己无可替代的存在。
　这不是称赞，而是哀悼哦。
　正因为再也回不来，才会成为无比美丽之物。」

无法表示赞同。
这是因为——

「嗯，说得太对了，兄弟。

　毫无意义，无药可救，也得不到回报。
　那么，还不如从一开始就不去爱就行了嘛。」

就像在开玩笑一样说着，男人站了起来。

profile.NA:
I happened across a bar and stopped in. There, I encountered one of the most mysterious men I've met in my life. With a light, mocking tone, he told me he had just finished a job.


"You're an art dealer, right? I can tell from the way you look at things. You're searching for the most beautiful thing here purely on reflex."


In a strange coincidence, he knew a great deal about paintings. We ended up talking about one painting in particular on display in the city's museum: a Tiziano, or Titian as he's known elsewhere, called "Sacred and Profane Love."


"To tell the truth, I don't know the first thing about art. I can't tell a Dali from dog shit. I can, however, spot the grandiose, the precious, and the well-made, but no more than that. I sense nothing of what society calls 'love.'"


They say beauty is that which provides people with love, or is something they love in turn. Apparently, this man had no way of experiencing that joy or satisfaction for himself.


"Beauty should be found in what is past. Only when something is lost or broken do you realize its importance. It is not a matter of admiration, but of mourning. There is nothing more beautiful than what you cannot ever reclaim."


I couldn't agree with him. After all...


"Yeah. That's right, brother. The moment you damage something so that you can feel love for it, you lose what you've come to love. There's no goddamn point. No salvation, no retribution... Nothing. So then, why love at all?"


Having said his piece, as though it had all been a big joke, the man got up from his seat and left.


...In the distance, I heard the wailing of an ambulance. It made me think of death.

为在春之花园中嬉戏的你，

献上仅此一夜的共演。

profile.NA:
"Farewell, great detective..."


A great crime syndicate whose tendrils extend all across Europe. The detective travels far and wide in search of its leader, accompanied by a man claiming to be a completely ordinary merchant who only wants the bounty on the leader's head.


When the supposed mastermind is finally found, he turns out to be a man they both know well. As the detective stands on the cliff where the man disappeared, he mutters to himself, "This isn't over... I'll chase you 'round perdition's flames before I give you up. It's my job as detective to close this case once and for all!"


"I've come this far. I'll stick with you until the very end, too!"


...This will be his last case.

mcLink: 侦探爱德蒙～最后的事件篇～

"Ah, the young prince, what is your business with me tonight? Surely you haven't come here to befriend me."

profile.CN:
「干什么啦？　这又没有什么好奇怪的吧。
　这不过是粉丝福利的一环。

profile.NA:

profile.CN:
「你们究竟是什么呢～？」

是个谜。
从姐妹被召唤的那刻起就在一起了。
归根结底，是生物、使魔、幻想种，
还是除此以外的什么东西呢。
没有人知道答案。

……只不过，征侧有时会有种感觉。
只要看见它们，内心就会涌现一股想去努力的心情。或许还有些欠缺，但它们能让她切身感受到自己正在被谁依靠。
她有时觉得，它们会露出这种给与自己力量的，就像曾经的「大家」一样的眼神——
因此她认为，它们俩或许就是「大家」吧。

但不管怎么说。

「两个人都认为无论真面目是什么，总之非常可爱，

「……你在做什么啊，姐？」
「啊！？　唔，不，没在做什么哦？
