profile.NA:
"What are you two, anyway?"


The answer remains a mystery. All we know for certain is that these tiny elephants were summoned along with the sisters they now accompany. Are they alive? Familiars? Phantasmals? Something else entirely? Nobody knows for sure. That being said...there are times Trưng Trắc feels like these elephants inspire her to do her very best. Times they help her realize that, even with her various shortcomings, both real and imagined, there are still people out there counting on her and her sister for help. Times their eyes remind her of all the people who once gave her strength... And so, she sometimes thinks they may actually be the very people she and Nhị once knew. Though of course, if they are, that raises its own questions. At any rate...


"Even if they don't know who we are, both sisters think we're adorable and consider us trusted partners, tarantara!"

"Definitely. It's a big relief. Now let's get back to our trunk-rubbing game, tarantara!"

"You're on, tarantara!"


"Uh... What are you doing, Sister?"

"Huh!? U-uh, n-nothing. Definitely not pretending to give both elephants voices or anything like that. Nope."

profile.CN:
每当苏醒，总会想念天空。

与迄今为止自己所在的泥土中截然相反，
充满了清新而广阔的世界。
是与自己成对的行星漫步的场所。

并不是在羡慕。
并没有在渴望。

我们的归宿是大地。
破坏该定律之人注定遭受灾祸。
从未对此产生过疑问。

即便如此，每当苏醒时，出现在眼前的，
始终都是——
肉块永远无法触及的，天空。

真希望能在那自由的天空下，
享受所谓晒太阳，哪怕一次也好。

心中默默地这么想着。
profile.NA:
Waking up always makes me think of the sky. It's so unlike the soil I've been buried in all this time. The brilliant blue seems to stretch out forever...the place my planet lives. It's not that I'm jealous or anything. I have no desire to claim it for myself. I know I belong elsewhere. My job is to curse those who break the law, and I've never had second thoughts about it.


Even so, when I do wake up, I can't help but notice the sky hanging high over me. After all...a mass of flesh like me could never hope to reach it.


Still, it would be nice to learn how sunbathing feels, especially under a free and open sky. I can't deny that thought has crossed my mind.

profile.CN:
唯有英杰可获得的荣誉楔桥。
哪怕迟早会忘却名誉，
这份战果，也会作为痕迹留存在历史上。
profile.NA: A bridge of glory available only to heroes who have proven their worth. Even if the prestige they win is one day forgotten, the results of their battle will remain in history forever more.

profile.CN:
潜藏于坚磐之中的胎儿之晶光。
虽为矿物，却散发着令人切实感受到生命的温暖色泽。
profile.NA: The radiant light of a stone that has yet to be fully born. Though it is no more than ore, it still gives off a warm color pulsing with life.

profile.CN:
班扬小姐在FGO中实装后，
已经成为了高不可攀存在的真正从者。
但她从不骄傲自满，就算见到了过去的同辈，
也不会露出厌恶的表情，
而是以一如既往的友好态度对待她们。
profile.NA: Although Bunyan joined the upper echelon of Servant stardom after being added to FGO, that fame hasn't gone to her head at all. Even when she runs into former colleagues, she greets them with the same friendly attitude she always did, without a single sign of displeasure.

unknownCharacters: 奥尔加玛丽·阿尼姆斯菲亚

profile.CN:
让我们沿着大河进发吧。
小小的身躯中塞满了巨大的期待。
无论水多么湍急，风多么冰冷，
有时甚至还会剧烈摇晃。

只要和最喜欢的伙伴们在一起，
不可靠的木筏也显得如此出色而令人骄傲——

这是世界上唯一的、美妙的豪华游轮啊。
profile.NA: The children follow the big river wherever it goes, their little bodies brimming with hopes and dreams. It doesn't matter how fast the river carries them, how cold the wind blows, or how much the water shakes them. As long as they're with their beloved friends, even the world's flimsiest raft can be a beautiful one-of-a-kind yacht.

profile.CN:
那里是密林，也是秘境。

什么也没有？
不。
这里有全部都很新鲜的相遇与喜悦。
无道之路？
不。
这里有能随便选择前进方向的自由。

此处是人迹未至的世界。
被梦想覆盖的陆地之海。
profile.NA:
A remote, unexplored area in the heart of a dense forest.


What's that? You think there's nothing here? You couldn't be more wrong. There's the joy of making new friends all around. No path to follow? That's right. We're free to go wherever we like here.


This is a world still untouched by humans, a sea of land covered in dreams.

profile.CN:
被抛弃在地下，远古的记忆。
沦落为普通“物品”的，时间的遗物。

有人称这块东西为欲望。
但也有人用更美的词语形容它。

好了，那么，
手握这个的你，会如何称呼它呢？
profile.NA:
Memories of the prehistoric world, buried in the ground for ages. Mementos forgotten by time, reduced to mere objects.


Some people call such clumps "desire." Others use much more beautiful language to describe such things.


What will you call it when you finally get your hands on it?

profile.CN:
旋转，旋转，世界（胶片）在旋转。
戏剧化和恐怖刺激。
心理学和爱情喜剧。
你喜欢哪一种？
哪种都可以。
剧本全靠即兴创作。
因为你不是虚构的存在。

约定只有一个。
让我们拍摄一部华丽壮观而感情丰富的，
前所未有的“快乐”吧！
profile.NA:
Turning, turning. The world (of film) keeps turning. What kind of movies do you like? Dramatic thrillers? Psychological rom-coms? It's all good. Go ahead. Ad-lib all your lines. You yourself are nonfiction, after all.


Just promise me one thing. Whatever movie we make, let's make sure it's spectacular, emotional, and above all, merry!

profile.CN:
可爱的超级班扬亲已经成为
概念礼装了哦！　太棒了！

哎？　经验值卡……？
喂给其他概念礼装吃的那个？　是吗……

但，但至少要留一张在保管室哦！
毕竟不知下次什么时候才能拿到吧！
profile.NA:
Check it out! It didn't take long at all for Super Bunyan, everyone's favorite cutie, to become a Craft Essence! Isn't this great!?


Huh? An EXP Card? The kind you feed to other Craft Essences? I see...


W-well, you should still hang on to at least one of them! You never know when you'll get another, after all!

profile.CN:
国民美少女玛丽·安宁
超稀有概念礼装登场啦！

无疑会附带超强增益效果令人大受欢迎！
赶快装备起来外出吧！

（……就没有更好看一点的照片了吗？
　好像还把多余的老鼠拍进去了。）
profile.NA:
An ultra-rare Craft Essence for a national beauty: me, Mary Anning!


Just look at all these crazy buffs! You'll definitely be popular with this equipped! What are you waiting for? Go on, try it out!


(But...was this really the best picture they could've used? I mean, what are these mice even doing here?)

mcLink: 概念礼装EXP卡：大黑天＆安宁降临

profile.CN:
从精灵们翩然起舞的彼方之地
我降临在这个世界上，
赐予名字、赐予语言、赐予智慧。

这其中也包括了枫叶糖浆的制作方法。
因此，我觉得应该更加感谢我。
profile.NA: I came to this world from a land where elementals roam free. I gave you names, taught you how to speak, and shared my wisdom with you—including how to make maple syrup. So I really think you could stand to show more in the way of appreciation than you have been.

profile.CN:
在接受主人的教诲并改过自新之前，
我们是些只顾满足饥饿且努力繁殖的生物而已。

但现在，我们是您这样高贵存在的仆从。
不是什么只会偷吃的野兽了。
profile.NA:
Before we had a change of heart thanks to our master's teachings, we were no more than base creatures who only lived to fill our bellies and grow our numbers.


Now, thanks to our noble master, we have gained new purpose as his servants. We will never return to the days of being mere animals sneaking bites of food ever again.

profile.CN:
被那片海洋所困。

随着海浪的搓打，心灵被削弱、磨损。
变得什么都感受不到。被埋在土中，逐渐死去。
最终，将留不下任何东西，被人遗忘。
为何无法逃脱呢？明明没有人需要我。
profile.NA:
That sea took hold of me and never let go.


As its waves washed over me, my heart wore down to a smooth nub.

I could no longer feel anything. As the earth buried me, I died one tiny piece at a time.

Eventually, nothing of me remained, and I was forgotten completely.

Nobody needed me...so why couldn't I just run away?

profile.CN:
输掉拳脚之争算不得什么，决斗时败下阵来也不过尔尔。
但是在国与国之间的战争中战败，结局基本不外如是。
众人的生命消逝、奴隶遭人横拖竖曳。
大家所筑就的事物、所度过的人生，
皆被定义为毫无意义，随后化为乌有。

就不存在稍显，稍显不同的道路吗。
内心不禁思索着这种毫无意义的问题。
确实还有你在。
然而……就算你还坚守着也没意义了。
因为本该守护的对象已尽皆归于尘土。

我高傲不屈的城墙、不败的三重防壁啊。
莫要哭泣，哭泣是仅被许以应守护之民众的权利。
愤怒吧，如修罗般盛怒，似罗刹般震怒吧。
那才是被许以你我的权利。
profile.NA:
It's okay to lose a fistfight. It's okay to lose a duel. But this right here? This is what happens when you lose a war. People killed...slaves dragged through the streets...everything we worked so hard to build disappearing.


Was there no other way? Was there no different path we could have taken, however small? This is all the meaningless drivel that inevitably fills my head in the wake of all this. I know you're still here. But...you alone don't make any difference. Not when everything else we were supposed to protect is gone.


Ahh, my towering ramparts, my indomitable three-layer bulwark. Do not cry; tears are the sole right of the civilians I should have protected. You...you may only rage. Rage like a demon. Rage like chaos itself. That is the only right left to you.

mcLink: 所有一切都消失不在了

profile.CN:
远古记忆涨落的贝壳螺旋。
呢喃般的声响始终鲜明毫不褪色。
profile.NA: A spiral of seashells that brings back memories of ancient times. The echoing sounds of the sea within are as vivid and vibrant as ever.

profile.CN:
飞舞于深山的不灭火焰之花串。
悠扬地伸展的翼翅映照着东方整片天空。
profile.NA: A flowery cluster of eternal flame dancing across the mountain peaks. Its graceful wings expand to illuminate every centimeter of the eastern sky.

profile.CN:
这是无比——无比漫长的冬季。
倘若就这么冻结下去，
或许反而更为轻松吧。

但是，正因为犯错、后悔、败北，
才明白了自己该做的事。

不是为了别的什么人。
就算力有不逮也不放弃。
即便赢不了也不避而不见。

因为那伤痕累累的手诉说着，
要成为那样乃是没有天赋之人的战斗。

黑夜迎来了破晓。
犹如虫蛹破茧而出，狼迈出了步伐。
profile.NA:
It was a long...long winter. Perhaps things would have been easier if he had just frozen to death. But without making mistakes, leaving regrets, or suffering defeat, he would not now know what it is he must do.


He's not doing this for anyone else. Even if he's ultimately powerless to help, or has no chance of winning, he won't let that stop him from trying. For thanks to those scarred hands, he now knows that this is a battle fought by all who were never gifted with natural talent.


Now, the dawn has broken. And so, the wolf sets out on the journey ahead, as different from who he once was as a butterfly emerging from a chrysalis.

profile.CN:
其为统率之人。

所有的光均俯首称臣，一心效忠。

月下已盈，宿业结实。

谨以五大元素，稀有宝石在此已臻化境。
彰显魔道之奥秘。
profile.NA:
She is the one who wields them all. All manner of light bows before her, devoted to serving her every whim.


Karma comes to fruition, brimming with light from the moon.


With the five elements at her command, this rare and precious gem reaches its potential, revealing the deepest secrets sorcery has to offer.

profile.CN:
灭杀自身的恶梦之具现。
蓄起可予以束缚的惩罚之力。

即便心中那份恐惧
足以令人遗忘守护与誓言之承诺，
不容退让之物仍然不变在此。

前进。
依然要继续前进。
超越那背影——那赤红之风。
profile.NA:
Facing the embodiment of a nightmare bent on taking his life, the boy builds up power to bind it.


Even though he is so terrified he has forgotten his pledge to protect, he continues on, relentless. He will never stop, not as long as there remains something on which he refuses to compromise.


Forward. Ever forward. Feel the red wind at your back, even as you strive to push past it.

profile.CN:
男人书写着那骄傲的尊严。

毫不犹豫。
这是从没有富余之心中诞生的影子。
与优雅相去甚远的样子，令人难以置信。

因此，这是一种决心。
为了排除后顾之忧。
为了成为真正完美的父亲。
profile.NA:
The proud man pens his will. His mind is completely made up. The shadow that lurks within is born from a heart with no room to breathe. Such a thing would never be possible for one lacking in elegance.


So this is simply determination. A bid to rid himself of any lingering regrets. All in the service of becoming a truly perfect father.

profile.CN:
对他来说，生命就是一种资源。
从另一种角度来说，之所以被当做燃料对待，
不过是因为从中发现了这种价值。

哪怕对被消耗之“物”自身而言，
没有得到任何一丁点回报。
profile.NA: For him, lives were no more than a resource to be spent. He treated them this way because he could see no other worth in them. Even if that meant he would receive nothing of equivalent value in exchange for his own life.

profile.CN:
阿里芒戈的少女
如纯洁无瑕的雪白花朵般微笑着。

沐浴在恬静的潮水声与耀眼的阳光下，
在那遥远记忆的彼方，永远，永远。
profile.NA: The girl from Alimango smiles like a pristine flower of pure white. Bathed in dazzling sunlight, with the gentle sound of the tide washing all around her, her mind wanders incessantly to distant memories.

profile.CN:
——这理所当然。
乐于助人。
努力做个善人。
在当一名骑士之前，这更是身为人类最基本的生活方式。

希望她能踩在大地之上。
希望她能深深呼吸。
希望她能大声叫喊，
希望她能高声欢笑。
啊啊——归根结底，我的愿望仅此而已。

——真讨厌。
我分明不该获得如此幸福的结局。

——这是一幅梦想的绘画。
惜爱这令人激动、心心相印、感情交织的喜悦，绝对不可能的世界的模样。
然而你仍然在脑海中描绘。
将飞跃幻想、在原野中游玩、带来无可替代之人的豁达之风，顺其自然地拥入怀中。
如此这般不值一提的时光。
profile.NA:
What must one do to be a good person? The answer is obvious: help those in need. Knight or not, that is what any decent human must strive to do.


I want you to feel the earth under your feet. I want you to take a deep breath, yell at the top of your lungs, and laugh until your sides hurt.


Yes...when you get right down to it, that is all I truly desire.


...This is awful. I don't have the right to end my life in such bliss.


...This is a scene from a dream. A vision of impossible worlds where fast-beating hearts are drawn together, cherishing the joy of loving and being loved.


Yet despite knowing they can never be, you can still see them clearly. Frivolous days spent leaping across fantasies, frolicking in fields, and earnestly embracing the gentle breeze that accompanies those who are irreplaceably precious to us.

profile.CN:
这就是我的剑，咎瓦尤斯！
怎么样，很帅吧！
有人说，其剑身每天会变化三十次颜色，
还有人说剑柄里藏着圣枪之类的，
总之，这把剑有各式各样的传说。

但归根结底，
问题还是在于这把剑可以砍什么人，不能砍什么人吧。
王之剑、勇者之剑可能会因为持有者的不同，
而沦落成魔之剑、愚者之剑吧。

因此，当我握剑的时候，总是会询问我的伙伴，
「现在我帅吗？」
这种问题哦！

现阶段，我还没有被人评价为很逊，
所以，应该就是这样没错了吧！
profile.NA:
This is my sword, Joyeuse! What do you think? Pretty awesome, right!? Some stories say it changes color thirty times a day... Some say there's a sacred spear hidden in its hilt... And there's probably a bunch of others I can't even remember. But all you really need to know about it is who it'll cut, and who it won't. This is the sword of a king, or of a hero if you prefer. It can transform into a demonic blade, or devolve into a sword of fools, depending on who's wielding it. That's why, whenever I take it out of its scabbard, I always ask my allies, "Am I awesome right now?"


Then again, they've never given any answer but "yes," so I guess I don't have anything to worry about!

profile.CN:
无与伦比的开放感。
无与伦比的释放感。
看啊，太阳灿烂苍穹闪耀，
白云漂浮草木鲜艳。
（虽然背后等身体各处都刺刺的。）

这是何等爽快。这才是人类的生活方式啊。
所谓的世界，只要像这样全部暴露无遗，
无论是什么问题基本都能解决。
只不过，其实并不能全部解决。
比方说，现在的我面对的问题——



惨了，衣服不知上哪儿去了啊！！
profile.NA:
Unparalleled freedom. Incomparable liberation. Behold how the sun's rays shine down from the pale blue sky. Look to the fluffy white clouds, the vivid green of the grass and trees. (Can't deny the former kind of tickles my back, though!)


It doesn't get any better than this. This right here is how everyone should live their life. Put yourself out there without holding anything back, and there's no problem that can't be solved. Well, almost no problem. For example, the problem I'm dealing with right now is—




Aw, crap! What happened to my clothes!?

profile.CN:
没错，这就是莱茵的黄金。
就是我的前夫、前老公、前王子、前冒险家
齐格飞获得的破灭之秘宝。

知道我为什么执着于这宝物吗？
呵呵，不知道也难怪——

「因为想要破坏」？

……回答正确。
没错，无足轻重，这东西无足轻重。
就算这种东西是宝贵的魔术物品，
对我来说也不过是普通黄金。
还不如全部融掉铸成金币呢。

御主，你也要小心哦。
不要被令人目眩神迷的黄金迷到利令智昏。
亲密的人或许会背叛你，
你或许会想要背叛亲密的人。

所以，我会教你一种届时用来应对的方法。
反正是无足轻重之物，那就痛快地用掉好了。

只要使用、分享给他人，诅咒和灾厄就都会消失。
这就是所谓被诅咒的黄金。
profile.NA:
So, this is the Rheingold—the fabled and ruinous treasure my ex-husband, ex-prince, and ex-adventurer Siegfried went to such great lengths to acquire.


Do you know why I wished to obtain this treasure for myself?

Hehe, I won't be surprised if you don't.


...Yes, that's right. Because I wanted to destroy it. It's worthless. Utterly worthless. Maybe magecraft types consider it valuable, but to me, it's nothing more than a lump of yellow rock. I should have melted it down and turned it into medallions long ago.


You know, you ought to be careful too, Master. The glitter of gold can turn hearts as well as eyes. It could lead to someone you trust betraying you, or you betraying them. Which is why I'm going to teach you an easy trick for dealing with it. All you have to do is use it all up. Spend it all on whatever you like, because it has no worth otherwise. That's right. Use it up, share the wealth, and any curse or calamity associated it will simply disappear. That is the nature of cursed gold.

profile.CN:
甚至可以说，人类的伟大之处就在于数字。
加、减、乘、除。
运用这些基础，东西有多大，距离有多长，
全部可以测定。
所有一切存在若失去了数字，剩下的只有虚无。

而数字，同时也会唤来恶。
若说只要杀害一百个人，就能拯救一千个人的话，
就肯定有人愿意背负这份罪孽吧。
人类已经做不到
像野兽那样单纯明了地生活了。

正因为如此，才有逻辑之恶。
这里就是那些的集合体。

以上，就是詹姆斯·莫里亚蒂的数学讲义。
记得要认真提交报告哦！
profile.NA:
One could make a very strong argument that numbers are themselves humanity's greatest achievement. Addition, subtraction, multiplication, division... From these fundamentals, we can measure an object's size, the distance between two points, and everything else. No being can exist in reality and not be subject to numbers. What's more, numbers can also invite malignancy. If killing a hundred people can save the lives of a thousand more, then surely someone out there will readily bear the burden of such a sin. The fact is, humans can no longer live their lives with the unadorned simplicity of mere beasts. Thus, we have logical malignance, as collected in the very instruments you see here.


All right, everyone, I'm James Moriarty, and this has been my lecture on mathematics. Make sure you submit your reports before deadline!

profile.CN:
噢噢，我那楚楚可怜的公主杜尔西内娅啊！
我堂·吉诃德·德·拉·曼却，
要用这次伟大的冒险，让整个世间
都知晓您那楚楚可怜而高洁的身姿！

哎，让我评价和我一起旅行的可爱女仆小姐吗。
怪了……我朋友桑丘·潘沙是个大腹便便的男人，
不是什么可爱女仆……你想打听关于桑丘的事？

桑丘正可谓是我最棒的朋友，也是我最棒的随从！
我那极尽苦难的荣耀之旅如果没了他，
一定会变得黯淡无光吧！

哎，让我再多说说？
那么就说说我们大冒险中一个小插曲——



嗯，嗯。
我也非常快乐。
和你的旅程、冒险，是无可替代的，
美丽的事物。
profile.NA:
Ahh, Dulcinea! My beautiful, perfect princess! I, Don Quixote de la Mancha, have just returned from a grand adventure on which I told the whole world about your delicate beauty and incredible nobility!


Huh? You have something you wish to say about the cute maid I traveled with? Um, my lady, with all due respect, I think you may be mistaken. My friend Sancho Panza is a paunchy, middle-aged man, not a cute maid... What's that? Sancho is who you wish to ask about?


Why, Sancho is my dearest friend, and the best attendant a knight could ask for! If it hadn't been for him, my glorious, perilous journey would have faded into obscurity long ago!


Huh? You want me to tell you more? Very well then, allow me to regale you with one of the many stories from our grand adventure...


Ahh, that was delightful. It's true; the adventure I shared with you was beautiful. I will never forget it.

mcLink: 楚楚可怜的公主与忠诚的骑士

profile.CN:
太平道信徒们佩戴的黄色头巾。

使用该颜色的理由诸说纷纭，
有说源自五行说，也有说源自对黄帝的信仰……
但不管怎么说，民众的确相信只有身披这种颜色挺身而出才能获得未来。

「嚯，嚯，嚯。确实，头戴这个的民众
　并非每个人都理解了太平道全貌吧。
　但是，即便如此……还是存在所谓的一体感。
　回想当时。
　头上戴着黄巾，挺身而出的众多民众。
　倾听老夫的话语，双眼熠熠生辉的人们。
　啊啊……或许，
　那才是老夫等人追求的东西吧。
　放眼望去满是黄巾的景象，犹如，
　长满沉甸甸稻穗的丰收的大地——」

这是维系起他与民众的颜色。
阖上的眼皮内浮现的，是他们真真切切活过的证明。
profile.NA:
One of the yellow scarves worn as turbans by disciples of the Way of the Taiping. There are numerous explanations as to why this color was chosen, with the Five Elements theory claiming that it was a sign of faith in the Yellow Emperor. Regardless of the color's origins, we do know that those who chose to stand up to the Han Dynasty while wearing one of these scarves did so because they believed it would lead to a brighter future.


"Hoohoho. True, I doubt many people who wore these scarves truly understood everything about the Way of the Taiping. But, even so...there was a sense of unity in seeing everyone wearing the same color. Of course I remember the droves of people who stood together, all with these yellow scarves wrapped around their heads. I remember how they listened closely to what I said, their eyes glittering bright. Yes... Thinking back on it now, perhaps that very sight is what we all truly sought. Seeing all those Yellow Turbans covering the land everywhere you look was like seeing the most bountiful rice harvest you could imagine coming to life..."


Yes, this was the color that bound Zhang Jue and the people who looked up to him. A mark of their lives that he can still see clearly whenever he closes his eyes.

profile.CN:
创作编织撰述而成的禁止带出之万叶。
为构筑人与不实，所有书籍融入寂静。
profile.NA: Forbidden stories from a carefully chosen compendium. Their pages slip into all kinds of books of their own accord to promulgate falsehoods.

profile.CN:
华丽盛放的齿轮琼葩。
机械构造的圆舞曲，为无尽之梦而不断舞着。
profile.NA: Seemingly countless cogwheels that appear to bloom like bejeweled flowers. This mechanical dance continues ever onward, spinning to bring dreams without end.

profile.CN:
眼中映出的是富士。
犹如在心中摇曳、随风舞动的杨柳。
这股冲动寄托指尖细细描绘。

仅限于素描未免过于可惜，
但若想要细化时间又不够。

啊啊这趟心爱而美丽的旅程啊。
所以应该为此感到焦虑愤怒。
还是应该坦率地为之高兴呢。

这还真是烦恼到令人疯狂啊。
profile.NA:
I can see Mt. Fuji off in the distance. My heart flutters like a willow dancing in the wind, my fingers impulsively tracing its contours.


Merely sketching it would be a waste, but I simply don't have time to render it in the detail it deserves.


Ahh, what a beautiful journey. Should I be angry that I can never capture such beauty, or simply glad for the chance to witness it?


I fear this dilemma may drive me crazy.

profile.CN:
于凡夫不登之顶，
钢刃华美飞舞，玉矛雄壮奔走。

形容来说，唯甲无乙。
比喻来说，唯优无劣。
不分胜负也在情理中。

此乃万夫莫开之比肩。

厌倦于俯视的月亮打了一个呵欠。
也被不止的剑戟之声——悄悄吸了进去。
profile.NA: Here at a zenith beyond the reach of ordinary people, sharp blades dance gracefully and majestic lances strike at lightning speed. There is no defense, only offense; all advantage, no downside. Little wonder then that neither side is giving so much as a centimeter in this unparalleled spectacle. Even the moon, tired of looking down, cannot help but yawn—a yawn that quickly vanishes amidst the endless echoes of blades clashing.

profile.CN:
自由。
此处有自由。
无尽宽广。
无尽遥远。

奔跑吧。
疾驰吧。

伴着风。
追逐着青草的气味。
profile.NA:
Freedom. Yes, here, there is freedom to be found. Grass as far as the eye can see, with no end in sight.


Come, my friends. Let us run. Let us bound. Let us feel the wind at our backs as we pursue the smell of grass.

profile.CN:
感情一念，倾注子弹（心灵）。
无论逃去哪里，
无论躲在哪里，
瞄准后必能命中标靶。
定能击穿你的胸膛吧。

还请做好觉悟。

「……巴亲，你和公主不同，是真的瞄准了心脏吧？」
「嗯。当然瞄准了啊？」
profile.NA:
I am putting all my heart into this bullet. No matter where you run, no matter where you hide, I shall fire it straight through your chest. Prepare to meet your maker.


"Uh, Tomoe? Are you seriously aiming for the heart?"

"Why yes, I am. Why do you ask?"

profile.CN:
读本『南总里见八犬传』。
九辑，全九十八卷，一百零六册。
连续刊载时间长达二十八年，
是耗费了通俗小说作家·曲亭马琴半生的大作。
从江户时代起就还以歌舞伎和净琉璃的形式上演，
影响了从当时到现代的各类作品。

离开东家的年轻马琴咏唱的诗句，
「寒风枯木　意已决　神之旅」。
高傲到仿佛将自己比作了十月聚集于出云的诸神，
但『八犬传』表现的正是马琴之旅。
profile.NA:
The "Nansou Satomi Eight Dog Chronicles" consists of nine sokan (volumes), ninety-eight scrolls, and one-hundred and six serials. Published over twenty-eight years, this grand epic took Kyokutei Bakin nearly half his life to complete. Kabuki and joururi productions have been a fixture of Japanese theater going all the way back to the Edo period, and its influences on various works across countless genres cannot be overstated.


Bakin served as a page until he decided to set out on his own path at a young age, during which he wrote the following haiku:


"Chilled by winter winds

I have made a decision

To journey with gods"


While certainly an arrogant haiku in that it compares Bakin to the gods who gather in Izumo during Kannazuki, the tenth month of the lunar calendar, one could make a strong argument that the "Eight Dog Chronicles" is itself the journey Bakin decided to undertake.

profile.CN:
箭搭弦上，然后射出。
铁箭头能轻易贯穿人之躯体。
人之躯体基本就像塞满了肉与水的皮袋。
只要被高速尖锐的物体刺中，高概率会死。

那么，如果像我这样的，我这样的怪物，
射中人，又会如何。
钻入穿透五人十人的身体，
城门被轻易破坏。

那么，船又会如何呢。
……结果如你所见。
我的箭矢撕开了船只，令人们溺死水中。

虽是理应感到兴奋的一击，却令我有些心痛。
倘若被箭矢赐予的死乃是荣誉，
那船只破坏赐予的死或许就是凄惨之死吧。
在战场上，未经战斗白白溺死。

我的箭，绝非慈悲一箭。
请您记住，御主啊。
我们将战斗与死亡视为荣誉，无畏地挺身面对。
然而，其背后……存在着像这样，
数之不尽的，过于残酷的死亡。

战斗，并非什么好事。
但由战斗机械的我这么说——简直像个笑话。
profile.NA:
I nock an arrow to my bow and loose it. Its arrowhead easily bores through its target's body. Broadly speaking, human bodies are little more than bags of meat and water. At high speeds, anything sharp can penetrate and, most likely, cause them to cease functioning.


So then, what if... What if a monster, like myself, were to fire upon people? My arrow gouges out five, ten bodies at a time, and destroys castle gates as though they were made of paper.


So then, what about a ship? ...See for yourself. My arrow tore it apart, dooming its passengers to drown.


While I should perhaps be elated over this accomplishment, my heart also cannot help but ache a bit. Dying to an arrow may be glorious, but dying because your ship was destroyed, without even setting foot on a battlefield, must be anything but.


The arrow I fired was not one of mercy. Far from it. So please, Master, I implore you to remember this. We may find honor in battle and death, and are thus unafraid to face them. But what is rarely discussed is how countless people have met cruel...far too cruel ends like these.


No, as ridiculous as it may sound coming from a machine built for battle like myself...there is nothing good about war.

profile.CN:
庆祝「Fate/Grand Order」七周年！！

在这值得纪念的节日，骤然回忆起那景色。

在这值得纪念的节日，骤然回忆起那景色。
假如当时以不同的形式邂逅——

或许就能够看到，
服饰焕然一新的英灵们的身姿吧。

畅想着这种可能性，
回顾那天那个时刻吧。
profile.NA:
Celebrating Fate/Grand Order's 7th Anniversary!


Take a trip down memory lane to mark this momentous occasion.


What would things be like now if that fateful encounter had happened differently?

Maybe we'd be looking at Heroic Spirits in completely new outfits.


Let's take this occasion to look back on the day we first met and imagine "what if..."

profile.CN:
巨眼临终滴落的红泪之瓮棺。
熬凝的沉淀，深刻而激烈地诅咒生者。
profile.NA: A burial urn with vivid red tears dripping down from a single enormous eye. The wailing stagnation simmers and stews as it curses the living with every ounce of its being.

profile.CN:
铺设神秘的灵剂之心房。
虚伪的血浆，在全新基盘上流淌弥缝之河。
profile.NA: A spiritual elixir atrium designed to lay the foundation for all manner of Mystics. False plasma flows through patchwork rivers to reach the foundation.

profile.CN:
平淡地读出了模拟训练的结果。
说实话真亏你能撑到现在呢。

御主和魔术师并不完全等同。
就算有适性，技术也要另当别论。

但正因为如此，才有教导的价值。
虽然还远远不如A组那群人——
profile.NA:
The simulation's results are read aloud matter-of-factly. It really is amazing that we've made it this far.


Masters and mages are not equals. Even if someone has an aptitude for one or the other, the skills one needs to develop are a different matter entirely.

But of course, that's what makes teaching so worthwhile. We still have a long way to go before we catch up to Team A, though...

unknownCharacters: 希翁·艾尔特纳姆·索卡里斯

profile.CN:
优秀的作战源自优秀的会议。

在如今的迦勒底，
常会手持三明治或咖啡，
彼此交换自己想到的事。

有时会从中萌生闪光的灵感，
也有时只是度过美妙的时光。
profile.NA:
A good strategy starts with a good meeting.


These days, most meetings at Chaldea take place with delicious sandwiches or rich cups of coffee close at hand, and everyone frankly sharing their thoughts with one another.

Sometimes this process leads to great ideas, and sometimes, it just leads to time well spent.

profile.CN:
踏过一次次旅途，
经历一次次重逢，
重要的战利品装满箱子，填满内心。

有时会无法全部收纳满出来，
但只需慢慢一点点与大家一起整理。

为将来未知的冒险做准备。
profile.NA:
After several journeys, and lots of amazing encounters, both our hearts and our storage containers are filled to the brim with precious mementos.


Sometimes, things come spilling out because there just isn't room for them all, but together, with everyone's help, we're slowly finding places for everything.

And once we're done, we'll be ready for the next adventure.

profile.CN:
在众多战场上见到了人性之恶。
见到了收割无辜花朵们的地狱。
也在其中，在全部死绝的土地上，
见到了仍挣扎着渴望生存的——生命之强韧。

因此才会追求救世主的碎片。
为众多智慧冠以争夺之名的超越。

因为，这就是为回报丧失的无数生命，
让渐入老境的世界再次走向成熟期的，
唯一的阶梯啊。
profile.NA:
I've seen the evil that lurks in people across countless battlefields.

I've seen hells where innocent flowers are mowed down left and right.

And through it all, in every desolate wasteland of death and destruction...I've seen life's inner strength continue pushing it to survive.


That is why I sought the savior's fragments. That is why I overcame conflict with so many intelligences.


For this is the only path I can take to avenge the many lives lost and restore this decrepit world to one with a chance to flourish once again.

profile.CN:
老兵在等待。
等待那自己的职责与骄傲相交之刻。

只是无所事事地看着那早已生锈的样子。
面对这基本已经放弃的黑铁之枪，
再次将包含了平静尊严的荣誉放在胸口。

然后，只愿沿着这扭曲道路前进的尽头，
是信念的终点。
profile.NA:
The aged soldier waits patiently. He knows there will come a time when he and his dignity are needed once more.


He turns his gaze to his black iron spear—a spear he once thought had nothing left to do but gather rust—and approaches it quietly, with honor and pride in his heart.


He prays that the winding, twisted path he has followed thus far will one day lead to where he believes he was always meant to go.

profile.CN:
就这样，公主殿下返回星之内海后。
那回忆化作了种子，在湖畔绽放出了鲜花。

他表示“很像”的，
不同于原生种，独此一朵的地上之花。

就像占卜恋情，
就像重复回忆，
如若在梦中般诉说着。

『哪怕相隔遥远，
　也愿你如今
　不要遗忘月光。』

重复着，重复着。
但愿那个人的世界，也有这般浪涛声。

　　◆

……好了，那些问题暂且不谈，

『真抱歉啦，我是个顽皮公主～！』

那些毫不留情的批评，
我也记得一清二楚哦！
profile.NA:
After the princess returned to the planet's inner sea, her memories became a seed, which became a flower blooming by the lake.


It was the only flower of its kind on the surface, unlike the primordial type he said she resembled.


When you look at it, it speaks to you as though it were telling your romance fortune; as if it were fondly reminiscing; as if it were in the middle of a dream.


"No matter how far apart we may be, may you never forget the light of the moon."


Refrain. Refrain.

I only hope the sound of these waves can be heard in his world as well.


　　◆


...Still, aaall that being said...


"Well excuuuse me for being a tomboy princess!"


I can also perfectly remember every last cutting remark!

profile.CN:
呼……我职责差不多也要结束了吧……
啊，这个术式错了。麻烦你修正一下。
接下来的事就拜托大家了……
嗯，没错没错。能行能行。这个灵符做得很好哦。
接下来只要速度能提上来就更好了。
回想起来，大举来到此处已过去数十年了，
我都觉得自己非常……哎，那是什么，真的吗？
唔～，不好意思，但还是试着重新来过吧～。
我都觉得自己非常……呃，我刚说到哪儿来着了……
哈？　人偶？　不妙？
多半是内部术式不够稳定，根据天气的情况……
话说我的遗言说到哪儿来着了……啊啊，真是的，
完全无暇辞世啊————！
profile.NA:
Phew... Looks like my role is just about done.

Oh, this spell isn't right. Fix it, okay?

The rest is up to all of you now...

Oh yeah, this'll totally work. You did a great job with this talisman. All you have to do now is learn how to pick up the pace.

Man, it's hard to believe it's been decades since that avalanche trapped us in this land. I'm amazed I held out this long... Huh? Really? Is that true?

Hmm. Sorry, but would you mind giving it another shot from the beginning?

Like I was saying, I'm amazed I... Uh, what was I saying again...?

Huh? The dolls are going seriously berserk? Their inner spells probably just need stabilizing. Try keeping an eye on the weather and...

Oh, right. Now where was I on my will...?

Ugh, dammit! At this rate, I'll never have time to die!

profile.CN:
降临北极之地的两只野兽。
装扮也焕然一新，出发前去视察敌情吧。

「先不谈这个，雅斯卡娅！
　我发现了一种可爱的饮料哦，是粉红色的哦！」

「哎呀，给我吗？
　不愧是尼基季奇大人，眼光真不错。
　……我尤其喜欢与外貌不符的不甜的口味。」

夏日的视察，才刚刚开始——
profile.NA:
Two beasts who both came to the North Pole.


"Now that we've got new outfits too, it's time to start surveying the enemy."


"Never mind that, Yaskaya! I found a cute new beverage! A pink one!"


"Oh my, you got this for me? Quite the discerning eye you have, Lady Nikitich. Mmm, it's not nearly as sweet as it looks. I love it."


The summer survey begins...and they're still just getting started...

profile.CN:
海上之旅令人激动。

无论是在甲板上看到的平缓流动的景色，
还是甜美水果的香味都在刺激着五感吧。

在抵达目的地之前，就悠闲地度过吧。
profile.NA: There's something about traveling by sea that gets your heart racing. Between the beautiful scenery drifting by, the wind in your hair, and the delightfully sweet aroma of fruit tickling your nose, there's something for all five of your senses to enjoy. There's no rush. We have all the time in the world to get where we're going.

profile.CN:
可能是受到了各位前辈的影响吧，
鬼与蛇当起了见习僵尸。

应该会用各种方式吓唬你……
但鬼屋出道之路似乎还长得很。
profile.NA: After seeing how much fun their senpai were having, the oni and the serpent decided to become apprentice jiāngshī themselves. They've been trying all sorts of tricks to scare people...but it looks like they still have a long way to go before their haunted house debut.

profile.CN:
神明挑选无人之刻现身。

不祥之物自指尖滴落，
时而低垂双眸喃喃自语。

其身姿如清澈之水般优美而恬静。
profile.NA: It's only when there are no others around that gods elect to reveal themselves. Even though ominous substances drip from his fingers, and even though he may look hopelessly downcast...there is still something as graceful and beautiful about him as crystal clear water.

profile.CN:
钓鱼是件乐事。
无论何时何地都能享受。

能够尝试各种方法，
猎物也未必只有鱼。

若能找到嗜好相同的对象，
那就更无与伦比了。
profile.NA: Fishing is great. You can do it anytime, anywhere, and always have a blast. You can try whatever fishing technique you can think of, and you could easily end up with something that isn't fish at all. And when this time is shared with a fellow fishing enthusiast, well...there's just nothing better than that.

profile.CN:
显现于北方尽头的魔园入口处，
凯尔特勇士与无名剑士迎接着来客。

在封闭着永恒夏日的这个场所，
等待人们的究竟是什么呢……
profile.NA: A great Celtic warrior and a nameless swordfighter greet you at the entrance to the magical theme park that recently appeared at the northmost edge of the world. You don't know what awaits you in this land of eternal summer, but you can't wait to find out.

profile.CN:
战士在前进。

击碎阻挡前进的流水，
挥去眼前呼啸的风雪。

无论何时都要强悍高尚而美丽。
profile.NA: Warriors advance. They smash through the ice floes that obstruct them and beat down the blizzard blowing before their eyes. No matter the time or place, a true warrior always strives to be strong, proud, and beautiful.

profile.CN:
鼓足干劲前来参加实地调查。

然而太阳映照在遥无边际的冰山上，
正因为什么都没有，探索即将遭遇瓶颈。

但是没关系！　无论发生什么，
我都会用这拳头保护您，御主！
profile.NA:
I was excited to come here and start investigating this land, but all I see are what appear to be endless icy mountains and the hot sun bearing down on us all. It doesn't look like there's anything here, and it seems like it'll be difficult to get around on top of all that.


But that's okay! No matter what happens, Master, this fist of mine will keep you safe!

profile.CN:
啊……

御主，御主。
你知道我的阳伞在哪儿吗？
真奇怪，是被我忘在哪儿了吗。
虽说我用魔力将其绑定在灵基上了，
应该很快就会回来——

难不成，我把它落在那里了吗。

嗯。
但是，如果是那样倒也无妨。
或许那把阳伞比我更喜欢那里吧。
就当是这么一回事好了。


……话说回来我还是想要阳伞，
所以会做一把新的！
profile.NA:
Huh. Hey, Master. Have you seen my parasol anywhere? That's weird. I must have forgotten it somewhere. Except...I tied it to my Spirit Origin with magical energy, so it should come right back to me...


Maybe I left it back there. Hmm. Well, if that's the case, it should be fine. Let's just say my parasol likes that place even more than I do.


That said, I still want a parasol, so I think I'll make a new one!

profile.CN:
赤色骑士曾经持有的剑——
赤色魔剑在战斗中途折断，
如今已横在大地之上了。

折断剑的是谁，是我。
挥舞附加了大魔术师梅林之术的枪，
精彩地斩断了赤色骑士的魔剑。

那位大魔术师曾经说过。
赤色骑士乃是灾厄之魔，是概念的具现那化。
那么我……

是否消除了灾难的，一切？

寂静仿佛在诉说着，灾难并未终结。
年轻的加雷斯唯有俯视着折断的魔剑，
伫立于原地。
profile.NA:
The sword that once belonged to the Red Knight... This red mystic blade broke in half during battle, and now lies shattered upon the earth.


She should know; she was the one who broke it. Using a lance that had been enchanted by the great mage Merlin, she expertly evaded the Red Knights' defenses and smote his mystic sword, cleaving it in two.


According to Merlin, the Red Knight was a physical incarnation of evil and disaster. If that's true...does that mean she saved Britain from a looming threat? That she triumphed over calamity?


...There was no response. As though the silence itself speaks to the endless catastrophes that have yet to come. The young Gareth peers down at the mystic blade lying broken at her feet, completely silent.

profile.NA:
One pair of rings (for a giant groom and a human bride) sits next to a white flower. The other pair (for a human groom and a giant bride) sits next to a yellow one. Both pairs lie atop a solid white platform that could be either a marble table or an ancient pedestal.

Or, perhaps not...

profile.CN:

朕总有种要除灵就要趁现在的心情。
所以朕要在这个夏天猎杀所有灵性怪异，
将所有彷徨的尸体都僵尸化收入麾下！

只要胆敢出现，无论白天还是别的什么时候都会迎击，
所以为此，做好防晒还是很有必要的。
好了，快动手啦～。
……哈哈。看来，你是故意磨磨蹭蹭的，以便尽可能长时间观赏朕泳装的样子吧？　真是个可爱的家伙。既然如此，唔……

——勤奋努力的皇帝陛下在暑假期间也不会忘记工作。
倘若为让她能好好休息一会儿而努力涂防晒霜的话，她就会赏赐一张据说是特制的僵尸符作为小费。

反面印刷着她的泳装写真。
profile.NA:
Keh heh heh! I must say, it is nice to take a holiday every now and then.


Now go on, Master. You see that sunscreen on the table, yes? Well, then hurry up and put it on me. I am sure it will be more satisfying for you than if I were still in my small Assassin form. Consider it your reward for a job well done. Savor this good fortune while it lasts. But be sure you do not confuse the sunscreen for the chicken blood. That would make a mess in more ways than one.


Hm? You wish to know why I also have these Taoist instruments here? Why, there is no telling when undead monstrosities may intrude upon this beach, of course. If I am going to exorcise such spirit creatures, I may as well get it out of the way. So this summer, I am going to hunt down every last spirit beast I can find and add all those lost corpses to my jiāngshī army! Or at least, that is my goal. I am prepared to face them no matter when they appear, and that includes during the day. Hence, the sunscreen. Now hurry and put it on me already!


...Ohhh. Now I understand. You are dragging your feet to give yourself as much time as possible to admire me in my swimsuit, aren't you? Well, aren't you adorable. Very well then, in that case...


Even when she's supposed to be on summer vacation, the hard-working empress never forgets her duties.


I wanted her to at least relax while she was out here, so I put on sunscreen like she asked. As a reward, she gave me a jiāngshī talisman that she claimed had been custom-made.


When I turned it over, I found a pinup-style picture of her in her swimsuit.

profile.CN:
架在能眺望峡湾的森林一角的暗铁色硬块。

profile.NA:
A dull steel-colored lump of metal rests on its side at the edge of a forest near the fjord. Its model name is SAM66. It is a submachine gun made from Gungnir, the Noble Phantasm, modeled after the demonic lance Noble Phantasm said to have once been wielded by Odin the Allfather himself. It's the Valkyries' newest armament, given to them automatically when they transform into their new Assassin summer Spirit Origins.


Why a gun? Two possible explanations come to mind: It may be that Thrúd, Hildr, and Ortlinde were influenced by the first-person shooter they've been playing on Tomoe Gozen's recommendation. Or maybe Odin's got a thing for guns.


One explanation is as likely as the other.

profile.CN:
在夜晚迎来破晓的前一刻。
那家伙喜欢还能在天穹中见到星辰的分界之刻。
单纯闲得无聊的我，虽然并不是特别好奇，
却还是问了他最喜欢的星星是哪一颗。

「是天狼星（Sirius）啦。」

那是在观测之时所能见到的最为强烈的光芒。
从大地仰望天穹——
那就像是在由地球向着远方进发的航海中亮起的灯塔一样吧，
那家伙像个小孩子似的得意地微笑。

……没有这样的吧。
因为实在是太过讽刺，
我甚至没能做到像往常那样出言挖苦些什么。

「我说。要是真成了什么『最后的人类』，
　你会去干些什么呢？」

是啊。
露出了清冷中又带有些许寂寞的眼神，
那家伙回答道。

「不去专门设定什么目标，就随心所欲地出去旅行，
　这么说的话如何呢？」

直到如今，我依然在回想着那个未来（愿望）。

「在一切的一切都焕然一新以后，去越过那片海洋。」

仿佛耀眼的晨光。
profile.NA:
The moment right before night comes to an end, when you can still see the stars in the sky. That was the time of day he liked best.


One time, when I had nothing better to do, I asked him which star was his favorite, even though I didn't give a rat's ass either way.


"Sirius."


He said its light is the strongest you can see when observing the night sky. He went on about how it was like a lighthouse showing us the way from Earth to the furthest reaches of the galaxy, while smiling a know-it-all grin.


...No fair. It was so damn ironic I couldn't even bring myself to take the piss like usual.


"Hey. What're you gonna do once you're the last human?"


It was a good question, he said. He followed it up coolly, but with just a hint of sadness:


"Would you believe me if I said I'm thinking of going on a trip wherever the wind takes me, with no destination in mind?"


I still think about what that future would've been like.


"I'd start by crossing that ocean and seeing how everything has changed."


In that moment, he was as bright and dazzling as the morning sun.

profile.CN:

profile.NA: A wreath of foolish chains that impede a brave soul from setting off on their journey. They can bind your body as much as they want, but they can never restrain your mind.

profile.CN:
如水一般。

如同绵长的流水一般，纤柔轻快、
自由阔达地，将焦灼此身的愤怒放流。

似花一般。

好似盛开于原野的花朵一般，无声而艳丽、茁壮而明朗地，将那份思念送往遥远故乡的天空。

与女儿分离的亲辈，与双亲分离的女儿。两个无处可去的思念便在那片土地上相遇了。

一边为之愤怒，一面为之悲伤，而后便是彼此的哀怜、灵魂的交叠。仿佛是互相帮携着对方，又仿佛是彼此抚慰着对方，两个灵魂就这样，浑然一体、宛若天成地，将姿态整合为一。

「如是这般，利休便是驹姬，驹姬也便是利休」

就请将这柄茶杓视作利休的思绪，将这枣形茶罐视作驹姬的心意，我们将献给就这样原原本本地接纳了我们的您的情感，此刻倾注在这一席之间。

——亦如水，亦似花。
profile.NA:
Like water.

Let the anger that rages through you flow away freely, magnanimously, and gracefully...like flowing water.


Like flowers.

Let your thoughts return to your distant hometown, conjuring radiant and cheerful feelings...like a flower blooming in the field.


Parents who were separated from their daughter, and the daughter who was separated from her parents. The two sentiments which had nowhere to meet in this land.


One, enraged by its circumstance. The other, saddened by its state. Each pitied the other, and then their souls joined. They did so to aid one another, if they were comforting each other. The two souls united, as they were, in harmony and order.


"In this way, Komahime shall be Rikyu, and Rikyu shall be Komahime."


Think of this chashaku, this bamboo tea scoop, as Rikyu and this tea caddy as Komahime. We've put our gratitude to you, who accepted us as we are, into this session of tea.


...Like Water, Like Flowers.

就像我那天对大家的期许一样，前行吧。
profile.NA:
Kondo. I am prepared.


Hijikata. Use me as an example for everyone in the Shinsengumi.


Saito. I want you to support Hijikata.


Nagakura. Your unfettered words will play an important role for the troupe.


Harada. Your likeable personality will surely raise everyone's morale.


Mister Ito. Please share your wisdom and observations with everyone.


Toudo. I take responsibility for everything. You mustn't resent the Captain.


Genzaburo. Someone like you should be cherished.


Okita. I'm sorry for causing you so much trouble.


I ask you all to look straight ahead. I may have made the mistake of looking backward, but I want you all to look ahead and keep walking, my comrades who have assembled under the banner of sincerity.


I am here right now. I do not know if that is a punishment or a crime, but I will still look ahead and walk with you as long as possible. Let's walk together, just like on the day when we wished for our future.

profile.CN:
婴孩降生了。
那婴孩不可思议地没有发出任何声音，只是紧握着手。
婴孩的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

婴孩降生后不久，孩子的双亲就死去了。
因为流行病而死去了。
婴孩于是被一族之人视作共同的亲人收养了。
婴孩的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

婴孩长成幼童时，亲人也死去了。
因战争而死去了。整族人都疏远了幼童。
移居出集落，疏远了幼童。
幼童的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

幼童长成少女时，一整族的人都死去了。
因为疾病、风暴、战争、饥荒而死去了。
因为为人所恐惧的灾祸，
因为这样那样的灾祸，大家都死去了。
少女的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

如果你没有降生到这世上就好了，她在诅咒的声音中成长，如果你没有降生到这世上就好了，少女这样诅咒着自己。在诅咒与被诅咒中，她继续生存着。在不情愿中成为了众人期待的巫女。
巫女的手中有一枚漆黑的、泛着光的勾玉。

——一切都是源自这漆黑勾玉的、毁灭之巫女的力量。

但那一定是我的误解。我降生于世并没有罪。因为曾有人这样告诉过我。因为曾有人这样相信着。

「所以，未来啊，我想要你和我一起证明。
　证明这份力量也可以拯救别人，甚至干脆可以
　拯救世界！」

——黑勾玉，一定不会再泛起光芒了吧。
profile.NA:
A baby was born. For some reason, the baby never uttered a single cry, but she was gripping her fist tight. Inside her hand, there was a magatama as black as onyx.


Soon after, the baby's parents died of an epidemic. The baby was adopted by relatives in the clan. In her hand, there was a magatama as black as onyx.


When the baby grew into a child, her relatives died in a war. The clan tried to isolate the child from everyone. In her hand, there was a magatama as black as onyx.


When the child grew to be a young girl, the entire clan died from illness, natural disasters, war, and famine. Every type of terrifying calamity plagued the people and ultimately killed them. In her hand, there was a magatama as black as onyx.


The girl grew up hearing she should never have been born. She cursed herself for being born. But on she lived, being cursed by those around her and cursing them in turn. In the shrine maiden's hand was a magatama as black as onyx.


Everything stemmed from this magatama...the power of the shrine maiden of destruction. But that was probably just everyone’s imagination. There is no sin in being born. She only realized this when...there was someone who believed so.


"That's why, Future, I want you to prove something with me. I want to prove that this power saves people...maybe even the world!"


...The magatama as black as onyx will likely never shine again.

profile.CN:
蕴有许多世界的可能性的大树的种核。
即便生出的枝干多么相似，所萌发出的未来也并不相同。
profile.NA:
The shelled fruits of a huge tree housing many worlds and possibilities.

The branches and trunks that bear the fruits might be equal, but the futures that sprout are not the same.

profile.CN:
倒伏于热砂间栖息的凶恶之蝎的人们的墓碑。
虽已死去却仍不能安息，其针甚至连同灵魂都能一并腐蚀。
profile.NA:
The gravestone of those who fell before the fiendish scorpion residing in the hot sand.

They cannot rest even in death, for the stinger continues to rot their souls.

profile.CN:
躺在舒缓的氛围中，
漫无边际的闲聊与毫无重点的附和，
如同沉入水底的羽毛。

微微打盹。
轻轻摇荡。
没有什么特别的意思。

啊，这奢靡优雅之花。
profile.NA:
Leisurely lying in a cozy atmosphere,

Just rambling chit-chats and out-of-focus responses,

Like feather sank into the waters.


Gently dozing.

Softly swaying.

Nothing in particular.


Ah this extravagant, elegant flower.

profile.CN:
在碧空如洗的那日，
稍微到那边散散步。

薄薄地上个可爱的妆，
让亮晶晶的眼眸闪闪发光，
悠闲地发出银铃般的笑声吧。

茶叶用比平时稍贵的那款。
点心也要足够甜美，好吗？
profile.NA:
On that day of azure sky,

Just having a walk over there.


Putting on cute make up with a light touch,

Let the crystal eyes shine brilliantly,

Leisurely bursting out silver chime liked laughter.


The tea leaves is slightly expensive than usual,

And extra sweet confections, right?

profile.CN:
汗水是让笑容开花结果的，最棒的养料。

如果这些，
都是为了能够让谁吃掉的话。

那么这捧在手中的成就感的重量也好，
阳光灼射下皮肤的疼痛也好，
身上沾染的泥土气味也罢――

这一切都会转变为与在战场上获得的完全不同的，
无价的喜悦吧。
profile.NA:
The sweat on your brow is the best boon in making people smile.


Especially if this is to be eaten by someone.


The weight of your accomplishment, the pain of your skin being burned by the sunlight, and even the smell of the soil clinging to your skin, everything will turn into a gratuitous joy, completely different from one you get from the battlefield.

profile.CN:
大朵怒放，正值芳龄的你啊。

如同自由舞动的棍子，
又像千变万化欣欣向荣的莲花，
此等美丽，已不知该注目何处。

故说我等纵有何等本事，
也逃不开这目眩神迷。
profile.NA:
Bloom magnificently, of you whom at beautiful age.


Like staves that dance freely,

As well as ever-changing and thriving lotus.

Where to lay my eyes before such beauty.


No matter what we are capable of,

This bedazzlement is inescapable.

profile.CN:
侍奉也好，征服也好，
需要拥有与之相匹配的力量。

假虎威之狐无将才。
日日不辍的修行，
才能带来真正的荣光。

但请注意。

为了不被披着甜言蜜语的玩物丧志之种侵蚀，
请不要忘了，长点心眼儿。
profile.NA:
To serve, or to conquer,

One must possess an equaling power.


Tiger-mimicking fox is unqualified to be a general.

Days after days of skill honing

Is what will bring forth true glory.


Be aware.


To prevent infection by sugar-coated rotten seeds,

Please don't forget to always keep an eye opened.

profile.CN:
以笑作肴，以泪为酌，
洗尽不安，便斟满欢愉。

杯盅之渴即吾心之渴。
杯盅若盈，心亦得润泽。
那便是宴会。
那方为宴会。

今日、明日、后日乃至再下一日，
呜呼，来吧，还请再来一杯。
profile.NA:
With laughter as the side dish, admire the tears.

Wash away the dangers and be filled with great joy.


The thrist for the wine glass is the thirst of the heart.

As the glass is moistened, the heart is also fulfilled.


That is the banquet.

That is what the banquet is all about.


Now then, come on, drink, today, tomorrow, the day after, and forever more.

profile.CN:
华丽地、无比华丽地。
赐予所有牺牲者安宁，赋予所有生还者奋进。

平常都吊儿郎当的侠客们，此刻也都以严肃的态度，
注视着道士。
为了大义揭竿而起，屠灭恶人，也将一部分
善人卷入其中。
即便如此，「我等的道路方为正道，一众天星
亦守望之」，也如此坚信着奔走起来。

飞舞散落的花瓣灿若云霞。
悼念牺牲者的话语好似乐音。
存于胸中的，惟有我等高傲的志向而已。

―――瞬间消逝的，如梦的一瞬。
profile.NA:
Splendid, so bright and beautiful.

May all the deceased rest in peace, while all survivors be spurred onward.


The usually rough-and-tumble warriors are solemn right now, and look to the Taoist priests.

They all stood up for the cause. They slaughtered the villains. They roused the people.

And so they charged through, believing their path was just, with the stars in heaven watching over everything they did.

The scattering petals blanket the air like haze. Words to mourn the dead sounds like music to one's ears. Only the warriors' proud aspirations reside in their hearts.


...This is like a dream that will soon disappear.

profile.CN:
据说是得自北海的，
极不寻常的莺。
虽然详细信息不明，却拥有能够伤到显出本体的妲己的面容甚至追撵她的力量。
平时虽然是关在赤红色的鸟笼中，但在化作以从者之姿现界的黄飞虎的一部分的现如今，停在他健硕的肩上享受自由的时候也变多了。

与塞弥拉弥斯或是泳装迦摩一同出任务的时候，也常能看到它和鸽子或是鹦鹉们用鸟语交流的景象。

另外，有试着以玩笑态度和对动物会话比较有心得的人问了它们在聊些什么，却被以一句「还是不知道为好」回复并移开了视线。
profile.NA:
An unusual warbler, said to have been obtained from the northern sea. And while its detail are unknown, it's powerful enough to scar Daji's face and drive her away. Originally it was placed inside a red birdcage, but as it became a part of Huang Feihu upon his manifestation as a Servant, the bird now enjoys its freedom perched on the Servant's shoulders.

Whenever Huang Feihu goes out on missions with Servants like Semiramis and swimsuit Kama, the warbler can often be seen chatting with the doves and parrots in bird language.

By the way, when someone jokingly asks what the birds are talking about to those who could understand animal language, they all look away and say, "it's better you don't know."

profile.CN:
史进君，是史进君！
很厉害的哦！

扯——那么一下，就会变得很长了哦！
咕噜咕噜就飞上天了哦！
甚至可以噗噗噗地喷出火焰哦！
甚至还可以当竹马踩高跷玩哦！

但是，最大的秘密呢……。
史进君，是能说话的！
虽然不能长时间说话，
但人家感到孤独的时候，就会和我说很多话的！
所以说，我啊。最喜欢史进君了！
以后我们也要一直在一起哦！

———当然了，我的朋友。我的伙伴。
就算摇篮之梦结束，一切回归正轨之时，
就算铭记这一切也是无法实现的牵绊，
我的灵魂，也将陪伴你到地狱最底层。
profile.NA:
Did you know!? Did you know!? Shi Jin is so awesome!

He can stretch REALLY long! He can fly and spin around the sky! He can spit fire out from his mouth! He can even turn into a pair of stilts so I can ride him!

But the biggest secret is...Shi Jin can talk! He can't talk for too long, but he talks to me a lot when I'm feeling lonely! And that's why I LOVE Shi Jin! We're going to be together forever!


Of course, my friend. My partner.

Even if we wake up from our dream and return to our original form. And even if we remember our bond cannot be realized...

My soul will be with you till the lowest part of hell.

profile.CN:
向侵扰了安眠的愚者降下的缭乱的震怒。
这狂乱翻覆着的激愤之情，无人能够使之平息。
profile.NA:
The unrestrained rage unloaded upon the fools who dare to intrude on their rest.

No one can appease that wild surging rage.

profile.CN:
于白垩之壁上灿然高悬的昭示功勋的旗印。
惟有伟大的骑士方能获授的那份威光，如此眩目且沉重。
profile.NA:
Flags and symbols of distinguished military services hung radiantly on the white wall.

The authority entrusted to outstanding knights is both dazzling and heavy.

profile.CN:
时刻已然满盈。
所有的挑战者啊——

去证明自己的力量吧。
要比任何人都更快地抵达。

抵达这女王所立的巅峰。
profile.NA:
The time has come.

To all Challengers,


Prove your strength.

Reach before anyone else.


On top of this Queen.

profile.CN:
瞄准了高处不断攀登。
将命运的方向紧握手中。

立于人上乃是理所当然。
无论是作为格斗者也好，或是裁定者也罢……

熔岩之热灼烧全身，沼泽之毒麻痹头部。
阻碍万千亦不休止，登顶之时遥遥无期。

尽管如此，还是将力量聚于拳脚而奔跑。

锻炼得体的肌肉与不屈不挠的斗志，
才为男人所信仰。

1——2——3！
1——2——哎呀？我弄错了？

诶？不是那回事就是太痛了？
真是的——御主怎么才这点儿强度就不行了……

啊不好意思！
这好像是高文卿式拉伸来着？！
profile.NA:
One, two, three!

One, two... huh? No?


Huh? No, it's not that, does it hurt?

Oh, Master, you're such a master. ......


I'm sorry!

This might have been Sir Gawain-style stretching!

profile.CN:
节庆的举办是离不开运营的。

治疗伤者的医疗班，
统筹赛事的调度者。
活跃现场气氛的解说员，
还有后勤支援的助理人员也不可或缺。

只不过——
有关部分工作人员的可疑之处，运营方面会保持一贯的无可奉告的准则。

这件礼裙，是母亲大人——
初代妖精骑士布里托玛特的正装。
啊，我之前有说过吧？

这是十分特别的东西。
因为穿上了它，
我才得以第一次发挥出作为妖精骑士真正的力量。

但这也就是说……
不够成熟的我，不借助母亲大人的力量
就还不能独当一面。

诶？你说什么？
“一起加油努力吧”？

呵呵！
你可真是位奇怪的御主呢！
不过，我了解咯，
布里托玛特，会拿出粉身碎骨的劲头努力的！
profile.NA: This dress is the official attire Mother, the first Tam Lin Britomart, wore. Oh, have I mentioned that before? Well it's very special. Wearing this brings out my true power as a Tam Lin. Which means...I still cannot say I am a true Tam Lin without borrowing Mother's power. Huh, what's that? "Do your best and hang in there"? Heh heh! You really do say the silliest things! But I'm well aware. I'll give it my very best effort, for sure!

profile.CN:
如野兽般向蒙昧献上祝祀之财的虚饰的宝藏。
因将高洁性排斥在外之故，依然涌动着狂暴的力量与诅咒。
profile.NA:
An ostentatious treasury where riches are enshrined blindly the way beasts do.

Not only it is devoid of virtues, violent forces and curses are also pulsating within.

profile.CN:
自遥远的天宇坠落的熊熊燃烧的铁履之启示。
将大地标记的足印，会为人们指明未踏的道路。
profile.NA:
The divine revelation comes from a burning horseshoe falling from the sky beyond.

The footprint stamped on the ground shows people the unexplored paths.

profile.CN:
每一次穿针、每一下引线，下手都无比珍重。

愿这丝线能成为御主的支撑。
愿这布帛能化作玛修的守护。
愿这口袋能兜住许多的回忆。

织入希望能将其作为切实走过的斑斓旅途的证明
而挂在心间、好好收存的愿望。

她们今天也依然，
仿佛编织着梦想般地，构思着崭新的服装，描绘着旅途的点滴。
profile.NA:
Each stitch and each weave is done with great care.


We hope that thread could protect Master.

We hope that cloth could protect Mash.

We hope these pockets would be filled with many memories.


We hope the articles would be the proof that they have truly walked such a colourful and bountiful path.

With that in mind, we wish to complete them.


Today as well, the girls dream of new clothes and the journeys ahead.

profile.CN:
来自本不该有交集的平行世界的少女。
所属于人理续存保障机构菲尼斯·迦勒底，
是以人类之身与英灵融合而成
被称为亚从者的存在。

在这个故事里，
于某个麻烦中降临到生活着从未见过的谜之生物的，
从未见过的世界里。
profile.NA:
A girl summoned from a parallel world that was never meant to intersect with this one. She is a member of the Security Organization for the Preservation of Humanity, Finis Chaldea, and a Demi-Servant, a human fused with a Heroic Spirit.


In this story, an unforeseen error brings her into a nest of mysterious creatures in a world she knows nothing about.

profile.CN:
身缠充满怨念的蓝黑色毒焰，
成为了世界上最著名的『复仇者』的
基督山伯爵其本人。

映入为了救赎某个人，
而穿越世界之理于总耶之街降临的
他的眼中的世界是―――
profile.NA:
Shrouded with wrathful, blue-black flames, the Count of Monte Cristo is the most renowned "Avenger" in the world.


In an attempt to save a certain someone, he crosses the boundaries of the world and appears in the city of Souya. What does this world look like when seen through his eyes?

profile.CN:
后来，作为源义经
而闻名天下的武将的幼年期。

从英灵之座被召唤而来的她眼中闪过的
不是迦勒底而是二十一世纪的日本。
而在我面前的她，
是个矮个子的半猫半人的谜之生物―――。
遮那王流离谭的全新一节，
就此拉开序幕。
profile.NA:
The childhood form of the military commander who later left a mark on Japan's history as Minamoto-no-Yoshitsune. Upon her summoning from the Throne of Heroes, she appears in 21st century Japan, rather than Chaldea, and what appears before her is a mysterious creature that looks to be half-cat and half-human...


A new chapter in "The Wandering Tales of Shana-oh" begins now.

profile.CN:
纵使几度坠落地面，风箱之火也会重燃。

恍若自边狱之地高扬起情热的流星。
停滞之海。悔恨之森。忘却之庭。残响之林。
嗡鸣之城。无限之墓。太阳之巅。
七之碑将死相反转。

满天繁星啊，还请千万不要吝惜你们的喝彩。
愿这最后的落日能化作灿然生辉的终幕。
profile.NA:
No matter how many times she may fall, the bellows will continue rekindling her flame. Her passion is like a meteor rushing back up from Limbo.

The Sea of Stagnation. The Forest of Regret. The Garden of Oblivion. The Forest of Reverberation. The Town of Noise. The Grave of Infinity. The Summit of the Sun. The seven monuments have reversed the phases of death.

O stars of heaven, please give her a hearty ovation. May the last falling star lead to a glorious end.

profile.CN:
其为，于被人遗忘之月上开演的
“EXTRA”的故事。

存在于月球上的，拥有能够实现一切愿望的力量的
灵子演算器「Mooncell Automaton」。
于Mooncell中构筑出的灵子虚构世界
「SE.RA.PH」。
赌上了“圣杯”，魔术师与英灵开展的，
全新的月之圣杯战争，开演。
profile.NA:
This is a story of EXTRA that will unfold on a forgotten moon.

The Mooncell Automaton, a Spiritron computer that exists on the moon, grants any and all wishes.

A virtual Spiritron world created within the Mooncell is SE.RA.PH. With the "Holy Grail" on the line, Wizards and Servants must now wage a brand new Holy Grail War of the Moon.

profile.CN:
今年冬天，要把那一夏的激情与回忆
传递给你所在的城市。

在北海道·宫城·大阪，
会有数不清的“欢乐”降临！
profile.NA:
This winter, we will bring the excitement and memories of that summer to your town.


A lot of "fun" is coming to Hokkaido, Miyagi, and Osaka!

profile.CN:
潜藏在绚烂财宝间的不祥的蛇之眼。
以睨视夺取欲望炽盛者的自由，将其邀往常夜并埋葬之。
profile.NA:
The ominous snake eyes lurk within the ornate commodities.

Their gazes snatch freedom away from the greedy, beckoning and burying them into the everlasting night.

profile.CN:
回响飘荡在无垢的白银之森中的火霰。
被人类所掌握的这份智慧，野兽的吼声都避之不及。
profile.NA:
A hail of fire reverberating through the immaculate silver forest.

The wisdom obtained by human keeps the beasts' roars at bay.

profile.CN:
将崭新到令人目眩神迷地步的，
这起始中的片刻，
小心翼翼地、充满怜爱地，用小小的手掌包裹。

虽然并非是能够一蹴而就的旅程，
但正因如此，
才能同时细细品味着，与你一步一步携手前行的欢欣。
profile.NA:
Carefully and lovingly, she wraps this moment of a beginning so brand new it is dazzling in the palm of her small hands.


It is a journey that cannot be finished in one bound, and that is exactly why she would treasure each and every step that she walks along side you.

profile.CN:
来吧来吧欢迎光临，洋溢着梦与希望与欲望的，
本店盛大的元旦特卖会。

惊奇，感激，还有兴奋的期待，
偶尔的期待落空也没关系，都是欢笑的源头。

profile.CN:
击中那个男人的凶弹，有说是四发，有说是五发。

男人吞下了掺了毒的食物，却没有倒下，
仿佛是要让身体的要害承接子弹般站起了身，
遗体最后被抛进了冰冷的冬河。

男人所成之事，其善恶的所在
并非生活在今天的我等所能衡量。
而可以确定的事情，只有男人是皇帝的友人，以及他否定战争，
向祖国的人民传递神之爱，这样的记录而已。

许多的阴谋，许多的恫吓。
欺诈。交涉。毒杀。暗杀。
尽管有着很多困难，男人却始终没有
淡然接受这一切，而是抗争到了最后。

就算肉体会倒下，信仰却不会倒下。
即使理想会泯灭，信仰也不会泯灭。
绝不会消逝，绝不会被打倒。
不论是怎样的武器也好人类也罢，
都不会动摇男人的存在方式分毫。

　◆

男人自神的教诲匮乏、贫瘠的农田中来。

profile.NA:
It is said that he was shot four or five times.


He ate a poisoned meal and did not fall. He was shot in the vitals, but got back up. They tossed him into the wintry river.


No one alive today can say whether his actions were good or evil. All we know for sure is that history recorded him as a friend of the tsar, an opponent of war, and a messenger of God's love to the people of the motherland.


Intrigue. Threats. Deceit. Diplomacy. Poisoning. Assassination. He faced many challenges, but didn't take them lying down. He resisted until his final hour.


Flesh may crumble, but faith stands strong.

Ideals may drift, but conviction holds true.

It will never fade or be defeated.

No weapon or person ever managed to change his way of life.


　◆


He came from a poor farm, knowing little of Scripture. A seed budding in a barren land, as if to declare itself a miracle of the Lord.

profile.CN:
古埃及的神兽。
尼托克丽丝·Alter会在战斗时召唤、使役它。
与其说是生物，不如说更接近法则或是现象，居所在冥界。有着鳄鱼一般的头部。

「契约者，契约者。

profile.NA:
In battle, Nitocris Alter summons and commands this Divine Beast of ancient Egypt. The Ammit is a native of the underworld which bears the head of a crocodile. It is more akin to a physical law or phenomenon than a living creature, and is said to dwarf a sphinx at its largest size.


"Contractor, contractor. Convey this message to Pharaoh Ozymandias: My Ammit is separate from the massive creature stabled in the base of Ramesseum Tentyris. Honestly, his misunderstanding has caused me no end of trouble.


What? Why don't I just...tell him myself?


Know this, contractor. I am, well, a little busy. Just a little, but busy nonetheless. Too occupied to involve myself with such trifles, I mean. Anyway, pass the message on. Please. I can count on you to tell him, right?"

profile.CN:
被封存在自天花板降下的牢笼中的幽冥灯火。
那一方又一方的摇篮，是为了契合魂灵之形而设。

昏暗之夜的夹缝之间。
被植在树木的空洞中的小虫，
安然无恙地渡过了严冬，正要于此展翅。

在那前方等待着的，并非洗濯污秽的清水。
只不过是，自森林之外吹拂进来的，
柔和而又温暖的——春天的风。

拒绝斟满杯盏，
即是对杯盏存在这一事实的否认。
这只能说是对创造了万事万物的尊贵的神的反叛。

因为渴了。
那么就应该止渴。

只要我，还存在着。

魔术师界瑰丽的蓝宝石。
同时，也是地上最为优美的猎手。

自那婀娜宛转的指尖释放而出的，
是力道强劲，而又直率专一的，
高昂地回响着的，清廉的曲调。

profile.CN:
所谓教诲不过是他人记述的经验。

会诞生矛盾便是非常理所当然的事情。

也就是说。

此时此地应当宣讲的并非谁人的教诲。
值得广加传布的，惟有遍照万物的吾神而已。

神啊，您是至高！

我的朋友只有特佩乌哥哥，
还有一直守护着我的太阳（你）而已。
但我却度过了，
比其他任何人类都更加波澜壮阔、满载着爱意的人生。

花去六千六百万年的时光，
与你们向往着同样的彼方（天宇），
终于成为了人类。

——这是一幅往昔之日的绘画。
在万物平等的，无论是谁都同等高贵的树海之中，
诞生了小小的特别之例的，过去那繁星垂降的夜晚的景象。
而后你在脑海中描绘。
忘却了自己该与何人等同，也忘却了何人都应与自己等同的，即便不断重演着许多的过错，也依然纵身投入自由的旅途的，他们的冒险谭。
profile.NA:
My only friends were Tepeu and you, the sun, who always watched over me. But our lives were more filled with twists and turns and love than any other form of humanity.


After sixty-six million years, we finally became humankind, just like you, aiming for the same sky...to the beyond.


This is a painting of bygone days, a tiny, special something that came into being in that sea of trees where everyone was treated with equal value and respect: two people watching the ancient stars fall. And you're the painter, drawing our adventure in which we traveled wherever we pleased while repeating our mistakes, forgetting that everyone is the same and is treated the same.

profile.CN:
Ocēlōmeh。豹之战士。
如其名所述，是令豹灵寄宿于身并凭此战斗的，
强壮的战士。
这个面具便是证明。
不论是怎样的时代、怎样的肉体，
其内的灵兽（Tonal）都能与你成为一体。

「哎呀，其实中南美还有一种驯服鹫鸟战斗的叫
　Cuāuhtin的战士呢。但实际上这个才是战士
　的代名词，那个总而言之就忘了吧。」

厌恶武器是好事。但不可遗忘武器。
吾乃战神，乃王权的象征。
维持传统，虽喜怒无常却必然言而有信。
就算你是个弱小的战士，我也不会说你不像样。去摸索弱小者的突破口吧。
我会尊重具备时刻准备战斗的意识的人。
如同在密林的幽暗间研磨利齿的野兽一般。
这个面具，应该能让你的血沸腾起来吧。

　　◆

「……虽然话是这么说，不过还有一点要注意。
　我虽然是豹之战士们的神明，但可不是豹神。
　和魁札尔·科亚特尔一样，是蛇神哦。
　有羽之蛇司掌了丰收与农耕，

profile.NA:
Ocelomeh: jaguar warriors. Each warrior channels the might and spirit of a jaguar, making them a formidable foe in battle. This mask is proof of that. No matter the time or flesh, the inner spirit-beast will be one with you.


"Well, Mesoamerica also has warriors called cuauhtin who call eagles into themselves. Ocelomeh is more like an umbrella term for warriors, but eh, you don't really need to worry about that."


You can dislike weapons, but don't forget your weapon. I am the god of war and the symbol of royalty. I keep the traditions, and I have my mood swings, but I always keep my promises. I won't turn you down, even if you're a weak warrior. We'll find a way to overcome your weakness. I respect anyone with the will to fight. This mask will make your blood surge, just like a jungle beast sharpening its fangs in the dark.


　　◆


"I should warn you, though: I'm the god of jaguar warriors, not the god of jaguars. I'm a snake god like Quetzalcoatl. The feathered serpent rules over agriculture and the good harvest. The thundering serpent commands war and victory. Jaguars are the most powerful sacred beasts in Mesoamerica, while I was the most venerated god. That's how I got associated with them."

profile.CN:
不管是怎样优越的地势，
不管是如何繁华的城建，
不管是多么丰饶的自然环境，
移居到陌生的土地上，总归是有一些抵触情绪——
是啊。人类是会对建筑和土地抱有爱执的生物。
我能理解，你无法下定决心搬家时的心情。
但是，为了更好的生活，也必须要做出决断。
为此，我准备了安全·万无一失的计划。

『保持着现在的生活步调走向新天地！
　保证您即使在异国他乡也有不变的生活质量！
　在详细说明之前，还请完成契约！』

以上，都是身为能干的都市神理所当然的馈赠。
就不要表现得太激动了。没在激动，反而是被惊到了？
什么嘛。不都一样吗。
啊对了，本次服务要被当做展示用事例的，所以我也会和你同居。
因为是新建房，应该不会有什么问题……的吧？
profile.NA:
No matter how favorable the geography, clever the urban planning, or abundant nature's bounty, one always feels a little reluctant about resettling in an unfamiliar land. Yes, humans get attached to their land and buildings. I understand why you won't take the leap and move into me. But you need to make decisions that improve your life, and I've come up with a safe, foolproof plan to help you do that.


"Bring your current life to a brand new world! I guarantee that your lifestyle won't change a bit, even in a new country! Just sign here, then I'll explain!"


That's my presentation, from a capable city god. Oh, don't look TOO happy. Wait, you're not happy. You're surprised? Well, that makes two of us. By the way, this is going to be the first model study, so I'll be moving in with you. It's new housing, so surely there isn't a problem...is there?

profile.CN:
那么就是这样。因为只想让你回想起轻松快乐的事情，
所以比起武器还是选了更为日常的东西。
就算消逝之日终会到来，这点东西应该还是可以留下来的。
是我中意的夹克衫，和我收下的最初的赠礼。

　　◆

我戴着会不会也合适呢，什么的，
想要打扮得更华丽一点，什么的，
并不是出于那种利己的想法。

『明亮、轻快、柔和的颜色。
　为了效仿与之相配的神明，
　我才塑成了我的心与躯体』

话虽如此，对于身为神明者而言，对人类社会的
娱乐产品的渴望是鄙贱的。
我以为那样的行为本身就是神明失格的体现，所以忍啊忍，忍啊忍，忍到最后实在忍不住了去买的时候，却买不到了。
就在我无比失落的时候，

「如果不嫌弃的话就收下吧，因为我认识一位应该会很适合这个的，
　和你很像的人」

这个发饰自不必说，最让我高兴的是那句话。
因为那『应该会很适合的人』是怎样的人，
我已经从那满载着亲切之意的双瞳中读到了。
既缺乏自信又没有自觉的自称·神明大人，就在那一刻，得到了许下的愿望、刚好的时机，以及把神明做下去的价值！

——而关于那之后的纪行，就等以后有机会再说吧。
虽然，就算为了回报所获得的信赖而做出了努力，也是转瞬间便宣告了终结。
但我直到最后，都像太阳一样灿烂地笑着，对吧？
profile.NA:
Now, I'd like you to remember the fun times, so instead of a weapon, here's something you can use in your normal life. Even after I'm gone, whenever that happens, this should stay with you. It's my favorite jacket, and my very first gift.


　　◆


I bought it without thinking about anything like whether it'd look good on me or wanting to show off for someone's benefit. Bright, easy, gentle colors... I shaped my heart and body in hopes of being a god who fit those colors.


That said, being a god, I figured desiring luxuries of human society would be...vulgar. It could demean my godly status, so I was really, really, REALLY patient! I almost bought it so many times, then didn't! But one day, when I was really feeling down in the dumps, they said...


"Please, take this. You remind me of someone who would have looked good in it."


I liked the hairpin too, of course, but the mention of reminding them of someone who would have looked good in it was what really made me happy. I could tell what that someone was like from the deep affection in their eyes. That's when this self-styled god, who hadn't learned to be confident yet, came to understand feelings like desire, temperance, and satisfaction from a job well done!


As for where my travels took me next, that's a story for another day. Maybe I'll tell you someday if you work hard to reward my faith in you. Even though it all ended in an instant...I had the biggest, sunniest smile on my face until the very end, didn't I?

profile.CN:
这是在迦勒底高中的考试之前。

结束了这场考试就是年末，
要和熟稔的班级说再见了。

那份巧克力，是为了犒劳一年的辛苦呢，还是说。

快乐的时光就不会有终结。

就在想要与波澜万丈而荒唐无稽的故事一同，将我的思绪
在这里记录下来的时候，我的人生才正式开始。

在迦勒底度过的时光，
不值一提的日常，许多的同伴们。
无比精彩的日常，无比斑斓的记录。

曾由我所书写的事实绝对不会更变。

所以御主，这本日记就交由你一同保存。

有朝一日，我写尽了最后一页的时候，
我也如幻梦般消融无踪——

如果真到了那时，就请你来把这份思绪（记录）启封并收下吧。
